title: Tobacco seedling growing period growth state discrimination and emergence rate detection method and related device
applicants: NONGXIN NANJING SMART AGRICULTURE RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a tobacco seedling growing period growth state judgment and emergence rate detection method and a related device, and relates to the technical field of tobacco seedling growing. The tobacco seedling growing period growth state discrimination and emergence rate detection method comprises the following steps: S1, collecting a seedling tray image in a seedling growing process; s2, preprocessing the seedling tray image, and generating a plurality of seedling hole sub-images; s3, performing labeling and data set segmentation on the plurality of seedling hole sub-graphs by using a Labelimg algorithm; and S4, based on a deep learning algorithm, carrying out model training on the marked seedling hole sub-graph and data set segmentation, and training a tobacco seedling target detection model. According to the method, the problems that in the prior art, the growth speed of tobacco seedlings in the corresponding stage is too high or too low, consistency reference is lacked, manual supervision and control intervention are common phenomena of tobacco seedling cultivation operation in most tobacco areas, a large number of frequent services such as temperature increasing, light supplementing and ventilation in the seedling raising period still need to be manually completed, and the time and labor are wasted are solved. And the technical management requirement on seedling management personnel is high.

title: Method and device for training image classification model, equipment and storage medium
abstract: The invention provides a method, device and equipment for training an image classification model and a storage medium, can be applied to the field of artificial intelligence or the field of smart agriculture and the like, and is used for solving the problem that the classification accuracy and the classification reliability of a target image classification model obtained through training are relatively low. The method at least comprises the following steps: respectively carrying out pixel-level feature extraction on a sample image set by adopting a plurality of image processing strategies to obtain a plurality of feature image sets; each round of iteration comprises the following steps: respectively extracting semantic features of the selected sample image and the corresponding multiple feature maps, and carrying out feature fusion on the obtained semantic features to obtain comprehensive features of the sample image; determining prediction classification of the sample images based on the comprehensive features; and adjusting model parameters of the image classification model based on the plurality of feature maps, the comprehensive features and the prediction classification. The classification accuracy and the classification reliability of the target image classification model are improved by enlarging the data volume of the sample images and fully learning each sample image.

title: Herbivorous animal feed intake monitoring method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: INFORMATION TECH RESEARCH CENTER BEIJING ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY SCIENCES
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a herbivorous animal feed intake monitoring method and device, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: determining at least two frames of continuous feed intake images; respectively inputting the current ingestion image into a herbivorous animal head identification model and a forage pile identification model to obtain a head mask, head feature coordinate information and a forage pile mask of at least one herbivorous animal; based on the head mask, the head feature coordinate information and the forage pile mask of each herbivorous animal, determining the similarity of each first mask; based on the first mask similarities, determining second mask similarities of herbivores with ingestion behaviors in the other frames of ingestion images; and based on each first mask similarity and each second mask similarity, determining a feed intake monitoring result of each herbivorous animal with the feed intake behavior. According to the herbivorous animal feed intake monitoring method provided by the invention, intelligent herbivorous animal feed intake monitoring is realized, and the accuracy of herbivorous animal feed intake monitoring is improved.

title: Multi-modal cow individual identification method and system integrated with action information
abstract: The invention provides a multi-modal dairy cow individual identification method and system integrated with action information, and the method comprises the steps: collecting video data during the movement of a dairy cow, and extracting a complete cow body image of the dairy cow; converting a complete cattle body image extracted from the video data into a silhouette picture and an RGB picture; preprocessing the silhouette picture and the RGB picture to generate a data set, and dividing the data set into a training set and a test set; constructing a deep learning network model based on the training set and the test set, and performing action feature extraction and pattern feature extraction through the deep learning network model; performing feature fusion on the action features and the pattern features, and training a preset support vector machine based on the fused features; and performing cow individual identification on a cow image acquired in real time based on the trained support vector machine model. The method solves the problem that the existing cow individual identification accuracy is low.

title: Rice tillering stage image recognition method
applicants: ANHUI ZHONGKE INTELLIGENT SENSING TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a rice tillering stage image recognition method, which specifically comprises the following steps of S1, performing original acquisition and processing on an image, acquiring a clear image of a rice plant, and performing preliminary processing on the image; s2, skeletonizing the plant image, generating a skeleton image in a line segment form from the image containing the rice plant, and enabling the skeleton image to correspond to stems, leaves and tillers of the plant; s3, skeleton mode classification and identification: classifying the rice skeleton image by using a basic algorithm based on deep learning, and judging whether a tillering phenomenon occurs; according to rice tillering stage recognition based on the machine vision technology, automatic farming reminding and farming decision making for the growth period of rice tillering are achieved, manual field inspection is replaced, high timeliness and accuracy are achieved, the working mode requirements of low cost and unmanned operation are met, a camera serves as a front-end tool for recognition, and the recognition efficiency is improved. Corresponding back-end software algorithms and programs are matched, and complete independent tracking and independent judgment in the tillering stage are achieved.

title: Protective farming straw coverage rate detection method based on edge perception
applicants: CHONGQING RESEARCH INSTITUTE OF CHANGCHUN UNIV OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
abstract: The invention discloses a protective farming straw coverage rate detection method based on edge perception, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a field image through an unmanned plane, transmitting the collected data to a server, inputting the image into a processing model, carrying out the preprocessing of the image, transmitting the processed image to a segmentation model with edge perception, and carrying out the segmentation of the segmentation model. According to the edge perception-based protective farming straw coverage rate detection method, a straw part and other parts of an image are separated, the relation between the pixel size of the straw part and the whole image is counted according to a segmentation result to obtain a straw coverage rate, and the obtained result is output. The field straw coverage rate is obtained through the edge perception segmentation technology so as to evaluate the straw returning effect, manpower is greatly saved in the whole process through the deep learning method, and the speed and accuracy are greatly improved.

title: Dimension-referenced livestock visual weight estimation method and system
abstract: The invention relates to the field of computer vision, the technical field of artificial intelligence and the technical field of intelligent agriculture, in particular to a size-referenced livestock visual weight estimation method and system. Comprising the steps of designing the size of a feed vessel according to the size of a target breeding room and then fixedly placing in the target breeding room; a network camera is arranged on the wall of the target breeding house, and the shooting view of the network camera completely covers the feed vessel; obtaining a video shot by a network camera, and detecting each frame of image in the video through an object detection model to screen out a feed vessel exposure image and a livestock feeding image; performing instance segmentation on the feed vessel exposure image and the livestock feeding image by adopting an image mask generation model to obtain a feed vessel imaging area and a livestock imaging area; based on the size of the feed vessel, calculating the size of the livestock according to the ratio of the feed vessel imaging area to the livestock imaging area, and estimating the weight of the livestock according to the size of the livestock by adopting a machine learning regression model; the method can accurately estimate the weight of the livestock.

title: SMART SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATIC ANALYSIS OF MICRO RNA DATA MICROARRAY
applicants: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXPERT S R L [RO]
abstract: The invention relates to a system and an algorithm for analysis of raw micro RNA data obtained by Microarray technology, using a workflow that combines bioinformation and artificial intelligence steps to obtain biomarkers relevant for the investigated problem and high performance predictive models for solving said problems, with applications in husbandry, agriculture, forensics and medicine. According to the invention, the analysis algorithm comprises the following steps: microarray raw miRNA data pre-processing and quality control, step which also includes data normalization, obtaining the microRNA expression profile; miRNA annotation which consists in attaching the name of each miRNA to the IDs in the table with the expression of each molecule, thereby obtaining the input data for an AI expert that automatically applies AI algorithms to perform: exploratory analysis and data cleaning by checking data format, identification of possible missing data and the percentage thereof, possible abnormalities and a summary statistic analysis comprising data distribution, minimal values, maximal values, average values etc, followed by checking the correlations between the present variables, which allows observation of possible variables which are more important than others in the analysis and construction of predictive models; pre-processing of data before training the models; developing the predictive models and optimizing the parameters of modelling algorithms.

title: SMART SYSTEM FOR AUTOMATIC ANALYSIS OF MICRO RNA DATA NGS
applicants: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE EXPERT S R L [RO]
abstract: The invention relates to a system and an algorithm for the analysis of raw microRNA data, obtained by NGS (Next Generation Sequencing) technologies, using a workflow that combines bioinformation steps and artificial intelligence steps to obtain biomarkers relevant for the investigated problem and predictive models for solving such a problem, with applications in husbandry, agriculture, forensics and medicine. According to the invention, the analysis algorithm comprises the following steps: data pre-processing and quality control, in which the quality of sequences is checked and a detailed report containing all the pieces of information within the content of an analyzed sample is made, the report itself being then analyzed and a decision being made on the filtration of non-compliant sequences in terms of quality; removing the adaptor sequences; aligning the sequences on a reference; miRNA quantization, where an algorithm will collapse all the identical sequences and will count them, after which it will introduce them into a matrix to be subsequently completed with the number of sequences of each sample, thereby obtaining a complete miRNA expression profile to be used as input in an AI Expert the workflow of which comprises: exploratory analysis and cleaning of data; pre-processing of data before training the models, developing predictive models and optimization of modelling algorithm parameters.

title: Single unmanned aerial vehicle image pixel positioning method based on deep learning
applicants: NINGBO BODENG INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a single unmanned aerial vehicle image pixel positioning method based on deep learning, and relates to the deep learning field and the unmanned aerial vehicle image positioning technology field, and the method comprises the steps: S100, obtaining an original image D; s200, calculating a position transformation relation T1 of the original image D; s300, calculating a satellite remote sensing image S; s400, calculating a position transformation relation T2 of the projection image D2; s500, calculating a position transformation relation T3 of the projection image D3; and S600, calculating the coordinates of the geographic coordinate system. According to the method, the deep learning algorithm is applied to unmanned aerial vehicle image positioning, so that the positioning accuracy and stability are improved, the limitation of a traditional method in processing multi-view and multi-scale images is overcome, the processing efficiency is improved, more reliable basic information is provided for application of the unmanned aerial vehicle in the fields of agriculture, environment monitoring, traffic management and the like, and the method is worthy of popularization and application. And the development and application of the unmanned aerial vehicle technology in various fields are promoted.

title: PERFORMANCE MONITORING DEVICE AND PROCEDURE FOR HARVEST IN OLIVAR SUPERINTENSIVE (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)
abstract: Performance monitoring device and procedure for harvester (13), suitable for the precision agriculture sector and in monitoring the performance and analysis of olives and contamination (other harvested elements, such as branches, leaves, etc.) in real time harvest in super-intensive olive grove. The device comprises a support structure (1), intended to be positioned at one end of the conveyor belt (15) of a harvester (13), at a point where the olives and waste are dumped into a hopper (16), a image acquisition of the final area of the conveyor belt (15), a conveyor belt speed sensor (9), a processing module (4) that uses a deep learning model for the classification and detection of olives and waste present, and configured for calculating the yield of the olive grove. (Machine-translation by Google Translate, not legally binding)

title: EFFICIENT METHOD FOR THREE-DIMENSIONAL IMAGE RECONSTRUCTION OF REMOTE AND INVISIBLE TARGETS FROM PHYSICAL SENSORS BASED ON DEEP LEARNING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: A method and system for three-dimensional reconstruction of material properties of a target using remotely located physical sensors is disclosed. The special technique disclosed here, enables an order of magnitude improvement in computational speed and memory requirements over current state-of-the-art artificial intelligence-based systems. When compared against state-of-the-art methods that do not use artificial intelligence, the improvement in accuracy and resolution enables deployment of order of magnitude cheaper data acquisition systems and/or provide the practical capability to image targets previously considered out-of-bounds. The use cases include but are not limited to oil field application systems such as the monitoring of pipeline health and integrity, leak, and spill extent delineation, seismic imaging systems, and for applications in agriculture, medical imaging, unexploded ordnance detection, mining, wind energy foundation studies, geotechnical work, groundwater systems, environmental science and engineering, and other problems where remote sensing-based image reconstruction is utilized/needed.

title: Liquid strain fermentation monitoring method based on multispectral diffuse reflection and edge calculation
abstract: The invention provides a liquid strain fermentation monitoring method based on multispectral diffuse reflection and edge calculation. The liquid strain fermentation monitoring method comprises the following steps: step 1, acquiring characteristic spectral information of key biological parameters in a liquid strain fermentation process; 2, a multispectral diffuse reflection imaging system is researched and developed according to characteristic spectral band information in the fermentation process; 3, constructing a lightweight target detection deep learning model capable of fusing multispectral data processing to facilitate embedded machine vision deployment; step 4, using a cascade calibration method to enable the visual model to identify and locate a fermentation window position, and then carrying out key target detection and analysis in the region of interest; and step 5, deploying the deep learning visual model to intelligent edge computing equipment, and processing the fermentation process atlas information in real time. According to the technical scheme, the embedded machine vision can be applied to the fermentation industrial field.

title: Orchard visual robot bionic multi-sensor plant disease detection method and device
applicants: FOSHAN ZHONGKE AGRICULTURAL ROBOT AND SMART AGRICULTURE INNOVATION RES INSTITUTE
abstract: The invention discloses an orchard visual robot bionic multi-sensor plant disease detection method and device, and the method comprises the following steps: 1, providing a bionic taste electronic nose sensor, learning the special smell of damaged leaves through AI, sensing the special smell of the damaged citrus leaves, and carrying out the modeling through deep learning YOLOv7; 2, classifying the acquired smell data, and recording and analyzing the smell data A; 3, a visual robot is adopted to find that the disease-damaged leaves become yellow or withered or have obvious characteristics through a visual system, an attention mechanism and YOLOv7 are utilized to carry out deep learning and modeling on the image, and normal plant leaf surfaces and disease-damaged plant leaf surfaces are classified; recording and analyzing the image data B; 4, contrastive analysis: comprehensively analyzing the electronic nose smell A data and the visual image B data to obtain an optimal analysis weight W and a detection result; 5, a bionic taste electronic nose device is adopted to approach the leaves for smell detection, and obtained data are transmitted to a robot industrial personal computer for processing; the same blade is detected through vision installed on a robot manipulator tail end mechanism, and data are obtained and then transmitted to robot industrial personal computer software to be analyzed; and 6, analyzing the data A and B by using an evidence theory, outputting a detection result of plant leaf disease damage, and carrying out early warning prompt.

title: Agricultural machinery automatic driving control method and system integrating wireless communication and artificial intelligence
applicants: BEIJING GAGO TIANDI TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to the field of artificial intelligence, and discloses an agricultural machinery automatic driving control method and system fusing wireless communication and artificial intelligence, which are used for realizing automatic driving control of agricultural machinery and improving the farming efficiency of the agricultural machinery. The method comprises the following steps: performing path planning on a target cultivation area to generate a first automatic driving path; performing a current round of cultivation operation through the target agricultural machine and collecting target environment parameters; inputting the target environment parameter into an environment parameter processing model for environment parameter signal conversion to obtain a coding environment parameter signal; the coding environment parameter signals are input into the initial path optimization model for network parameter optimization analysis, and a target path optimization model is obtained; performing path adjustment to obtain a second automatic driving path and generate a first path planning instruction set; if the current round of cultivation operation is executed, path operation conversion is carried out, and a second path planning instruction set is generated and combined to carry out the next round of cultivation operation.

title: AI prediction processing method and system applied to digital agriculture
applicants: JILIN BRANCH OF CHINA TOWER CO LTD
abstract: The invention provides an AI prediction processing method and system applied to digital agriculture, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. In the invention, according to sample agricultural product data, a candidate agricultural product prediction network is updated to form a target agricultural product prediction network; obtaining a target agricultural product growth record and a prediction target item; determining a corresponding target agricultural product data combination based on the target agricultural product growth record and the predicted target item; and through the target agricultural product prediction network, based on the target agricultural product data combination, performing prediction processing on the target agricultural product growth record, and outputting the reference agricultural product quality of the target agricultural product and the corresponding quality determination cause. Based on the above content, the problem that the prediction processing effect in digital agriculture is relatively poor can be improved to a certain extent.

title: Large-scale insect situation monitoring and recycling method and large-scale insect situation monitoring and recycling device
abstract: The invention relates to a large insect situation monitoring and recycling method which comprises the following steps in sequence: opening a black light insect attracting lamp tube and an upper bin door of a heating bin, and attracting insects to the heating bin; an upper bin door and a lower bin door of the heating bin are closed, heating insect killing work is executed, after insects are killed, the lower bin door is opened, and the heated and dried insects fall on a disc to be placed; the camera located right above the disc is used for photographing the insects on the disc; the shot photos are stored locally and uploaded to the cloud for identification, and the contents of the photos are identified in sequence through an image identification model based on deep learning; and the electric brush is started to sweep and recover the pests on the disc. The invention further discloses a large insect situation monitoring and recycling device. Based on hardware, software, electronics and a network, automatic and intelligent insect pest situation forecasting equipment is realized, and an insect pest situation monitoring function is provided for various fields such as agriculture and forestry; automation of software and hardware is realized, so that the work of the insect situation forecasting lamp is more efficient.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS OF URBAN ROOFTOP AGRICULTURE WITH SMART CITY DATA INTEGRATION
abstract: An IoT-enabled network of urban rooftop farms. Systems and methods include receiving image data; processing the image data with an artificial intelligence model; determining, based on the processing of the image data, a set of pixels of the image data meets one or more thresholds; and based on determining the set of pixels meets the one or more thresholds, recording the set of pixels as a viable agriculture space. Systems and methods also include receiving data from one or more sensors, wherein each of the one or more sensors is associated with an agriculture space; generating one or more metrics indicative of farming viability associated with the agriculture space based on the data received form the one or more sensors; and generating a user interface comprising the generated metrics.

title: ENHANCED MANAGEMENT ZONES FOR PRECISION AGRICULTURE
applicants: UNIV IOWA STATE RES FOUND INC [US]
abstract: The present invention is a system and method for agricultural management-zone delineation to be done over broad geographic extents without overly-localized field-specific data. The instant innovation guides precision agricultural sampling and management by delineating enhanced management zones based upon remote sensing and artificial intelligence and combining the two with data derived from an existing countrywide soil survey database. In an embodiment, the instant innovation uses artificial intelligence from multiple sources to provide granular zone detail. Output of the present innovation can be aggregated to produce management zone sizes that have a level of uncertainty compatible with the needs of the customer-fanner and implementable given the capabilities of available equipment.

title: Intelligent agricultural water and fertilizer integrated irrigation system
applicants: ANHUI WANXINDA NETWORK TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent agriculture, and discloses an intelligent agricultural water and fertilizer integrated irrigation system which comprises a data acquisition and processing module, an artificial intelligence and big data analysis module, a remote sensing technology module, a self-adaptive control system module, a water resource management module, a remote monitoring and automatic alarm module and a water saving technology module. S1, data acquisition and processing; s2, data analysis and model learning; s3, acquiring remote sensing data; s4, performing adaptive control; s5, water resource management; and S6, water resource management. Through real-time data acquisition, analysis and automatic control, a proper amount of water and nutrient supply to the farmland is ensured, the utilization efficiency of resources is improved to the maximum extent, resource waste is reduced, sustainable high-yield agricultural production is achieved, the system provides more accurate and intelligent decision support, and the system is worthy of popularization and application. The yield, the quality and the environmental friendliness of crops can be improved, and meanwhile, the manual labor and the production cost are reduced.

title: Vegetable seed intelligent identification method and system
applicants: VEGETABLE RES INSTITUTE OF GUANGDONG ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURE SCIENCES
abstract: The invention relates to an intelligent identification method and system for vegetable seeds, and belongs to the technical field of seed identification. A related feature training matrix is constructed, so that a vegetable seed defect identification model is constructed based on a deep learning network, and a singular value decomposition algorithm is introduced to process the related feature training matrix; the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a vegetable seed defect identification model, identifying defect information of vegetable seeds through the vegetable seed defect identification model, performing evaluation according to the defect information of the vegetable seeds to obtain an evaluation result, and generating related sowing suggestions based on the evaluation result. According to the method, the damage condition of the vegetable seeds is detected by fusing the hyperspectral technology, so that the abnormal seeds with flaws, damage and the like can be quickly classified, the abnormal seeds with flaws, damage and the like can be secondarily judged according to the biological structures of the vegetable seeds, and the seed classification precision can be improved.

title: Weed recognition method fusing deep learning and image processing
abstract: The invention discloses a weed recognition method fusing deep learning and image processing. The weed recognition method comprises the steps of collecting a field image; dividing the field image into a plurality of grid images; identifying the grid images through a classification neural network model, and marking each grid image as a crop or a background; color factors in image processing are used for conducting image segmentation, area filtering and connected region marking on green pixels in the two kinds of grid images, the number of connected regions of the two kinds of grid images is counted, and the weed distribution situation in the grid images is recognized through the number of the connected regions. According to the method, the neural network model only needs to pay attention to whether the crop exists in the image or not, the variety of the crop is single or limited, and the recognition result is not affected even if the weed variety which does not appear in the training set is encountered. Therefore, by means of the method, the complexity of weed recognition and the cost of training set image building can be effectively reduced, and the robustness and generalization ability of model recognition can be improved.

title: GGNN-GAN fused deep learning molecule generation system and method
abstract: The invention discloses a GGNN-GAN fused deep learning molecule generation system and method. The system comprises a data collection module, a preprocessing module and a molecule generation module, the data collection module is used for collecting molecular data of initial molecules, and the molecular data comprises chemical structures, activity and physical properties; the preprocessing module is used for encoding the molecular data to generate a corresponding feature matrix; and the molecule generation module is used for training a GGNN-GAN molecule generation model based on the characteristic matrix, and generating a new molecule structure by using the GGNN-GAN molecule generation model. Under the condition that the data volume is sufficient, the generated molecules are remarkably improved in the aspects of effectiveness, novelty and uniqueness, training is carried out under the condition that the data volume is small, data expansion can be carried out through the GAN, the problem that training is insufficient when the data volume of the molecules is small is solved, and the training efficiency is improved. Therefore, the generative model can generate new molecules with the same characteristics as the original data.

title: Intelligent seed high-speed optimization system based on deep learning
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of seed optimization, in particular to an intelligent seed high-speed optimization system based on deep learning, which comprises a vibration device, a seed screening device, a screening plate, an electric air pump, a control valve, an electric air pump nozzle and an image acquisition device, the image acquisition device is arranged above the belt conveying device, the image acquisition device is connected with the image processing system, the image processing system is connected with the control system, the control system is electrically connected with the seed screening device, and all the components are uniformly controlled and managed by arranging the control system. Normal operation of the whole intelligent seed sorting device is guaranteed, a control system is flexibly adjusted according to different seed characteristics and sorting requirements, the quality of the screened seeds and the screening precision are improved, the screening device cannot affect the quality of the seeds in the screening process, and nondestructive testing is guaranteed.

title: Multi-variety broad bean red spot disease condition artificial intelligence assessment method
applicants: NANJING INST AGRICULTURAL MECHANIZATION MINI AGRICULTURE & RURAL AFFAIRS
abstract: The invention provides a multi-variety broad bean red spot disease condition artificial intelligence assessment method. The method comprises the steps of remote sensing image acquisition, spectral index construction, red spot disease condition assessment and red spot disease condition updating. Wherein the spectral index construction comprises image preprocessing, single-pixel spectral index calculation and regional spectral index calculation. According to the method, based on the evaluation index of the single spectrum, the condition of the red spot disease of broad beans is evaluated and classified, so that the problems of limited disease monitoring precision, large error, low accuracy and the like of crops in hilly and mountainous areas by adopting a remote sensing monitoring technology can be effectively solved; therefore, effective technical support is provided for broad bean red spot disease resistant variety breeding and multi-variety mixed broad bean production in broken land parcels in hilly and mountainous areas.

title: Intelligent agricultural machine operation method and system based on space-based Internet of Things communication
abstract: The invention discloses an intelligent agricultural machine operation method based on space-based Internet of Things communication, and belongs to the field of intelligent agriculture, a comprehensive space information service technology, a space-based Internet of Things technology and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring agricultural machinery position information and agricultural machinery information; the agricultural machine information comprises agricultural machine state information and agricultural machine operation information; inputting the state information of the agricultural machinery and the operation information of the agricultural machinery into a pre-trained agricultural machinery operation identification model to obtain a fault identification result; and according to the fault identification result and the agricultural machine position information, performing fault repair. The invention further provides an intelligent agricultural machine operation system based on space-based Internet of Things communication. The agricultural machinery operation guidance and optimization can be completed on site, and the agricultural machinery operation efficiency is greatly improved.

title: Breeding sewage treatment equipment and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHENZHEN WANWUSHENG BIOLOGICAL AGRICULTURE TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract: The invention belongs to the field of sewage treatment, particularly relates to breeding sewage treatment equipment and method based on artificial intelligence, and aims to solve the problems that existing breeding sewage is mainly a mixture of excrement, urine and excrement of livestock and water, when the sewage is directly discharged and flows into a river channel, pungent stink is generated, and the sewage cannot be polluted. According to the technical scheme, the sewage treatment device comprises a sewage discharge mechanism, a sewage treatment mechanism, a sewage treatment mechanism, a sewage treatment mechanism, a sewage treatment mechanism, a sewage treatment mechanism, a sewage treatment mechanism and a sewage treatment mechanism, and the sewage treatment mechanism is arranged on a bottom plate; the stirring and drying mechanism is arranged on the bottom plate and is used for stirring and drying the solid excrement. According to the invention, the fecal sewage can be discharged after being settled and disinfected by the settling pond, so that dried fecal particles can be packaged and sold as organic fertilizer, the situation that pungent stink is generated and the environmental quality is greatly influenced when the sewage is directly discharged and flows into a river channel is avoided, and the use effect is improved.

title: Soil organic matter spatial distribution prediction method and system and electronic equipment
applicants: SDIC XINJIANG LUOBUPO POTASH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a soil organic matter spatial distribution prediction method and system and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of organic matter distribution prediction. According to the method, the importance degree of the soil environment factors is determined based on the soil generation principle and the random forest algorithm, the soil environment factors with the highest correlation degree with the soil organic matter are obtained through screening, then the land parcel boundary is extracted based on the deep learning model, and the soil organic matter content of each land parcel pattern spot is determined. Therefore, the spatial distribution of soil organic matters in the to-be-predicted area is accurately generated, the inversion precision is improved, and favorable support is provided for modernized agriculture.

title: Self-adaptive navigation line direction prediction method and device, storage medium and agricultural machine
applicants: WEICHAI LEIWO SMART AGRICULTURE TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an adaptive navigation line direction prediction method and device, a storage medium and an agricultural machine, and the method comprises the steps: combining an ultra-green algorithm of a conventional image processing method with a deep learning method, and segmenting a crop row in a crop row image through an image segmentation detection model; carrying out binarization and open operation processing on the segmented crop row image, and determining a central point set of a crop row navigation line through an adaptive central judgment point algorithm; and performing random sampling algorithm fitting on the central point set of the crop row navigation line to obtain a navigation line direction prediction curve. The robustness of the detection model and the detection precision of the model are improved under the condition that the data volume is limited; according to the method, perspective transformation of a traditional detection algorithm and setting of a region of interest (ROI) are completely abandoned, the accuracy of navigation line prediction is improved, the prediction mode is more standardized and automatic, and interference of personal errors is reduced.

title: Intelligent network connection controller applied to agricultural implement data acquisition
applicants: HARBIN INSTITUTE OF TECH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE RESEARCH INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses an intelligent network connection controller applied to agricultural implement data acquisition in the technical field of intelligent agriculture. Comprising a mounting shell, and an MCU, a log storage module, a parameter storage module, an RTC clock module, a transceiver module, a 485 half-duplex communication module, a UART serial data receiving end, a switching value control module, a high-power chopping control module, a power supply system, a local operation film key, a local display screen, a running state LED indicating lamp and a remote wireless module which are arranged on the inner side of the mounting shell, the local wireless Bluetooth module, the positioning module and the external interface meet various customization requirements by hooking different types of sensors and controllers, and the problems that agricultural operation equipment is low in universality, high in improvement cost and poor in adaptability are solved; and meanwhile, an artificial intelligence algorithm is utilized, domain knowledge and historical data are fused, human subjective factors are removed from agricultural production, and the method is more suitable for large-scale centralized operation of enterprises, governments and large-scale collaborations and facilitates management and scheduling.

title: Strawberry seedling stage vigorous growth situation monitoring method and system
abstract: The invention relates to a strawberry seedling stage vigorous growth situation monitoring method and system. The method comprises the following steps: S1, data acquisition; s2, establishing a strawberry growth model based on deep learning; s3, predicting a test set in the data set by using strawberry growth model parameters to obtain strawberry phenotype data of the current week; s4, calculating strawberry growth physiological parameters of the current week; and S5, establishing a strawberry vigorous growth evaluation model, and calculating the vigorous growth situation level of the strawberry seedlings. According to the method, phenotypic data, image data and farmland management data of strawberry seedlings in the past week are fused, environmental data from the past week to the current week are combined as input, and a strawberry growth model is established by using a deep learning model, so that phenotypic data of strawberries in the current week are obtained; the result and strawberry growth and development data of the current week establish a strawberry vigorous growth evaluation model, and finally the vigorous growth situation level of the strawberries of the current week is obtained.

title: Risk early warning system and method for landscape ecological protection based on artificial intelligence
abstract: The invention discloses a risk early warning system and method for landscape ecological protection based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of ecological risk prevention. According to the method, the landscape type space transfer matrix of the research area is obtained through the historical change trend of agriculture and forestry landscapes, and the interconversion characteristics of the agriculture and forestry landscapes and other landscape types are revealed; the agriculture and forestry landscape ecological system service evaluation is carried out based on multi-model coupling, the agriculture and forestry ecological system service quality is measured and calculated, future agriculture and forestry landscape prediction is carried out based on ecological system service protection scenes, and agriculture and forestry landscape change early warning areas under different ecological system service protection scenes are obtained. And identifying a unit with relatively high potential ecological risk of the agriculture and forestry landscape under the optimal scene as an early warning area, and proposing an agriculture and forestry landscape ecological risk zoning treatment mode. The agriculture and forestry landscape ecological risk early warning technology is constructed from the perspective of ecological system service protection, a scene setting framework is constructed, and green, high-quality and sustainable development of agriculture is promoted.

title: Controllable agricultural cultivation management system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANGHAI HUAWEI CONTROLLED AGRICULTURAL TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a controllable agricultural cultivation management system and method based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of controllable agriculture, and the method comprises the steps: S1, analyzing the market demand condition of crops according to sales historical data, and obtaining the crop demand changing with time; s2, according to the obtained market demand data, in combination with the available planting area of the user, planning and analyzing the crop planting condition; s3, monitoring the cultivation and growth process of the crops, judging whether the growth condition of the crops accords with a preset plan or not, and performing early warning on the deviation data; s4, performing work arrangement analysis on picking work and transportation work in combination with time conditions according to the actual ripening condition of the cultivated crops; the method helps farmers to know market demands, carries out directional crop cultivation in combination with sales conditions, effectively provides reference suggestions of cultivation management for the farmers, and facilitates detailed management and decision making of the farmers.

title: Soil fertility evaluation and fertilization suggestion system and method based on deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a soil fertility evaluation and fertilization suggestion system and method based on deep learning, and the system comprises a data collection and preprocessing module, a deep learning module, a soil fertility evaluation and fertilization suggestion module, and a real-time monitoring and adjustment module. The system has real-time monitoring and adjusting functions, can perform timely adjustment according to the change of the soil fertility, keeps the stability and continuity of the fertilization effect, utilizes a deep learning algorithm to replace the existing subjective experience method, collects soil samples and obtains personalized fertilization suggestions, improves the accuracy and precision of fertilization evaluation, and has good application prospects. The method can be applied to various crops in agricultural production, provides accurate soil fertility evaluation and personalized fertilization suggestions for farmers, improves the yield and quality of the crops, and provides basic support for large-scale and industrial development of agriculture.

title: Insect image recognition method based on joint adversarial transfer learning
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a pest image recognition method based on joint adversarial transfer learning, and the method comprises the following steps: S1, carrying out the stylization processing of an open-source agriculture and forestry pest data set, and forming a transfer learning data set; s2, the training field-test field comprises all combinations of a source field, a style field and a blank field; s3, introducing a central perception constraint into the domain adversarial neural network; and S4, introducing a related alignment constraint into the final full connection layer of the tag identifier. According to the pest image classification algorithm method combined with the adversarial transfer learning, the problem of influence of negative transfer on pest classification accuracy can be well solved, and effective identification of agricultural and forestry pests is further realized.

title: Positioning method and mapping method for orchard mobile robot and electronic equipment
applicants: FACILITY AGRICULTURE RES INSTITUTE GUANGDONG ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURAL SCIENCES
abstract: The invention provides a positioning method, a mapping method and electronic equipment for an orchard mobile robot, relates to the field of orchard positioning and mapping, is used for positioning the mobile robot in the orchard, and comprises the following steps: S101, forming input information; s102, forming fusion information; s103, extracting a beacon and the confidence coefficient of the beacon; and S104, obtaining positioning information. The visual information, the distance information, the trunk position and the ground information are used as input information, the mobile robot is positioned through the constructed preset map through the deep learning model and the confidence coefficient to obtain the positioning information, and the defects that in an unstructured orchard, feature extraction is greatly influenced by gradient and shielding, features are not significant and unstable, and the accuracy of feature extraction is poor are overcome. The unstructured environment positioning precision is low; and the environment change resistance is weak.

title: Cage rearing broiler chicken state detection and counting system based on deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a caged broiler chicken state detection and counting system based on deep learning, and belongs to the field of intelligent agriculture. By collecting and marking images of caged broiler chickens in different states, a caged broiler chicken state data set is established; replacing a YOLOv5s backbone network with an OfficientNetV2 structure, introducing a depth separable convolution and attention mechanism, optimizing an image post-processing process NMS algorithm, and constructing a high-precision lightweight YOLOv5s network as a cage rearing broiler chicken state detection network; modifying training parameters for network training to obtain an optimal state detection network model, and finishing counting in combination with target tracking; deploying the model on an embedded platform of the inspection robot to realize real-time state detection and counting; and the inspection robot is connected with the user side to realize real-time monitoring. The system is reasonable in design, the state detection and counting of the caged broiler chickens can be realized by remotely controlling the inspection robot, the image data is transmitted to the user side through WiFi, and a user can monitor the state and the number of the caged broiler chickens at any time and adjust the breeding management strategy in time.

title: Portable crop comprehensive data analyzer
applicants: HARBIN INSTITUTE OF TECH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses a portable crop comprehensive data analyzer, which belongs to the technical field of agriculture, and comprises a triangular support frame, the top end of the triangular support frame is fixedly connected with an assembly top plate, the top end of the assembly top plate is provided with a comprehensive data analyzer shell, and the outer side wall of the comprehensive data analyzer shell is fixedly connected with an external connection plate. A plurality of sensor interfaces are fixedly connected to the external connection plate at equal intervals, sensors with connectors are electrically inserted into the sensor interfaces, and an instrument Bluetooth device, an instrument memory, a first programmable controller and a storage battery are fixedly connected to the interior of the comprehensive data analyzer shell in sequence; the top end of the triangular support frame is fixedly connected with an instrument touch control screen; according to the utility model, the problems of large volume and large occupied area of the traditional weather station and farmland sensing and monitoring station are solved, and the construction cost is greatly reduced.

title: Intelligent monitoring anti-theft device
abstract: The invention relates to an intelligent monitoring anti-theft device, in particular to the technical field of intelligent agriculture in the modern agricultural industry. According to the device, a 360-degree radar combination, an unmanned aerial vehicle and a cloud platform are combined for use, the 360-degree radar combination is used for detecting the position, movement speed and intensity of an invasion target, and an unmanned aerial vehicle nest controls the unmanned aerial vehicle to track and image the invasion target according to the position of the invasion target to obtain a picture; and the cloud platform obtains a motion trail diagram and a reflection intensity diagram according to the motion speed and intensity of the intrusion target, obtains an identification result of the intrusion target by using a deep learning method according to the motion trail diagram, the reflection intensity diagram and the picture, and determines whether to start an alarm device according to the identification result. According to the invention, automatic alarm can be realized and artificial route planning is not needed.

title: Tomato plug seedling grading detection and data transmission method based on deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a tomato plug seedling grading detection and data transmission method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: selecting a strong seedling index, and obtaining a grading critical value of strong seedlings and weak seedlings; constructing a strong seedling and weak seedling detection data set; an SO-YOLOv7 target detection model is constructed, and the model is trained; detecting front view and top view images of the plug seedlings to obtain leaf area and plant height information; performing strong seedling index operation, and judging the strong and weak grade of the plug seedlings; and sending the strong and weak information of the plug seedlings to a programmable controller to realize the sorting of the strong and weak seedlings. According to the tomato plug seedling grading detection and data transmission method based on deep learning, leaf interference can be effectively avoided, and the method has high model feature extraction capacity and complex visual information capturing capacity; complete information of a target can be obtained, the quality grade of the plug seedling is judged from the perspective of seedling growth and development, the detection accuracy is higher, and judgment is more objective; and technical support can be provided for subsequent automatic sorting.

title: PROCESSING IMAGES OF WIND FARMS AND PLANT FARMS CAPTURED BY A DRONE
abstract: An artificial intelligence (AI) ensemble engine analyzes a set of images that include a wind turbine and a region of a plant farm to identify potential problem areas in the wind turbine and the plant farm. The AI ensemble engine also analyzes the potential problem areas of the wind turbine and the plant farm to determine whether maintenance is warranted for the potential problem areas to provide a list of problem areas. A notification manager determines whether each problem area in the list of problem areas is related to a wind turbine or agriculture and generates a notification based on the determination.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR CLASSIFICATION OF CROPS USING MULTI-CLASS MACHINE LEARNINGG TECHNIQUES
abstract: The invention relates to an agricultural analytics platform that enables farmers, agriculturists and decision makers to classify crops and invasive species using multiclass machine learning technique. The agricultural analytics platform uses data assimilation techniques to understand the changing landscape of agriculture. The invention discloses an improved set of layered solutions which help in estimating crop yields and provide insights for generating maximum output. Advanced Artificial Intelligence (AI) algorithms and statistical analyses are used to provide solutions for agricultural problems such as crop rotation, crop selection, crop yield, etc.

title: Garlic digging resistance and damage rate prediction system and method and storage medium
abstract: The invention provides a garlic digging resistance and damage rate prediction system and method and a storage medium, and belongs to the crossing field of agricultural mechanized harvesting and artificial intelligence. According to the method, the garlic digging resistance and the damage rate are accurately predicted by constructing the garlic digging resistance prediction model and the garlic damage prediction model; the garlic digging resistance prediction model is a model obtained after three stages of coordinated training of environment-agriculture data, soil-digging shovel interaction data and soil-digging shovel-garlic interaction data and online learning. The garlic damage prediction model is a model obtained after coordinated training of damage performance evaluation data and damage probability evaluation data. The problem of contradiction between the digging resistance and the garlic damage rate in the current mechanical garlic harvesting technology is solved, the digging resistance and the garlic damage rate in the mechanical garlic harvesting process can be effectively reduced, and the method has guiding significance for low-resistance and low-loss intelligent garlic harvesting research.

title: Intelligent unmanned aerial vehicle inspection system for diseases and insect pests of agriculture and forestry
abstract: The invention provides an intelligent unmanned aerial vehicle inspection system for agriculture and forestry diseases and insect pests, and relates to the technical field of unmanned aerial vehicle inspection, the intelligent unmanned aerial vehicle inspection system comprises an intelligent unmanned aerial vehicle, a display module and a remote processing host, image feature information is displayed through the display module, and an inspection object shot by an inspection module is analyzed and processed through an image analysis module; the proportions of different colors of the fruit tree leaves are extracted to obtain the coverage degrees of the fruit tree leaves with different characteristics, and the coverage degrees are combined with the generative AI to deeply analyze the types and degrees of diseases and pests, so that accurate and professional measures and suggestions are provided for users in a system interface; the intelligent unmanned aerial vehicle of the system has a high-precision image recognition capability, a preset cruise route and an accurate navigation positioning function, the system can combine the unmanned aerial vehicle with a remote management system with powerful functions, the occurrence condition of plant diseases and insect pests of crops can be known without going out, and the generation type AI of the system can be used for deep learning and training in a general level and an expert level; and the early warning and prevention capabilities of the system are continuously improved.

title: Deep learning-based tomato disease and insect pest real-time detection method and system, computer and storage medium
abstract: The invention discloses a tomato disease and insect pest real-time detection method and system based on deep learning, a computer and a storage medium, and relates to the field of deep learning intelligent agriculture. The problem that a traditional machine vision method is poor in robustness in a complex scene and difficult to meet working requirements in the complex scene is solved. The detection method comprises the following steps: acquiring a tomato leaf surface image by using a camera; according to the collected tomato leaf surface image, marking the category and position of diseases and pests; performing data enhancement processing according to the marked disease and insect pest categories and positions, and obtaining processed disease and insect pest data information; constructing a tomato disease and insect pest detection model according to the processed disease and insect pest data information; and performing tomato leaf surface image detection according to the tomato disease and insect pest detection model to obtain a detection result. The method is applied to the field of tomato disease and pest detection.

title: Agricultural pest image recognition method based on convolutional neural network
applicants: CAS HEFEI SMART AGRICULTURE COLLABORATIVE INNOVATION RES INSTITUTE
abstract: The invention relates to an agricultural pest image recognition method based on a convolutional neural network. The method comprises the following steps: collecting crop pest images by using a camera; screening the collected crop pest images according to screening conditions; marking the screened crop pest images, and forming a data set by the marked crop pest images; establishing a pest identification model; and training a pest recognition model by adopting the training set to obtain a trained pest recognition model, and inputting a to-be-recognized pest image into the trained pest recognition model to obtain a recognition result. A convolutional neural network in a deep learning technology is applied to agricultural crop region extraction, the network is trained by using a collected agricultural crop image set, and finally the network can automatically identify the number and type of agricultural crop diseases and insect pests; according to the method, the detection and recognition rate of agricultural crop targets is increased, the recognition speed is high, feature learning of diseases and pests can be carried out in a complex environment, and the robustness of a disease and pest recognition model is enhanced.

title: Generation method of crop production process traceability archive based on artificial intelligence
applicants: INST OF AGRICULTURAL ECONOMICS AND INFORMATION HENAN ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURAL SCIENCES
abstract: The invention discloses a crop production process traceability archive generation method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the steps of 1, obtaining a monitoring real-time image, 2, obtaining a posture estimation parameter through an image data MediaPipe model, 3, preprocessing and standardizing the parameter through MEAN/STD, 4, inputting an LSTM model, and 5, obtaining a classification result. The file generation step comprises the steps of 1, obtaining a monitoring real-time image, 2, obtaining a posture estimation parameter through an image data MediaPipe model, 3, preprocessing and standardizing the parameter through MEAN/STD, 4, inputting an LSTM model, and 5, obtaining a classification result. According to the method, the farmland monitoring image is used as input, the crop growth process farming operation behavior is obtained through the improved MediaPipe posture estimation model and the LSTM algorithm and recorded into the crop production traceability archive, manual operation is reduced, and the authenticity and credibility of the traceability archive are improved.

title: Agricultural inspection robot based on artificial intelligence technology
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of agricultural inspection, and particularly discloses an agricultural inspection robot based on an artificial intelligence technology. The invention discloses an agricultural inspection robot based on an artificial intelligence technology, and the robot comprises a basic mobile inspection unit which is used for carrying out the basic mobile inspection; an edge data receiving unit; the edge moving inspection unit is used for carrying out edge moving inspection; an edge inspection transmission unit; and an inspection comprehensive recording unit. In a basic mobile inspection process, edge analysis data of a current inspection point can be received, a mobile inspection route can be planned, edge mobile inspection can be performed, edge inspection data can be acquired and transmitted to the current inspection point, and a movable inspection robot can be effectively associated with a fixed key inspection point; therefore, the mobile inspection areas of different key inspection points are determined, targeted edge mobile inspection is carried out, edge analysis data are supplemented, and the data obtained through inspection can truly and effectively reflect the real state of agriculture.

title: Artificial intelligence image recognition crop growth analysis method for digital agriculture
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence image identification crop growth analysis method for digital agriculture, and the method is characterized in that the method comprises the following steps: S1, data collection; crop photos or videos in different time periods are obtained in a photographing or camera shooting mode, and meanwhile collection time, places and meteorological factor data are recorded; s2, data preprocessing; according to the method, the collected images or videos are subjected to denoising, image enhancement and other processing, the image quality is improved, meanwhile, the images are labeled, and the type, position and growth state information of crops is labeled. The invention relates to the field of digital agriculture, in particular to an artificial intelligence image recognition crop growth analysis method for digital agriculture. The technical problem to be solved by the invention is to provide an artificial intelligence image recognition crop growth analysis method for digital agriculture, which is convenient for agricultural digitization.

title: Air quality evaluation method based on combination of intelligent Internet of Things and deep learning
applicants: JILIN ZHONGNONG SUNSHINE DATA CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an air quality evaluation method and system based on the combination of intelligent Internet of Things and deep learning, and belongs to the technical field of rural agriculture, environment, intelligent Internet of Things and artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: arranging a plurality of sensor nodes to collect pollution factors and the like as monitoring data, and solving an air index score value of any node position; processing the air index score value of any node position by adopting a collaborative Kriging interpolation calculation method to obtain a predicted air quality index of an unknown node position, arranging a plurality of sensor nodes according to the predicted air quality index, and obtaining an actual air quality index of the unknown node position to construct a training set; and training the deep learning-based recurrent neural network model by using the training set, inputting the predicted air quality index of the unknown node position to be corrected into the trained model, obtaining the actual air quality index of the unknown node position, and generating an air quality report. According to the method, the precision of air quality evaluation is improved in terms of time and space density.

title: Artificial intelligence image recognition crop growth analysis algorithm for digital agriculture
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence image recognition crop growth analysis algorithm for digital agriculture, which relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and is characterized by at least comprising the following steps: (1) cutting a ground image aerial-photographed by an unmanned aerial vehicle into small blocks as input images; (2) carrying out data enhancement on the input image, wherein the data enhancement comprises operations such as rotation, color jitter, overturning, zooming, blurring and the like; (3) performing crop classification on the input image by using a recurrent neural network (RNN) algorithm, and outputting category probability distribution of each pixel point; and (4) an average intersection-to-union ratio (Mean Intersection-to-union) is used as an evaluation standard, and the accuracy and the recall rate of each category are calculated. According to the method, the ground images aerial-photographed by the unmanned aerial vehicle are utilized, functions of crop classification, growth vigor index and yield prediction and the like are realized through a deep learning method, and intelligent auxiliary decision making is provided for agricultural production.

title: Method and device for determining scalping suspicion degree, equipment and medium
abstract: The invention provides a click farming suspicion degree determination method and device, equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of big data and artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining industry index values used for evaluating n parameters of a shop owner, and n is a positive integer; according to the industry index values of the n parameters, n first deviation rates of the n parameters of the to-be-detected shop relative to the corresponding industry index values and n second deviation rates of the n parameters of m reference shops relative to the corresponding industry index values are obtained, the reference shops are the same industry shops confirmed to have the click farming behavior, and m is a positive integer; performing correlation calculation based on the n first deviation rates and the n second deviation rates of each reference store to obtain m correlation coefficients; and based on the m correlation coefficients, determining the click farming suspicion degree of the to-be-detected shop. According to the mode, the accuracy of determining the click farming suspicion degree of the to-be-detected shop owner can be improved.

title: Agricultural planting system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHEJIANG NIANNIANFA AGRICULTURAL DEV CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent agriculture, in particular to an agricultural planting system and method based on artificial intelligence, and the system comprises an intelligent user terminal which is used for obtaining a first planting array, and an intelligent farmland monitoring terminal which is used for obtaining image data, soil humidity, air humidity, soil PH value and illumination intensity, and the intelligent plan determining terminal is used for determining a final planting array according to the geographic parameter scores and the environmental parameter scores, and the intelligent farmland equipment dispatching terminal is used for seeding the unmanned aerial vehicle group carrying crop seeds selected from the final planting array, intelligently calculating the irrigation water quantity and performing irrigation. According to the invention, crops suitable for planting can be intelligently, effectively and intelligently selected according to the environment of the farmland according to the geographic information and the environment information of the farmland, so that the problems of blind planting and low intelligence in the planting process in the prior art are solved.

title: PRECISION AGRICULTURE KIT
abstract: The present invention relates to a precision agriculture kit that automates pest detection and counting on the field and enables on-site detection and counting of pests with wireless IoT devices and artificial intelligence supported embedded cameras.

title: Simple charging and discharging capacitance measuring method and system based on artificial intelligence algorithm
applicants: XINJIANG HAILI AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY SOFTWARE CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a simple charging and discharging capacitance measurement method based on an artificial intelligence algorithm. The method comprises the following steps: constructing an RC differential to-be-measured circuit; adopting an artificial intelligence algorithm to positively generate a first random voltage control sequence; using a first random voltage control sequence to charge and discharge the capacitor to be measured from zero potential to white noise; reversely generating a second random voltage control sequence by adopting an artificial intelligence algorithm; a second random voltage control sequence is used for charging and discharging from white noise to zero potential; repeated noise charging and discharging processes are cyclically generated, a voltage difference is generated at the two ends of the capacitor to be measured, and the sum of the voltage difference and the measured output voltage is equal to the input total voltage; fitting a change coefficient of the total charge amount according to the first random voltage control sequence and the second random voltage control sequence; and fitting a capacitance value to be measured by using the output voltage sequence, the first random voltage control sequence, the second random voltage control sequence and the charge total amount change coefficient. According to the method, interference of stray capacitance on measurement is reduced, and capacitance measurement precision is improved.

title: Target picking method based on picking robot visual system
applicants: CAS HEFEI SMART AGRICULTURE COLLABORATIVE INNOVATION RES INSTITUTE
abstract: The invention relates to a target picking method based on a picking robot vision system. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an original fruit image by using a camera; the collected original fruit images are preprocessed, the preprocessed fruit images form a data set, and the data set is divided into a training set, a verification set and a test set; a Mask R-CNN model is established, and training is carried out; the training process is optimized, and a Mask R-CNN model with the highest training precision is obtained; the Mask R-CNN model with the highest training precision is loaded on a CPU of the picking robot, and finally target recognition picking is achieved based on a visual system of the picking robot. According to the method, the high-pixel camera is used for acquiring the ripe fruit image, the deep learning technology is applied to intelligent fruit picking, the network structure is adjusted according to the actual use scene, the Mask R-CNN model is trained, finally, the Mask R-CNN model can automatically detect the ripe fruit, intelligent picking is achieved, and the fruit picking efficiency is improved. The problem that the picking robot cannot well recognize and extract fruits and vegetables due to the complex surrounding environment is solved.

title: Intelligent identification method for head and back areas of laying hens
abstract: The invention relates to a laying hen head and back area intelligent identification method comprising the following steps: establishing a laying hen area identification data set, and preprocessing the data set; dividing the preprocessed data set into a training set, a verification set and a test set; and training the training set based on a deep learning YOLOX target detection model, learning head and back area features of the laying hen, obtaining a head and back area identification model of the laying hen, and identifying the head and back areas of the laying hen through the head and back area identification model of the laying hen. The method has general adaptation, the model has certain robustness, the whole process does not need manual feature extraction, and automatic identification of the head and back areas of the laying hens can be realized only by putting the data set into the model.

title: COMPUTER SIMULATION OF CROPS BASED ON AGRICULTURE INFLUENCING FACTORS
abstract: Computer technology that delivers simulation of crop growth, with the simulation accounting for various “influencing factors.” Artificial intelligence type software makes various recommendations to the farmers growing the agricultural crops. Some embodiments are directed to forestry and/or livestock instead of crops. Some embodiments include simulation of damaging natural forces within computer simulations of forestry and/or agriculture.

title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR GENERATING CREDIT RATING OF AGRICULTURAL SPECIALIZED SERVICE PROVIDER
applicants: INFORMATION TECH RESEARCH CENTER BEIJING ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY SCIENCES [CN]
abstract: The present invention provides a method and system for generating a credit rating of an agricultural specialized service provider. The method includes: selecting an agricultural specialized service provider credit evaluation index set through big data analysis, and acquiring index values of all agricultural specialized service providers from each historical time to the current time; respectively inputting the index values of each service subject at all times into a preset deep learning credit classification model, and outputting the credit category of each service subject at each time; determining a comprehensive credit rating of each service subject according to the credit categories of each service subject at all historical times and the current time; and visually displaying the credit rating of the service subject and a change process. According to the method; the credit ratings of the agricultural specialized service provider are classified by using a deep learning technology; so that a credit rating result can reflect the credit conditions of the agricultural specialized service provider more objectively and accurately; which helps to improve the scientific and intelligent level of credit rating of the agricultural specialized service provider.

title: Intelligent laser weeding device and method based on machine vision
abstract: The invention discloses an intelligent laser weeding device based on machine vision and a weeding method. The weeding device comprises a supporting auxiliary unit, a weed recognition unit and a weed removing unit. Through organic combination of deep learning, a binocular stereoscopic vision technology and a laser technology, laser weeding equipment based on deep learning and binocular stereoscopic vision is formed, and accurate positioning of a weed center point and length and width measurement of a weed bounding box are completed by using a high-performance camera and an embedded artificial intelligence super computing platform. And a laser galvanometer is adopted to scan and remove a weed area. Precise weeding operation in the crop planting seedling stage can be achieved, meanwhile, the influence of weeding operation on crop seedlings is reduced as much as possible, the planting efficiency is improved, and the yield is effectively increased; meanwhile, the use amount of chemical herbicides is greatly reduced, and the development of green agriculture is effectively promoted.

title: Fire early warning and supervising system for agriculture and forestry areas based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHEJIANG FOREST RESOURCES MONITORING CENTER ZHEJIANG FORESTRY INVESTIG PLANNING AND DESIGN INSTITUTE
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of agriculture and forestry fire early warning and supervision, in particular to an agriculture and forestry area fire early warning and supervision system based on artificial intelligence, which comprises a control end and a monitoring end, a central control supervision platform, an environment evaluation analysis unit, an operation fault risk unit and a self-inspection verification unit are arranged in the monitoring end; the agriculture and forestry area is divided into area blocks, the monitoring range is narrowed, the fire early warning information collection comprehensiveness of the agriculture and forestry area is improved, the timeliness of fire early warning is improved through a real-time supervision mode, meanwhile, the collection points are supervised, and the monitoring efficiency is improved. And combined analysis is carried out from the two aspects of internal cause information and external cause information, so that abnormal acquisition points can be overhauled in time, the accuracy of data acquisition of the acquisition points is improved, the influence risk condition caused by early warning extension is known, and adjustment of a coping scheme can be made in time according to the early warning delay condition.

title: Walnut anthracnose prediction method and system based on deep learning, and storage medium
