abstract: The invention provides a walnut anthracnose prediction method and system based on deep learning and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: randomly obtaining walnut spore quantity samples under various meteorological factors, carrying out the preprocessing of the samples, and dividing the preprocessed walnut spore quantity samples into a training set and a test set according to a preset proportion; constructing an SVM model, performing parameter optimization on the SVM model by adopting a PSO optimization algorithm, and performing model training on the optimized SVM model through the training set to obtain a final SVM model; and performing walnut anthracnose prediction on the test set according to the final SVM model, and outputting a prediction result. According to the method, walnut anthracnose prediction is carried out by using the correlation between the meteorological factors and the walnut spore quantity, establishment and improvement of walnut anthracnose big data are promoted, the spore quantity can be controlled by monitoring the meteorological environment in the later period, and a basis is provided for automatic prevention and control of walnut anthracnose in advance.

title: Optimal allocation method for water resources in changing environment
abstract: The invention discloses a water resource optimal configuration method in a changing environment, which is applied to the field of intelligent agriculture and comprises the following steps: taking economic benefit maximization as a target, introducing water supply and water demand constraints, constructing a water resource optimization model, and combining a nonlinear programming method and a genetic algorithm to solve a water resource optimal configuration decision scheme of a determined condition; performing space-time sequence segmentation on the time sequence data over the years, and constructing a CNN-LSTM prediction regression model; generating a multi-angle scene by using a stochastic simulation method, floating decision schemes to generate a decision scheme set, inputting calculation parameters of the multi-angle scene and the decision scheme set to the prediction regression model to obtain an optimized target value, and performing clustering analysis on the decision scheme set to obtain an optimal decision scheme. According to the method, the random simulation method is used for reflecting the influence of multiple uncertain information, an efficient calculation unit capable of being fused with the random simulation technology is formed based on deep learning, and the water resource optimal configuration problem of multiple uncertain factors in the changing environment is solved.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ASSESSING PIXELS OF SATELLITE IMAGES OF AGRICULTURE LAND PARCEL USING AI
abstract: A system and method for assessing categorized pixels of satellite images associated with agriculture land parcel using an artificial intelligence (AI) model (108) are provided. The method includes, (i) obtaining satellite images associated with agriculture land parcel; (ii) pre-processing the satellite images to generate pre-processed satellite images, (iii) training the AI model by categorizing historical plurality of pixels from historical plurality of satellite images based on historical satellite data and correlating historical scores to historical categorized pixels to obtain trained AI model, (iv) classifying pixels of pre-processed satellite images into crop area-pixels and non-crop area pixels by determining a profile of time series data that corresponds to at least one of normalized difference vegetation index, normalized difference water index, land surface temperature, modified normalized difference water index, or land surface water index, (v) determining, using trained AI model, categorized pixels based on classification, (vi) assessing categorized pixels with a score.

title: Wheat lodging area estimation method based on unmanned aerial vehicle image and deep learning
applicants: CAS HEFEI SMART AGRICULTURE COLLABORATIVE INNOVATION RES INSTITUTE
abstract: The invention relates to a wheat lodging area estimation method based on an unmanned aerial vehicle image and deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: collecting a wheat field image through an unmanned aerial vehicle; performing preprocessing and data enhancement; constructing a deep learning model, improving a Mask R-CNN model, performing evaluation by adopting evaluation indexes, and adjusting training parameters; inputting a to-be-evaluated wheat field image into the optimal Mask R-CNN model, wherein the optimal Mask R-CNN model outputs the number of lodging pixel points of wheat; and based on the number of the pixel points of wheat lodging and the actual area represented by a single pixel calculated by the calibration area, obtaining an estimation result of the actual area of wheat lodging. According to the method, the wheat lodging region is accurately identified and segmented, and the number of the pixel points of the lodging region is calculated, so that the area of the wheat lodging region is calculated, the disaster degree is evaluated, the high-throughput operation requirement in a wheat field environment can be met, and technical support is provided for subsequent disaster situation processing and loss evaluation.

title: Corn field multi-type weed real-time identification algorithm based on Kalman filtering and deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a corn field multi-type weed real-time identification algorithm based on Kalman filtering and deep learning, and belongs to the field of deep learning and precision agriculture. In a seedling grass identification process, Kalman filtering and an IOU matching technology are fused to form a stable tracking algorithm, and a color segmentation technology and morphological analysis processing are combined to realize identification of weeds with multiple types and multiple feature exposure degrees. The recognition rate of corn seedlings and weeds through an artificial intelligence algorithm is greatly improved, and a foundation is laid for precision agriculture.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR ASSESSING PIXELS OF SATELLITE IMAGES OF AGRICULTURE LAND PARCEL USING AI
abstract: A system and method for assessing categorized pixels of satellite images associated with agriculture land parcel using an artificial intelligence (AI) model are provided. The method includes, (i) obtaining satellite images associated with agriculture land parcel; (ii) pre-processing the satellite images to generate pre-processed satellite images, (iii) training the AI model by categorizing historical plurality of pixels from historical plurality of satellite images based on historical satellite data and correlating historical scores to historical categorized pixels to obtain trained AI model, (iv) classifying pixels of pre-processed satellite images into crop area-pixels and non-crop area pixels by determining a profile of time series data that corresponds to at least one of normalized difference vegetation index, normalized difference water index, land surface temperature, modified normalized difference water index, or land surface water index, (v) determining, using trained AI model, categorized pixels based on classification, (vi) assessing categorized pixels with a score.

title: Systems and methods of urban rooftop agriculture with smart city data integration
abstract: An IoT-enabled network of urban rooftop farms. Systems and methods include receiving image data; processing the image data with an artificial intelligence model; determining, based on the processing of the image data, a set of pixels of the image data meets one or more thresholds; and based on determining the set of pixels meets the one or more thresholds, recording the set of pixels as a viable agriculture space. Systems and methods also include receiving data from one or more sensors, wherein each of the one or more sensors is associated with an agriculture space; generating one or more metrics indicative of farming viability associated with the agriculture space based on the data received form the one or more sensors; and generating a user interface comprising the generated metrics.

title: NEW DROPLET MICRO-TO-MILLI-FLUIDICS-BASED PROCESS TO SCREEN FOR PHENOTYPES OR BIOLOGICAL PROCESSES
applicants: INSTITUT NATIONAL DE RECH POUR LAGRICULTURE LALIMENTATION ET LENVIRONNEMENT [FR]
INSTITUT NAT DES SCIENCES APPLIQUEES DE TOULOUSE [FR]
abstract: The present invention concerns a method of screening of at least one phenotype or biological process, for example, self-replicating ability of microbial cells, in a high throughput droplet micro-to milli-fluidic system, based on the use of a photoconvertible or a photoactivable fluorescent protein and artificial intelligence to allow automated imaging and selection.

title: Tobacco smoldering monitoring method based on binocular vision sensing
applicants: FOSHAN ZHONGKE AGRICULTURAL ROBOT AND SMART AGRICULTURE INNOVATION RES INSTITUTE
abstract: A tobacco smoldering monitoring method based on binocular vision sensing comprises the following steps that firstly, a smoldering experiment is conducted through vision to obtain a large amount of data of smoke images of a large amount of small targets such as tobacco leaves and tobacco shreds in a warehouse and black edge image data of objects after smoldering; 2, respectively constructing smoldering smoke and post-smoldering object edge deep learning networks suitable for early-stage small targets, and establishing an attention mechanism-based improved YOLOV7 deep learning network model; 3, recognizing object features after smoldering by using the improved YOLOV7, carrying out rough classification recognition, and processing in combination with a color image; 4, through an optimized smoldering recognition image algorithm, obtaining a smoldering occurrence probability; 5, determining the three-dimensional positions of smoldering smoke and aftershaded objects; positioning a shade space position through binocular vision to obtain a shade position and a shade area; and 6, big data of the CO concentration is obtained through real-time monitoring of the CO concentration, and smoldering data identification and the occurrence probability of the smoldering data are carried out through a network YOLOV7 so as to judge whether the smoldering state exists or not.

title: Seedling water and fertilizer management method and system, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT TECH RESEARCH CENTER BEIJING ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY SCIENCES
abstract: The invention provides a seedling water and fertilizer management method and system, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of agricultural information, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining leaf association data before a preset growth period, and determining seedling growth prediction information based on the leaf association information; acquiring a leaf image set before the preset growth period, and determining a seedling growth period by using the leaf image set and the seedling growth prediction information; and acquiring seedling growth environment data, and determining the irrigation and fertilization amount of the seedlings in combination with the seedling growth environment data and the seedling growth period. The multi-source information fusion technology and the artificial intelligence algorithm are utilized to realize real-time monitoring and feedback of seedling growth, and a fertilization and irrigation management system is further formulated according to the current leaf number and the actual crop growth environment, so that a manager can further analyze crop water consumption rules and emergence rate influence factors, and the management efficiency is improved. And the possibility is provided for exploring a higher-quality and higher-efficiency control strategy.

title: Automatic light following control cultivation system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANGHAI HUAWEI KEKONG AGRICULTURAL TECH GROUP CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of agriculture, in particular to an automatic light following control cultivation system and method based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a cultivated crop health state monitoring module, a cultivation groove position adjusting module, a cultivated crop illuminance correction module and a cultivated crop illuminance calibration module, and the cultivated crop illuminance correction module is used for analyzing the illuminance absorption condition of each cultivated crop during the daytime. The healthy growth state value of the corresponding cultivated crop in the database is updated in real time; the position of the cultivation groove can be adjusted in real time according to the change of the illumination area by the cultivated crops, so that the space utilization rate is improved, meanwhile, the cultivated crops with substandard light supplement during the daytime are subjected to light supplement operation through the light supplement equipment, the artificial light supplement duration is adjusted by combining the substandard light supplement grade of the cultivated crops, and the light supplement efficiency is improved. Sunlight supplementation and manual light supplementation lamp supplementation are combined for use, and the yield and quality of crops are improved.

title: Method for estimating per unit yield of rice and wheat in mature period based on artificial intelligence
abstract: The invention discloses a mature-period rice and wheat per unit yield estimation method based on artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: S1, building and training a preset artificial intelligence model; s2, acquiring an image of a target crop of which the per unit yield needs to be predicted; s3, target crop category information and feature information extraction; s4, estimating the per unit area yield of the target crops; and S5, optimizing a pre-estimation result. The method not only changes the problems of inconsistent yield judgment, low statistical survey efficiency and non-uniform yield estimation result standard caused by manual survey, but also has the advantages of strong operability, high acquisition efficiency, high precision, high estimation accuracy and uniform standard compared with the existing yield estimation method using an informatization technology. Meanwhile, the scientificity of survey data is guaranteed, the data quality of per unit yield survey is improved, and data archiving and marking are achieved; the method provides an effective means for the development of precision agriculture, and provides powerful data support in the aspects of national grain safety, grain macroscopic regulation and control and the like.

title: FARMER SUPPORT PLATFORM SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: The present invention provides a farmer support platform system capable of providing various information and related news that are necessary to farmers and supporting farm management, education, distribution, investment, incubation, and the like. The farmer support platform system according to an embodiment of the present invention can overcome difficulties, related to farm management and product sales/distribution, experienced by farmers managing actual farms, and can provide customized information and support required by prospective farmers such as retirees or the middle-aged preparing to return to farming.

title: Farm-related enterprise financial product pushing method, device and system
applicants: INDUSTRIAL & COMMERCIAL BANK OF CHINA CO LTD
abstract: The invention provides an agricultural enterprise financial product pushing method, device and system, which can be used in the technical field of artificial intelligence, and the method comprises the steps: receiving model parameters transmitted by a plurality of enterprise terminals, the model parameters being model parameters of enterprise models obtained by each enterprise terminal according to a preset model trained by enterprise internal data; obtaining a joint model parameter of a preset model according to the model parameters of the plurality of enterprise terminals, and obtaining a agriculture-related identification model according to the joint model parameter and the preset model; and predicting a user through the agriculture-related identification model to obtain an agriculture-related identification result, obtaining a user discount success rate through a preset financial discount prediction model according to the agriculture-related identification result and user data, and determining push information corresponding to the discount success rate to push the push information to a user terminal. The agricultural enterprise identification accuracy can be improved, and the financial product transaction success rate is improved.

title: Outdoor full-coverage path planning method based on GPS positioning and robot
applicants: SHENZHEN INSTITUTE OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AND ROBOTICS FOR SOC
abstract: The invention discloses an outdoor full-coverage path planning method based on GPS positioning and a robot, and the method comprises the steps: constructing an operation region of the robot according to GPS positioning information, and fitting the contour line of the operation region and the contour line of an obstacle into a polygon; decomposing the operation area into a plurality of units by adopting a cattle farming type unit decomposition method; determining a first unit of traversal according to the current position of the robot, and solving a traveling salesman problem by adopting a depth-first search algorithm to obtain a traversal sequence of each unit; performing in-unit full-coverage path planning on the first unit according to a sideline translation strategy, and performing in-unit full-coverage path planning on the corresponding unit according to the traversal sequence of the other units; and outputting a full-coverage path planning result of the working area, and navigating the robot according to the full-coverage path planning result. According to the method, full-coverage path planning is realized through the sideline translation strategy, and the efficiency and coverage rate of full-coverage path planning of the robot operation area are improved.

title: Initial detection method for sheep diseases
abstract: The invention discloses a sheep disease initial stage detection method, which uses a deep learning network C3D-Lnet to process a streaming media video of sheep behaviors shot in a sheep house, and the deep learning network C3D-Lnet identifies and classifies the walking, standing and eating behaviors of sheep. The continuous time of the walking, standing and eating behaviors is counted, and monitoring or early warning is carried out according to default normal values and actual duration of the three behaviors. By adopting the method for detecting the early stage of the disease of the sheep, time consumption, labor consumption and subjectivity caused by manual observation and stress response to the sheep due to wearable equipment are avoided, and the problem of lack of continuous inter-frame time characteristics caused by a frame-by-frame processing mode is avoided; the behaviors of the sheep can be automatically monitored in real time and the initial detection of diseases can be carried out through the behavior change degree only through a monitoring camera and a computer carrying a program.

title: In-land irrigation method based on spatial and temporal distribution of potato roots
abstract: The invention belongs to the field of agriculture, and particularly relates to an in-situ irrigation method based on spatial and temporal distribution of potato roots. The in-situ irrigation method comprises the following steps: 1, locally selecting potato crops planted in a typical production mode and an equivalent irrigation scheme as sampling objects; 2, carrying out root system sampling and pretreatment on potato plants in different growth periods, and measuring the root system length and dry weight of the collected root system samples; and 3, counting root space-time distribution characteristics of the potatoes, and generating a corresponding root space-time distribution diagram. And 4, selecting an irrigation mode of drip irrigation, and generating a corresponding refined irrigation strategy according to the root space-time distribution diagram. Particularly, a digital measurement scheme based on deep learning and machine vision is adopted in the embodiment in the step 2. The problems of water resource waste, low potato yield and the like caused by an unreasonable potato product irrigation mode are solved, and the water resource shortage dilemma of a local potato producing area is relieved to a certain extent.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS OF URBAN ROOFTOP AGRICULTURE WITH SMART CITY DATA INTEGRATION
abstract: An IoT-enabled network of urban rooftop farms. Systems and methods include receiving image data; processing the image data with an artificial intelligence model; determining, based on the processing of the image data, a set of pixels of the image data meets one or more thresholds; and based on determining the set of pixels meets the one or more thresholds, recording the set of pixels as a viable agriculture space. Systems and methods also include receiving data from one or more sensors, wherein each of the one or more sensors is associated with an agriculture space; generating one or more metrics indicative of farming viability associated with the agriculture space based on the data received form the one or more sensors; and generating a user interface comprising the generated metrics.

title: Portable crop comprehensive data perception analysis platform
applicants: HARBIN INSTITUTE OF TECH ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a portable crop comprehensive data perception analysis platform in the technical field of smart agriculture. Comprising an air temperature and humidity sensor, a single-chip microcomputer, an image acquisition system, a communication protocol module, an oxygen sensor, a carbon dioxide sensor, a soil monitoring sensor, a background management system, a 4G module, a display screen, a cloud platform, a Bluetooth module and a mobile phone APP client. The image acquisition system comprises a data server, an image storage module, an image comparison module, an image acquisition module, a video input module and a mobile phone camera, and the device supports mobile observation and use; collection indexes are comprehensively considered, and diversified chart analysis and display are provided through refined data processing and algorithm design, so that visual judgment of users is facilitated, and differentiated requirements of various users are met; and various sensors and mobile phone image acquisition are adopted, so that the system interactivity is higher, image growth vigor observation, knowledge graph overview and expert consultation feedback can be provided, the practicability is higher, and creativity is achieved.

title: Deep learning-based plant disease identification method and system
applicants: ANHUI ZHONGKE LIMIN HIGH NEW IND CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent agriculture, and discloses a plant disease identification method and system based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a plurality of disease symptoms of a plurality of crops as a data set, carrying out the preprocessing of the data set, and dividing the data set into a training set and a test set; establishing a detection model comprising a convolutional neural network and an Inception-v3 model, training the convolutional neural network by using the training set to obtain a trained detection model, and inputting the test set into the trained detection model to obtain a plant disease recognition result; the system comprises a data acquisition module, a training module and a detection module. According to the method, the convolutional neural network and the Inception-v3 model are fused, so that the accuracy of plant leaf disease identification can be effectively improved.

title: Full-automatic farming device for black soldier flies
abstract: The present invention relates to a full-automatic farming device for black soldier flies. The farming device includes a farming tank, which is provided with a rail and a plurality of farming containers arranged along a direction that the rail extends. Those farming containers are configured for accommodating larvae of black soldier flies. A mobile feeding device is movably disposed on the rail and, therefore, movable in the farming tank along the rail. The mobile feeding device includes a feeding unit, which is provided with an accommodation space, a material inlet, and a material outlet. The accommodation space is configured for storing a feed, and the material outlet is provided with a valve. A computing unit is electrically connected to the valve and connected to a database. A weighting unit is electrically connected to the computing unit and is disposed in the accommodation space for detecting a weight of the feed. A photographing unit is electrically connected to the computing unit and shoots toward the farming containers to obtain a target image and transmit the target image to the computing unit. After that, the computing unit compares the target image with the database and performs an artificial intelligence computing procedure to obtain a computing result. The computing unit, then, outputs a feeding instruction according to the computing result so that the valve is opened and the feeding unit releases the feed into the farming containers. In addition, when the weighing unit detects that a feeding amount of the feed is sufficient, the computing unit sends a stop feeding instruction so that the valve is closed.

title: CRYSTAL FORMS OF METHYL(2R*,4R*)-4-[[(5S)-3-(3,5-DIFLUOROPHENYL)-5-VINYL-4H-ISOXAZOLE-5-CARBONYL]AMINO]TETRAHYDROFURAN-2-CARBOXYLATE AND THEIR HERBICIDAL SYNERGISTIC EFFECTS
abstract: The present invention relates to the crystal forms of methyl(2R*,4R*)-4-[[(5S)-3-(3,5-difluorophenyl)-5-vinyl-4H-isoxazole-5-carbonyl]amino]tetrahydrofuran-2-carboxylate (I) existing in the form of two stereoisomers: Methyl(2R,4R)-4-[[(5S)-3-(3,5-difluorophenyl)-5-vinyl-4H-isoxazole-5-carbonyl]-amino]tetrahydrofuran-2-carboxylate of formula (Ia) and methyl (2S,4S)-4-[[(5S)-3-(3,5-difluoro-phenyl)-5-vinyl-4H-isoxazole-5-carbonyl]amino]tetrahydrofuran-2-carboxylate of formula (Ib), to a method for preparing the crystal forms, to the use for preparing stable agrochemical formulations, and to the use in the field of agriculture for controlling harmful plants.

title: Hybrid unmanned aerial vehicle energy management method based on deep learning and dynamic planning
abstract: The invention discloses a hybrid unmanned aerial vehicle energy management method based on deep learning and dynamic planning, and belongs to the technical field of prediction of energy management strategies. According to the method, accurate power demand prediction is carried out on the future time domain of the aircraft based on the Bi-LSTM bidirectional memory network, and the prediction module considering the environmental information has high generalization and flexibility for model prediction, so that the prediction result is more comprehensive and accurate, and the parameter complexity of direct prediction is reduced; a rolling optimization module is constructed based on a linear programming algorithm on the basis of deep learning prediction, feedback correction is performed on a prediction result, and a more accurate prediction result is provided; an energy management optimization function is constructed on the basis of the minimum equivalent fuel consumption, the minimum total fuel consumption and the optimal power distribution of a power battery and an engine are realized on the basis of meeting the predicted power, and the flight economy is improved. The method is suitable for the fields of air reconnaissance, unmanned aerial vehicle agriculture, air traffic monitoring and the like, the overall oil consumption of the aircraft is reduced, and economical efficiency is improved.

title: Chinese cabbage phenotype research method based on combination of unmanned aerial vehicle multispectral imaging and high resolution
abstract: The invention provides a Chinese cabbage phenotype research method based on combination of unmanned aerial vehicle multispectral imaging and high resolution, which comprises the following steps: a camera is driven by an unmanned aerial vehicle to carry out image acquisition on Chinese cabbages in a natural growth environment, and first image information is obtained, and the first image information comprises pictures of. Jpg and. Png suffixes; splicing the images by using Pix4D software according to the image POS points so as to obtain the image information of the overall Chinese cabbage plot; identifying and positioning a single Chinese cabbage in the image information of the overall Chinese cabbage through a deep learning method; the resolution of the image is improved by adopting an SRGAN model, and phenotype information of each single Chinese cabbage is predicted. A Chinese cabbage phenotype research method based on unmanned aerial vehicle multispectral imaging in combination with high resolution replaces a manual phenotype judgment method which is time-consuming and labor-consuming; large-batch samples are obtained through unmanned aerial vehicle imaging; the accuracy can be improved by calculating the breadth and other information of the Chinese cabbage based on the GSD of machine flight; the phenotype information of the single Chinese cabbage is obtained.

title: Preparation device for intelligent agriculture and forestry flight prevention technology
abstract: A preparation device for an intelligent agriculture and forestry flight prevention technology belongs to pesticide preparation devices and comprises an upper cover, a preparation box body and a base, the preparation box body is mounted on the base, a stirring paddle is fixedly connected to the lower end of an output shaft of a motor fixedly connected in the upper cover and arranged in the preparation box body, and an infusion pump is fixed to the inner wall of the preparation box body. The suction end of the infusion pump is connected with the filter pipe and the liquid inlet pipe, the liquid outlet end of the infusion pump is connected with the liquid guide pipe I and arranged in the preparation box body, the filter pipe and the liquid inlet pipe are both provided with electric control flow valves, the ends of the electric control flow valves are provided with suction heads, a liquid outlet hose is connected to a liquid outlet in the bottom of the preparation box body, and a control terminal is arranged on the outer wall of the preparation box body above the infusion pump. The control terminal is provided with a bar code scanner. According to the device, a spraying liquid preparation scheme is optimized through artificial intelligence, the dispersity and concentration of spraying liquid are improved, and losses caused by unreasonable mixing are avoided; meanwhile, in the whole preparation process, the pesticide is exposed, leaked or dissipated, so that the contact risk of a user is greatly reduced.

title: Automatic apple bagging method and system based on deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses an automatic apple bagging method and system based on deep learning, and belongs to the technical field of intelligent agriculture, and the method comprises the following steps: collecting multi-source data, carrying out the preliminary cleaning of dirty data which cannot be used, manually carrying out the labeling and classification of apples, leaves and trunks, and dividing a data set into a training set, a verification set and a test set; and preprocessing the preliminarily cleaned data, and further processing the data in modes of image interpolation, image noise reduction, image geometric transformation and enhancement and the like. According to the method, the'end-to-end deep learning 'principle is followed, object detection is defined as a regression problem, the operation speed of the YOLOv4 algorithm is 1000 times and 100 times faster than that of an R-CNN algorithm and that of a Fast R-CNN algorithm, the delay is smaller than 25 milliseconds, the precision is high, and real-time video streams can be processed, the algorithm is applied to an automatic bagging machine, and for fruit farmers with large orchard areas, the efficiency is greatly improved. An automatic bagging machine can be introduced to replace employment of workers for bagging, and the effect of replacing manual operation is practically achieved.

title: Big data visual analysis method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: HUNAN JIACHUANG INFORMATION TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a big data visual analysis method and system based on artificial intelligence. According to a basic ecological index linkage analysis result and environmental region comparison data, environmental region matching and second linkage analysis of ecological index vectors are carried out on a second agricultural ecological index relation set, and a target ecological index linkage analysis result of a planting environment detection report two-tuple is obtained. Through the determined target ecological index linkage analysis result, ecological index vectors in an agricultural planting process can be matched and integrated, so that accurate analysis and summarization of environmental state characteristics are performed based on a global level and a local level, guidance is provided for subsequent intelligent agricultural planting, and the agricultural planting efficiency is improved. According to the invention, intelligent agriculture and artificial intelligence cooperate with each other, and visual analysis is carried out on the intelligent agriculture big data, so that the data visual analysis processing efficiency is improved.

title: Rice disease and pest image recognition system based on edge calculation
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of information processing, in particular to a rice disease and pest image recognition system based on edge computing, which comprises a high-computing-power GPU development board, a 4G module, a camera, a steering engine, a steering engine driving board and a two-degree-of-freedom holder, and is powered by a solar panel. A deep learning method is adopted for rice disease and insect pest image recognition, a large model is compressed through a knowledge distillation method, the generalization ability of the large model is improved, and the trained model is deployed on a field high-computing-power embedded development board. Through an application layer transmission protocol of a field end and a cloud end, an original image collected by a field camera, an identified result, a camera number, current time and other information are transmitted to the cloud end. Meanwhile, a front-end webpage interface is designed, an identification result can be displayed in a curve graph mode, interface switching can be carried out, the rotation angle of a field camera is remotely controlled through the front end, automatic identification of rice diseases and insect pests is achieved, and the complexity of manual investigation is avoided.

title: Systems and methods of urban rooftop agriculture with smart city data integration
abstract: An IoT-enabled network of urban rooftop farms. Systems and methods include receiving image data; processing the image data with an artificial intelligence model; determining, based on the processing of the image data, a set of pixels of the image data meets one or more thresholds; and based on determining the set of pixels meets the one or more thresholds, recording the set of pixels as a viable agriculture space. Systems and methods also include receiving data from one or more sensors, wherein each of the one or more sensors is associated with an agriculture space; generating one or more metrics indicative of farming viability associated with the agriculture space based on the data received form the one or more sensors; and generating a user interface comprising the generated metrics.

title: Litchi key growth period identification and detection method and system based on edge deep learning
abstract: The invention relates to the field of intelligent agriculture, and relates to a litchi key growth period identification and detection method and system based on edge deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: collecting images of litchis in different growth periods, constructing a data set, and dividing the data set into a training set and a verification set; constructing an improved Mask-RCNN neural network model as a litchi growth period detection model; taking a sample image of the training set as input, carrying out migration training on the neural network model, and verifying the neural network model by adopting the verification set to obtain a litchi growth period detection model with a training weight w; inputting a to-be-detected image into the litchi growth period detection model, and identifying the growth period stage of the litchi according to the weight; the feasibility of the model is judged according to the output result of the litchi growth period detection model, so that the model is deployed in an orchard to identify the litchi growth period. According to the invention, deep learning and machine vision are applied to detection of key growth periods of litchis, interference of subjective factors is reduced, and detection precision of each growth period of litchis is improved.

title: Crop yield prediction method based on triple attention mechanism
abstract: The invention discloses a crop yield prediction method based on a triple attention mechanism in the technical field of intelligent agriculture, and solves the technical problem that the crop yield prediction accuracy of an existing method is not high. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring crop yield data, remote sensing image data and meteorological environment data of a target crop planting area in a growth period over the years, and respectively taking preprocessed input characteristic parameters and per unit yield data of crop per unit yield prediction as input characteristics and output data of a deep learning model; constructing the input features and the output data into a nonlinear feature combined data set, and dividing the nonlinear feature combined data set into a test set and a training set; and building a crop yield prediction TAM model, carrying out training optimization by using the nonlinear feature combination data set, and inputting the input features of the to-be-detected crop into the crop yield prediction TAM model to obtain a crop per unit yield prediction result. Compared with an existing method, the method improves the prediction accuracy of the crop yield.

title: Agricultural machinery operation monitoring system based on deep learning
applicants: SUZHOU DAYU WUJIANG AVIATION TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an agricultural machinery operation monitoring system based on deep learning, relates to the field of agriculture, solves the problem that the current agricultural machinery is mostly manually operated, and the manual operation cannot meet the crop planting demand, and comprises an environment monitoring module, a deep learning module and a big data module, the big data module sends standard planting parameters of crops to the deep learning module according to crop names and sends standard planting environment parameters to the server, and the server sends the standard planting environment parameters to the environment monitoring module; the environment monitoring module is used for monitoring the planting environment of the area where the agricultural machine is located and generating an environment normal signal or an environment abnormal signal. The deep learning module is used for adjusting the current planting parameters of the agricultural machinery to obtain the target planting depth of the crops, and the agricultural machinery is intelligently and accurately adjusted in combination with the growth habits and planting habits of the crops, so that the planting requirements of the crops are effectively met.

title: Fruit counting method
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of image recognition of artificial intelligence, in particular to a fruit counting method, which comprises the following steps of: shooting fruit pictures by using handheld shooting equipment and processing the fruit pictures into a fruit picture data set; establishing a fruit counting neural network model, and training the fruit counting neural network model by using the fruit picture data set; and performing fruit counting by using the trained fruit identification neural network model. According to the method, the fruit picture is shot based on the handheld device, the fruit image in the shot picture is larger, and the image noise is low; small fruit target recognition is carried out by combining a grouping attention mechanism network VIT and module characteristics in a faster-RCNN model and combining the grouping attention mechanism network and an improved region generation network RPN, and the recognition precision is obviously improved; a convolutional block attention module (CBAM) attention mechanism module is added in a region generation network (RPN), so that the recognition efficiency and speed are improved.

title: Bionic stumping device with self-adaptive adjustment function and control system
abstract: The invention relates to a bionic stumping device with a self-adaptive adjustment function and a control system, and belongs to the technical field of protective farming. The movable rack is mounted on the rack in a sliding manner; the cutting height adjusting mechanism is mounted on the rack and is matched with the movable rack; the cutting inclination angle adjusting mechanism is mounted on the movable rack; the cutting knife motor control mechanism is mounted on the movable rack; and the bionic cutting knife mechanism is mounted at the output end of the cutting knife motor control mechanism. When the device starts to work, the image capturing mechanism located on the movable rack can shoot crops regularly, the upper computer located on the rack obtains photos through the universal serial port bus, and the photos are subjected to feature matching with a crop information base in the modes of deep learning, image recognition and the like; the information base records crop cutting parameters including stubble height, cutting rotation speed and cutting inclination angle in advance.

title: Agricultural robot control method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
abstract: The invention discloses a control method and device of an agricultural robot, electronic equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of intelligent agriculture, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining an image collected by each target camera, the image collection direction of which is matched with the advancing direction of the agricultural robot, in a camera assembly every time a set period is reached, the method comprises the steps of generating a binarized mask image based on target pixels belonging to a specified plant in an image, determining a growth track of the specified plant in a preset area based on target pixels in each preset area in the mask image, and determining a moving line corresponding to a target camera according to the growth track of the specified plant in each preset area, and controlling the agricultural robot to advance on the tractor-ploughing track based on the moving line corresponding to each target camera. Therefore, the agricultural robot can be automatically controlled to advance on the tractor-ploughing track, manual participation is not needed, the artificial intelligence degree is higher, and the operation efficiency is also higher.

title: Automatic driving system and method based on visual sensor
applicants: SHANGHAI YILUO INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an automatic driving system and method based on a visual sensor, and belongs to the field of agricultural machinery and precision agriculture. Comprising the following steps: S1, acquiring an image by using a camera mounted on an agricultural machine; s2, a vehicle-mounted computer is used for loading a deep learning model to carry out image semantic segmentation, and a work area is recognized; s3, calculating a navigation area and a navigation route in the operation area by using a vision algorithm based on a segmentation effect; s4, in the operation process, the driving course deviation is calculated, the driving steering angle beta and the offset distance D are output, and position correction is conducted; and S5, in the operation process, when the operation area cannot be navigated, the visual algorithm judges that operation cannot be carried out at the moment, the controller receives a signal S, and at the moment, reminding is switched to manual control. The problem that effective automatic operation cannot be achieved in a complex operation mode is solved, meanwhile, automatic driving of three operation modes including edge operation, bundle operation and inter-row operation can be achieved, and the application range is widened.

title: Apparatus and Method for Managing Inland fish farm
abstract: The present invention relates to an apparatus for managing an inland fish farm of marine products and a method thereof, which may utilize big data such as the public data of the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries to deduce the optimal growing environment condition by means of deep learning and to control the fish farm environment in an artificial intelligent method. To this end, the apparatus for managing an inland fish farm of marine products may comprise: a data collecting unit which collects marine environment data including marine water quality measurement data; an environment condition deduction unit which deduces the optimal farming environment condition for each farming variety by using environment data collected by the data collecting unit; and an environment control unit which controls the environment of a fish farm including the water quality information of an inland fish farm based on the environment condition deduced by the environment condition deduction unit. Therefore, the present invention may apply the public data of the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries to an intelligent water quality management system as an alternative to overcome the problems of the conventional aquaculture industry caused by environmental changes such as a rise in the water temperature due to a management device of an inland fish farm of marine products and changes in the ecological environment caused by the sea pollution due to the leakage of radioactive contaminated water from the Fukushima power plant, thereby suggesting a model for an eco-friendly smart inland farming industry.

title: FIELD MONITORING SYSTEM USED TO DETERMINE WHETHER THE FIELD IS SUBJECT TO ORGANIC FARMING
abstract: A system (100) for monitoring a field (200) comprising: a data processing unit (1 ), pedological sensors (2) arranged in the field (200), climatic sensors (3) arranged above the field (200), a GPS (6) arranged in the field (200), and image acquisition means (7) suitable for acquiring images (Is, Id) of the field (200); wherein the image processing unit (9) is configured to calculate a vegetation index (V) of the field based on the images (Is, Id) of the field; and the data processing unit (1) comprises an algorithm (10) based on artificial intelligence that is trained to output a response that classifies the monitored field as organic or non-organic.

title: Unmanned farm intelligent agricultural machine safe operation machine-road cooperation method
abstract: The unmanned farm intelligent agricultural machinery safety operation machine-road cooperation method comprises the following steps: S1, delimiting an important operation area of an unmanned farm, and installing and calibrating information monitoring equipment; s2, identifying and positioning a target object by a deep learning and multi-sensor fusion method; s3, tracking the target object through a tracking algorithm; s4, performing dynamic target object, static target object and operation intelligent agricultural machine classification on the identified target by an algorithm; s5, before operation of the agricultural machine, according to the distribution conditions of the target objects on different roads, calculating to obtain an optimal operation route of the intelligent agricultural machine, and warning that the dynamic target objects in the route leave and close the operation route; s6, in the operation process of the intelligent agricultural machine, monitoring the deviation between the actual position of the intelligent agricultural machine and the planned path, and carrying out safety supervision and danger prediction; and S7, after the operation agricultural machinery passes, the area closing is relieved. The invention ensures the operation safety of agricultural machinery in farms and field farmlands with low cost, and belongs to the field of intelligent agriculture.

title: SMART AGRICULTURE AIOT DISTRIBUTED BIG DATA STORAGE PLATFORM
applicants: SHENZHEN BBAI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD [CN]
abstract: A smart agricultural AIOT distributed big data storage platform, comprising a smart agricultural big data basic support platform and a smart agricultural data center; the smart agricultural big data basic support platform is used for managing and supporting the full life cycle of a huge volume of big data; and the smart agricultural data center is used for planning basic service data stored in the smart agricultural big data basic support platform, so as to ensure that the smart agricultural AIOT distributed big data storage platform has a distributed architecture effect. The present invention employs a distributed architecture, and provides, by providing management and support for the full life cycle of a huge volume of big data, a data model basis for a smart agricultural big data service platform established on the basis of artificial intelligence and Internet information sharing.

title: Enhanced management zone for precision agriculture
abstract: The present invention is a system and method for agricultural management zoning over a wide geographical range without the need for excessively local field-specific data. According to the current innovation, an enhanced management area is delimited based on remote sensing and artificial intelligence, and the enhanced management area and the remote sensing are combined with data exported from an existing national soil survey database to guide precise agricultural sampling and management. In embodiments, the current innovation uses artificial intelligence from multiple sources to provide granular regional details. The output of the present innovation may be aggregated to produce a management area size with a level of uncertainty that adapts to customer farmer's needs and is implementable in view of the capabilities of available equipment.

title: Construction method of cigar coat quality grade discrimination model
applicants: NONGXIN NANJING SMART AGRICULTURE RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a method for constructing a cigar coating quality grade discrimination model, and relates to the technical field of cigar coatings. The construction method of the cigar coating quality grade discrimination model comprises the following steps: S1, collecting a large amount of image data of labeled cigar coating raw material tobacco leaves; s2, preprocessing cigar coat raw material tobacco leaf image data; s3, based on Halcon, calculating the size of an effective use area for avoiding the holes by the tobacco leaves of the raw material of the cigar wrapper; s4, training a deep learning algorithm-based judgment model for judging whether the cigar wrapper raw material tobacco leaves meet quality grade requirements or not; and S5, outputting the quality grade of the cigar wrapper by combining the size of the effective use area and the quality grade requirement judgment model. According to the method, the problems that in current research for cigar coating quality, data-based quantitative research needs to use experts and instruments to measure various indexes, the acquisition cost is high, and analysis of quality levels and correlation weight coefficients among the indexes based on field knowledge of the experts cannot be realized in industrial process practice are solved.

title: Laying hen house noise stress source identification and classification method based on deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a laying hen house noise stress source identification and classification method based on deep learning. The method comprises the steps of obtaining a sound file of noise around a laying hen house, preprocessing the sound file to obtain a sound file to be identified, and performing short-time Fourier transform on the sound file to be identified to obtain a spectrogram; performing noise reduction processing on the preprocessed sound file to obtain a noise-reduced data set, and dividing the noise-reduced data set into a training set and a test set; and constructing a Resnet34 network model, training the Resnet34 network model based on the training set, testing the Resnet34 network model by using the test set to obtain a laying hen house noise stress source identification model, and performing laying hen house surrounding noise stress source identification and classification by using the laying hen house noise stress source identification model. According to the method, a deep learning method is utilized, and the sound of the surrounding environment of the henhouse is trained through the Resnet34 network model, so that the recognition and classification of the sound are completed.

title: Character direction recognition method based on dynamic layered nested residual network
abstract: The invention provides a text direction recognition method based on a dynamic hierarchical nested residual network. The method comprises the following steps: training a neural network model Res2Net-I based on a convolutional neural network; obtaining a character image, inputting the character image into the neural network model Res2Net-I, and performing character direction recognition; when the neural network model Res2Net-I is trained, the method comprises the following steps: acquiring a character image, and randomly intercepting 5 parts of the image; randomly rotating and storing the intercepted part in four directions of 0, 90, 180 and 270 clockwise; classifying the stored images according to four clockwise directions of 0, 90, 180 and 270 of characters; according to the method, starting from an actual business scene, collected character image data are trained in a deep learning mode, the character direction is obtained, firstly, 5 parts of collected pictures are randomly intercepted, the intercepted parts are randomly rotated in the four directions of 0, 90, 180 and 270 clockwise, then the intercepted parts are classified according to the character direction, the accuracy can be improved, and the efficiency can also be improved.

title: GPU virtualization deployment method and system, computer equipment and storage medium
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to a GPU virtualization deployment method and system, computer equipment and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring user selection data based on a configuration page in an online deployment system, and generating a container deployment instruction; the Kubernete identifies a GPU cluster through a server label, virtualizes a scheduler through the GPU, selects an idle server, and sends the container deployment instruction; according to GPU configuration of data selected by a user, the Kubernete segments virtualized GPU resources required by the user from a physical GPU through a virtualized plug-in; and after the GPU resources are distributed, starting the container, and executing the starting script selected by the user after the container is started. According to the method, the GPU resources of the server are subjected to resource segmentation through the GPU virtualization technology, resource waste caused by the fact that Kubernete monopolizes one whole GPU graphics card resource during container deployment is avoided, the GPU resources of the server can be fully utilized, and the purpose that one physical GPU graphics card can deploy multiple model applications at the same time is achieved.

title: Fruit tree growth prediction method based on improved convolutional neural network structure
applicants: JIANGXI YUFENG INTELLIGENT AGRICULTURE TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to the field of intelligent agriculture and the field of deep learning, in particular to a fruit tree growth prediction method based on an improved convolutional neural network structure, which comprises the following steps: designing a fruit tree growth prediction model composed of a plurality of sub convolutional neural network models, and determining input and output of each sub convolutional neural network model, the method comprises the steps of designing a sub-convolutional neural network model, establishing a fruit tree growth information resource library, digitalizing fruit tree planting theoretical knowledge and experience knowledge, training the sub-convolutional neural network model, linking the trained sub-convolutional neural network model, generating a fruit tree growth prediction model, and guiding agricultural activities by applying prediction data generated by the fruit tree growth prediction model. According to the method, the growth state of each stage of the fruit tree is fitted by using a sub-neural network model, the implementation of each farming activity and the dosage of fertilization, pesticide application and the like are controlled more accurately, the sub-health states of fruit tree diseases and insect pests and the like are warned in advance, and a more accurate scientific basis is provided for healthy growth of the fruit tree.

title: Rural river liquid level monitoring system and method based on artificial intelligence
applicants: JIANGSU XINHUI MEASUREMENT AND CONTROL TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a rural river liquid level monitoring system and method based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of liquid level monitoring. The method comprises the following steps: 1, measuring the depth of a river by using a level gauge, and simulating a rural river flow field based on a measurement result; 2, predicting the river liquid level in the rural river flow field based on the rainfall and the displacement; thirdly, according to the river liquid level prediction result in the second step, the rural river is used for conducting hierarchical irrigation on agriculture, preliminary irrigation is conducted on the agriculture through river water seepage, water resource waste is reduced, synchronous monitoring on the river liquid levels at different terrain positions is achieved, the monitoring efficiency of the system is further improved, and the monitoring cost is reduced. The agricultural irrigation system has the advantages that the agricultural irrigation cost is reduced, the agricultural irrigation can be effectively managed, and incomplete agricultural irrigation is avoided.

title: Crop remote sensing image semantic segmentation method based on deep learning
applicants: CAS HEFEI SMART AGRICULTURE COLLABORATIVE INNOVATION INST
abstract: The invention relates to a crop remote sensing image semantic segmentation method based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: collecting an L2A-level image of a sentinel No.2 satellite, carrying out the wave band lifting and fusion, carrying out the cutting and marking, and storing the image as data in a data set; the data set is divided into a training set, a verification set and a test set, hyper-parameters of the convolutional neural network model are adjusted, and the convolutional neural network model is checked until a convolutional neural network model with loss function convergence is obtained; collecting a to-be-detected sample and completing crop detection. A new network model is provided for remote sensing image crop semantic segmentation, multi-band information of the remote sensing image instead of RGB three-channel information of a traditional image can be processed at the same time, and high applicability is achieved for the segmentation problem of the remote sensing image; according to the network model, a residual module is added on the basis of an original U-net model, details lost in the encoding process of the remote sensing image can be effectively reduced, and the model segmentation accuracy is higher.

title: Method for identifying dead chicken in infrared image cage based on improved YOLOv5 model
abstract: The invention provides a method for identifying dead chickens in an infrared image cage based on an improved YOLOv5 model. The method mainly comprises the following steps: S1, constructing a data set; S2, constructing a deep learning model for detecting a dead chicken target in the infrared image cage based on the improved YOLOv5; and S3, training and evaluating the constructed deep learning model for detecting the dead chicken target in the infrared image cage based on the improved YOLOv5. According to the method, the YOLOv5 network model is improved, the situations of false detection and missing detection of dead chickens in the cage are reduced, and the accuracy rate and the recall rate reach 96.4% and 91.2% respectively. In practical application, the model can be deployed in equipment such as an embedded terminal, so that the dead chicken condition in the cage can be detected in real time by a mobile terminal.

title: ENHANCED MANAGEMENT ZONES FOR PRECISION AGRICULTURE
abstract: The present invention is a system and method for agricultural management-zone delineation to be done over broad geographic extents without overly-localized field-specific data. The instant innovation guides precision agricultural sampling and management by delineating enhanced management zones based upon remote sensing and artificial intelligence and combining the two with data derived from an existing countrywide soil survey database. In an embodiment, the instant innovation uses artificial intelligence from multiple sources to provide granular zone detail. Output of the present innovation can be aggregated to produce management zone sizes that have a level of uncertainty compatible with the needs of the customer-farmer and implementable given the capabilities of available equipment.

title: Plant identification method, device and equipment based on artificial intelligence
applicants: BEIJING BAIDU NETCOM SCI & TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention provides a plant identification method, device and equipment based on artificial intelligence, relates to the field of artificial intelligence, in particular to image identification, multi-mode identification and deep learning technologies, and can be applied to smart cities and smart agriculture scenes. A specific embodiment of the plant identification model training method comprises the following steps: acquiring a sample remote sensing image and a sample category label of a sample plant; based on the sample remote sensing image, extracting sample multi-modal features of the sample plant; and taking the sample multi-modal features as input, taking the sample category labels as output, and training the semantic segmentation model to obtain a plant identification model. According to the embodiment, when the plant identification model is trained, the multi-modal data of the plant is introduced. The multi-modal data can provide gain for plant identification from different angles, so that the accuracy of plant identification is improved.

title: VERTICAL FARM RACK SYSTEM AND PLANT TENDING ROBOT FOR TRAVEL THEREON
abstract: One or more robotic vehicles and a vertical farming structure on which the robotic vehicles move. The primary function of the robotic vehicles is to harvest, evaluate, tend, control disease, control pests, and transplant plants in a vertical farm. The robot can move in x, y, and z Cartesian directions. It uses a conveyor mechanism to harvest Water Lentils from the surface of water beds. It has other onboard devices including cameras for capturing data about the plants. A central control system leverages computer vision and artificial intelligence techniques to make farm management decisions and plan the robot's movements based on those decisions.

title: Intelligent agricultural production management service system
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of intelligent agriculture, in particular to an intelligent agricultural production management service system. Comprising an information acquisition unit, a control module, a data transmission and remote management module, an Internet of Things cloud platform, a deep learning model prediction module and an application terminal. According to the intelligent agricultural production management service system, deep learning with super-strong learning ability is combined with a greenhouse, various environmental factors are predicted, the most suitable environmental conditions are provided for healthy growth of crops, and the intelligent agricultural production management service system is provided around agricultural modernization production management on the basis of the Internet of Things. According to the system and the method, the purposes of high efficiency, high yield, intelligence and automatic control are achieved, a user can directly check the detected real-time data condition through a PC terminal or an APP terminal, various controllers in the greenhouse can be remotely operated, corresponding protection measures such as shading, irrigation, ventilation and cooling can be taken, intelligent and refined management of agricultural planting is achieved, and the planting efficiency is improved.

title: System and method capable of remotely and automatically generating dynamic video of rice growth process
applicants: GUANGZHOU AIMI ECOLOGICAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AGRICULTURE CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to a system and method capable of remotely and automatically generating a rice growth process dynamic video, and the method comprises the steps: collecting on-site image data through a data collection device, storing the image data to a file storage center of a remote data center, and storing corresponding image meta-information data to a meta-information database of the remote data center; the task scheduling module transmits the image data in the file storage center to the artificial intelligence processing module for identification, and then transmits an identification result of the artificial intelligence processing module to the meta-information database for storage; and the video data generation module generates specified rice video data based on the data of the meta-information database according to the request of the client, and the specified rice video data are acquired by the client. And the acquisition of rice video data is realized through the video data generation module, and the automation level of rice monitoring is improved.

title: Multipurpose robot for agriculture
abstract: The present invention relates to a multipurpose robot for agriculture capable of performing complete automatic driving. The multipurpose robot includes: a driving control unit enabling the multipurpose robot to drive according to a driving route by controlling a steering unit and a driving unit; a lidar sensor detecting an obstacle by scanning a driving direction; an angle adjusting unit maintaining horizontality of the lidar sensor and adjusting an angle of the lidar sensor according to the control of the control unit; an artificial intelligence object recognition unit providing the state of a driving road and the obstacle to the control unit by receiving the input of a scan result of the lidar sensor and learning the scan result, thereby enabling the control unit to individually control the driving control unit and the angle adjusting unit; and a cartridge mounting unit capable of replacing and mounting function modules individually performing different functions.

title: Artificial intelligence device capable of adjusting temperature of vegetable greenhouse
abstract: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence device capable of adjusting the temperature of a vegetable greenhouse, which belongs to the technical field of vegetable planting and is characterized by comprising a greenhouse body, a planting soil layer is arranged at the bottom end in the greenhouse body, and when an air temperature and humidity sensor detects that the temperature in the greenhouse body is lower than a set value range, the planting soil layer is arranged on the planting soil layer. When the temperature is higher than a set maximum value, the control box receives the signal and controls to turn on the air heater so as to heat the interior of the greenhouse body, the air heater is automatically turned off after heating to the set value, and when the temperature is higher than the set maximum value, the control box receives the signal and controls to turn on the air cooler so as to cool the interior of the greenhouse body, and the air cooler is turned off after cooling to the set temperature. Therefore, automatic control and constant temperature of the vegetable greenhouse are achieved, the automation degree is high, the labor cost is reduced, and the problems that an existing vegetable greenhouse is single in function and low in automation degree, the temperature in the greenhouse is inconvenient to adjust and control, a large amount of labor cost is needed for management, high dependence on manual operation is achieved, and working time is long are solved.

title: System, method, computer program, and computer readable medium for controlling environment of livestock farming field using intelligent-based technology
abstract: A method for controlling environment of livestock framing field using an intelligent-based technology is disclosed. The method includes: arranging a plurality of environmental control devices and sensing units in a livestock farming field; establishing a server and a terminal device; a deep learning model receiving an environmental parameter and a weather information of a future time corresponding to the livestock farming field, and acquiring an predicted environmental parameter of the future time by integrating the received environmental parameter and the weather information corrected according to a weight. When the predicted environmental parameter exceeds a preset threshold range, the server controls and thereby actuates the environmental control devices to adjust the environmental parameter of the future time to meet the preset threshold range. As the environmental control devices are controlled and actuated well-timed, the environmental parameter of the livestock farming field is always matined within the most appropriate range.

title: Training and using method of ladybird classification and identification model
applicants: LIANTONG GUANGDONG IND INTERNET CO LTD
abstract: The invention provides a training method of a ladybird classification and recognition model. The training method comprises the following steps: acquiring a plurality of ladybird pictures; performing variety labeling and target labeling on the acquired ladybird picture; building a training set and a test set by using the ladybird pictures marked by the variety and the target frame; inputting the training set into a ladybird classification and identification model to obtain a convergent ladybird classification and identification model; inputting the test set into a ladybird classification and identification model for testing; optimizing the ladybird classification and identification model according to a test result; the ladybird classification and recognition model comprises a target detection network and a classification network, and then a deep learning model for rapidly and efficiently classifying and recognizing ladybirds is trained. The invention further provides a using method of the ladybird classification and recognition model. The using method comprises the steps that ladybird pictures to be classified are input into the convergent ladybird classification and recognition model; the target frame selection result and the classification result of the to-be-classified ladybird pictures are obtained, and ladybirds are quickly classified and identified, so that the ladybirds are reasonably utilized to serve agriculture.

title: SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLED FARMING
applicants: SKY BLIX AGRO SCIENCE PRIVATE LTD [IN]
abstract: The present invention mainly discloses a system that involves controlled farming in a fully enclosed chamber that has no contact to the outside environmental factors for the growth of various plant species. All the factors that are required for the growth of the plants are provided inside the chamber by virtue of a system through which the growth and quality of the plant species is enhanced. The same is achieved by providing the factors for growth such as light means, air and temperature means, nutrient means, the said parameters which will be checked, moderated and controlled through a chamber running on AI module (artificial intelligence).

title: Agricultural planting management system and method based on Internet of Things and artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANGHAI SHENYI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to the field of G06Q50/02, in particular to an agricultural planting management system and method based on Internet of Things and artificial intelligence, and the system at least comprises a supplier terminal, a crop expert terminal, an artificial intelligence terminal, a farmland steward terminal and a planter terminal. The system provided by the invention creatively realizes linkage of suppliers, crop experts, farmland housekeepers and planters involved in an agricultural planting process while ensuring that intelligent agriculture develops towards high automation and high-efficiency management, so that the Internet of Things and artificial intelligence are fully utilized; the planting technology and planting experience of crop experts are artificially intelligent, an agricultural planting guidance scheme with high accuracy, high efficiency and high demand satisfaction degree and a planting service list with high matching degree are further provided for planters to the greatest extent through machine learning, the agricultural planting management efficiency is improved, and the management cost is reduced. The expected target yield and quality of agricultural planting are guaranteed, and the method has very high practical application value and commercial application potential.

title: IoT Smart farm IoTInternet of Things system for management using Deep leaning
abstract: The present invention relates to a smart farm Internet of things (IoT) system for rice farming water management using deep learning, which comprises: an automatic water supply unit (100); a drainage control apparatus unit (200); a measurement instrument unit (300) attached to the drainage control apparatus unit (200) and including a water level sensor; a power supply unit (500) supplying power to the drainage control apparatus unit; a control unit (600) connected to the measurement instrument unit (300) to transmit, receive, and store data and control operation of the water supply unit (100) and the drainage control apparatus unit (200); and a wireless communication unit (700) automatically controlling the operation of the water supply unit (100) or the drainage control apparatus unit (200) according to the data detected by the measurement instrument unit (300), connected to the control unit (600) to transmit the data transmitted from the control unit (600) to a wirelessly connected external terminal (900) of a manager, and receiving data generated by the external terminal (900) and transmitting the received data to the control unit (600) to control the degree of opening and closing of a water gate of the water supply unit (100) or the drainage control apparatus unit (200) connected to the control unit (600), thereby adjusting the level of freshwater of a rice paddy. According to the present invention, the degree of opening and closing of the water gate of the water supply unit (100) and the drainage control apparatus unit (200) in a rice paddy can be remotely controlled far away from the rice paddy, and a deep learning system is included such that a water environment suitable for rice farming can be automatically adjusted by growing season, thereby forming an optimal rice farming environment.

title: Fine land parcel identification method and system based on boundary buffer deep learning
applicants: BIG DATA DEVELOPMENT CENTER MINI OF AGRICULTURE AND RURAL AFFAIRS
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of data recognition, and provides a boundary buffer deep learning-based land parcel fine recognition method and system, and the method comprises the steps: firstly recognizing a land parcel region of a to-be-recognized image through a deep learning model, and obtaining a first land parcel recognition result; wherein the deep learning model is obtained by training according to pre-acquired image data and label data, and the label data is obtained by performing first buffering processing on original label data; then, performing second buffer processing and connected domain processing on the first binary image in sequence to obtain a first seed image; and finally, according to the first seed image, the input image is segmented through a watershed algorithm, and a land parcel fine identification result is obtained. Therefore, the label data obtained by performing the first buffer processing on the original label data is input into the deep learning model as the training data, and then robust and accurate subsequent processing steps are adopted, so that the precision of land parcel identification is improved.

title: Intelligent rice field weed recognition method, device and equipment and medium
applicants: GUANGZHOU AIMI ECOLOGICAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AGRICULTURE CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an intelligent rice field weed recognition method, device and equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of computer vision.
