The intelligent rice field weed identification method comprises the steps of obtaining a first picture set according to a plurality of first videos; the first picture set comprises a plurality of first pictures, and the first pictures carry weed type information of the first video; searching an optimal deep residual network structure to obtain a first deep residual network structure; training the deep residual network according to the plurality of first picture sets and the weed type information to obtain a rice field weed recognition model; and inputting the second picture into the paddy field weed recognition model to obtain a first recognition result. According to the method, the paddy field weed video and the weed type information are input, and the artificial intelligence recognition model of the deep residual network is utilized to recognize the input picture to obtain the recognition result, so that the paddy field weeds are intelligently and efficiently recognized.

title: System and method for reminding field crop status
applicants: KAOHSIUNG DISTRICT AGRICULTURAL RESEARCH AND EXTENSION STATION COUNCIL OF AGRICULTURE [TW]
abstract: A system for reminding field crop status comprises an environmental sensing device, a data converter, a predictive model executor and a reminder device, wherein the data converter is connected with the environmental sensing device and the predictive model executor, and the predictive model executor is connected with the reminder device. The environmental sensing device is configured to sense the environment and generate multiple environmental sensing values. The data converter is configured to generate features according to the environmental sensing values, to store the environmental sensing values and the features into a storage media, and to form a data snapshot, a data matrix composed by the environmental sensing values and features, as an input data for prediction. The predictive model executor is configured to input the data snapshot into a prediction model of crop status built by a deep learning algorithm to generate a prediction of crop status. The reminder device is configured to generate and output a reminding message according to the prediction of crop status.

title: Rice picture intelligent auditing method, system, device and equipment
applicants: GUANGZHOU AIMI ECOLOGICAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AGRICULTURE CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a rice picture intelligent auditing method and device, equipment and a medium, and relates to the technical field of image processing. According to the rice picture intelligent auditing method, three auditing detection steps are set, intelligent auditing is carried out on the input picture by utilizing an artificial intelligence recognition model and combining regional information, hash value information and growth cycle characteristics of rice crops, and the rice crop picture auditing efficiency and accuracy are improved.

title: Parameter adjusting method of artificial intelligence auxiliary crop model
applicants: SHANGHAI LANGUIQI TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a parameter adjusting method for an artificial intelligence auxiliary crop model, and particularly relates to the technical field of crop growth models, and the specific implementation steps of a software algorithm are as follows: S1: obtaining real weather data and farming activity data W in a test; s2, substituting the acquired weather data and farming activity data W into a crop model; s3, obtaining a model parameter X by using a random assignment method, and substituting the model parameter X into the crop model to generate a large number of different model outputs Y; s4, establishing an artificial intelligence model by using the model output Y as the input of the artificial intelligence model and the model parameter X as the output of the artificial intelligence model; and S5, inputting true values YY obtained through a group of tests into the artificial intelligence model. The method has the beneficial effects that the artificial intelligence auxiliary crop model parameter adjustment method is set for the crop model parameters, the crop artificial intelligence model automatically adjusts the parameters through a software algorithm, the parameter adjustment difficulty is reduced, and the test data volume is increased.

title: Target detection method using context awareness
abstract: The invention provides a target detection method utilizing context awareness, which comprises the following steps: acquiring image data to be detected, and setting a training set and a test set; constructing a convolutional neural network based on context awareness; training the convolutional neural network to obtain a training model; and inputting the test set image into the training model to obtain the position and category information of the target in the image. According to the method, position positioning and category detection are performed on the target in the image based on a deep learning method, object information is provided for target detection to be applied to the fields of agriculture, military, security and protection and the like, and development and further research of multiple applications such as information monitoring and the like are promoted.

title: Method and device for predicting hot, humid and humid environment in livestock and poultry house
applicants: QINGYUAN SMART AGRICULTURE AND RURAL RES INSTITUTE
abstract: The invention provides a method and device for predicting a hot and humid environment in a livestock and poultry house, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the knowledge fusion of time sequence data of a target parameter and a variable parameter of a target livestock and poultry house in a first time period based on priori knowledge, and obtaining the feature time sequence data of the target livestock and poultry house in the first time period according to a knowledge fusion result; inputting the characteristic time sequence data into a hot and humid environment prediction model, and obtaining a prediction result of the target parameters of the target livestock and poultry house in the second time period output by the hot and humid environment prediction model; wherein the end point of the first time period and the starting point of the second time period are current moments; the characteristic time sequence data comprises the total heat yield and the total humidity yield of livestock and poultry bred in the target livestock and poultry house. According to the method and device for predicting the hot, humid and humid environment in the livestock and poultry house, the heat and mass transfer physical principle of the livestock and poultry house is fused on the basis of the deep learning technology, the hot, humid and humid environment in the livestock and poultry house can be predicted more accurately and efficiently, and prediction universality and application convenience can be both considered.

title: Artificial intelligence automatic feeding equipment for agriculture and animal husbandry
abstract: The invention discloses artificial intelligence agriculture and animal husbandry automatic feeding equipment which comprises a stirring box and a self-propelled trolley, movable supporting columns are symmetrically hinged to one side of the bottom end of the stirring box, fixed supporting columns are symmetrically hinged to the other side of the bottom end of the stirring box, a horn opening is formed in the right side of the stirring box, and a supporting plate is installed on the back face of the stirring box; a first material guide groove is formed in the upper end face of the supporting plate, the side, close to the stirring box, of the first material guide groove extends into the stirring box, rotating supporting columns are symmetrically arranged on the front face of the stirring box, and stirring mechanisms are installed on the rotating supporting columns. The device is provided with a feed stirring mechanism, a discharging mechanism and a movable stirring roller mechanism, the functions of stirring and mixing, automatic discharging and automatic feeding are achieved, the automation degree of the device is improved, an inner cavity of a stirring container is easy to clean, the cleanliness of animal feed is guaranteed, and the device is suitable for popularization and application. And popularization and application of the device in agriculture and animal husbandry are facilitated.

title: Remote and autonomous control harvesting, processing and conveying device
abstract: The invention discloses a far-end and autonomous-control harvesting, processing and conveying device, which aims at heavy physical labor, a lot of time and manpower are spent on harvesting, the far-end and autonomous-control harvesting of plants and underground fruits is realized by adopting a far-end and autonomous-control harvesting device, and the device comprises an autonomous harvesting device, a radar autonomous navigation device and a moving device, a ground penetrating device for detecting underground fruits, a conveying belt, a light processing device and a vibration device are integrated, harvesting, light processing, packaging, conveying and storing are achieved, intelligent management of crop harvesting is achieved, and the intelligent crop harvesting machine is applied to the field of artificial intelligence agriculture.

title: Remote sensing big data center comprehensive service system
abstract: The invention discloses a remote sensing big data center comprehensive service system, which belongs to the field of remote sensing big data and comprises a data management subsystem, a data production subsystem and a data application subsystem which are established on a cloud service PaaS platform. The data management subsystem is used for storing various remote sensing image data; the data production subsystem is responsible for processing stripes, deformation, distortion and other factors in an original satellite image and restoring a pure and real ground object scene; and the data application subsystem takes the standard data product generated by the data production subsystem as input to generate a thematic and regional basic application data pool. According to the method, the big data and artificial intelligence technology are utilized, the application characteristics of all industries are combined, mass, multi-source and heterogeneous observation and intelligent processing data are rapidly and timely analyzed and processed, two breakthroughs from data to knowledge and from method to application are achieved, and the method is suitable for popularization and application. Omnibearing support from data to service is provided for application in the industries of agriculture, resources, forestry and environmental protection.

title: Field precise water and fertilizer management method and system based on computer deep learning
applicants: INST OF AGRICULTURAL RESOURCES AND ENVIRONMENT HEBEI ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY SCIENCES
abstract: The invention provides a field precise water and fertilizer management method and system based on computer deep learning, and belongs to the technical field of field water and fertilizer management. By collecting weather and climate data, crop apparent state data and data capable of being manually controlled through water and fertilizer management, all conditions needed by crop growth are basically included, then modeling analysis is conducted on the data in a computer deep learning mode, field water and fertilizer management can be conducted accurately, and the field water and fertilizer management efficiency is improved. Along with data accumulation, water and fertilizer management becomes more and more accurate, meanwhile, a control model is generated and optimized by means of the powerful computing power of a central server of the cloud server, then data calculation and control instruction generation are conducted by means of the control model through an edge node server, the data feedback time can be greatly shortened, and the data feedback efficiency is improved. Water and fertilizer can be controlled more accurately; remote control can be easily achieved through the cloud server, and water and fertilizer management of a field is facilitated.

title: Tongue picture constitution distinguishing method based on deep learning
abstract: The tongue picture constitution distinguishing method based on deep learning is deployed in a mobile terminal, and a user can conveniently recognize a tongue picture image anytime and anywhere. According to the method, a convolutional neural network algorithm is adopted, and a tongue image data set is subjected to data enhancement in a mode of combining two methods of similar enhancement and mixed enhancement on a tongue image. The model can adapt to tongue picture data in various environments, the extracted features can directly output a classification result, the calculation amount is greatly reduced, and the generalization ability is higher.

title: Livestock counting method based on frame filtering and target detection
applicants: SICHUAN XUEYUE TIANYOU AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a livestock counting method based on frame filtering and target detection, and belongs to the technical field of livestock target detection, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining a livestock counting data set; constructing an overlapping degree classification network; training the overlapping degree classification network to obtain a trained overlapping degree classification network; according to the overlapping degree, using a trained overlapping degree classification network to perform frame filtering to obtain a preset number of frames with the lowest overlapping degree; constructing a target detection network; training the target detection network to obtain a trained target detection network; detecting a preset number of frames with the lowest overlapping degree by using the trained target detection network to obtain the livestock position and the livestock number in each frame, and performing weighted average counting fusion on the livestock number in each frame to obtain the detected livestock number; according to the scheme, the problem of detecting and counting the livestock by using the overlapping degree-based frame filtering algorithm and the target detection algorithm of deep learning is solved.

title: Plant identification drawing method and system based on unmanned aerial vehicle image deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a plant identification drawing method and system based on unmanned aerial vehicle image deep learning. A to-be-tested plant remote sensing image is collected through an unmanned aerial vehicle; acquiring a single plant remote sensing image data set; the Faster RCNN deep learning target recognition framework model is optimized, a FruitNet deep learning target recognition model is obtained and trained, single plant recognition prediction is carried out on the FruitNet deep learning target recognition model, and a single plant recognition prediction result is obtained; and obtaining a plant spatial distribution thematic map based on the single plant identification prediction result. According to the method, errors of artificial investigation and statistics are effectively solved, the precision and efficiency of plant investigation identification and positioning are improved, the complexity of a traditional plant investigation and statistics method is reduced, important scientific and technological support can be provided for intelligent orchards and precision agriculture, and scientific and technological services are provided for village fruit tree industry revitalization and development.

title: Big data agriculture and forestry intelligent monitoring system
applicants: JIANGSU XINXIN HANGFEI INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a big data agriculture and forestry intelligent monitoring system comprising a data acquisition system which is provided with a land drawing module, a land sensor and a satellite remote sensing module; the land management system comprises a crop monitoring module, a crop measuring and calculating module and a deep learning module. The agricultural machine dispatching system is used for controlling the flight precision of the unmanned aerial vehicle based on a multi-source WIFI positioning technology and realizing the monitoring and spraying of the unmanned aerial vehicle on the land; the land management system and the data acquisition system are both in information intercommunication with the database, provide an omnibearing land measurement blocking capability, detect land data based on a land sensor, provide model data of a crop growth cycle time period, realize automatic and informatization management of land and crops, standardize the land utilization rate, and improve the land measurement efficiency. Accumulation of agriculture and forestry big data is beneficial to popularization and application of the agriculture and forestry industry, and rapid development of the agriculture and forestry industry is achieved.

title: Multi-working-condition greenhouse strawberry precise picking robot suitable for multi-layer elevated planting agriculture and picking method
abstract: The invention provides a multi-working-condition greenhouse strawberry precise picking robot suitable for multi-layer elevated planting agriculture and a picking method. The multi-working-condition greenhouse strawberry precise picking robot comprises a path planning module, a movable chassis, a five-connecting-rod mechanical arm, a tail end executing mechanism, a main control module, a height adjusting device, an energy continuous supply module and a grading collection device. The five-connecting-rod mechanical arm is used for driving the end executing mechanism to move freely in the plane, strawberries are recognized and positioned through the image recognition and positioning module, under cooperation of the height adjusting device, the end executing mechanism can conduct lossless picking on ripe strawberries on elevated frames of different floor heights, the automation degree is high, and manpower and material resources are saved. According to the method, the strawberry detection speed and precision of the model are further improved based on the improved deep learning instance segmentation network SOLO, the strawberry size can be identified, the picked strawberries are placed in a graded mode according to the strawberry size, and the workload of subsequent picking personnel for graded framing and selling is greatly reduced.

title: Three-dimensional point cloud semantic segmentation method and system based on multi-head two-stage attention
abstract: The invention provides a three-dimensional point cloud semantic segmentation method and system based on multi-head two-stage attention, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a 2D sequence image of a plant, carrying out the three-dimensional reconstruction, and obtaining a 3D point cloud of the plant; preprocessing and manually marking the 3D point cloud data of the plant; besides, a multi-head two-stage attention semantic segmentation network is constructed based on an attention mechanism in consideration of the complexity of a plant structure form, the multi-head two-stage attention semantic segmentation network is used for hierarchically obtaining geometric features of point cloud and directly predicting a semantic label of each point from completely labeled point cloud data, and finally a segmentation result of a plant organ is obtained. According to the three-dimensional point cloud semantic segmentation method and system based on multi-head two-stage attention provided by the invention, the semantic segmentation network is constructed, so that a data-driven end-to-end deep learning model for directly processing disordered 3D point clouds is provided in the field of agriculture, and organ-level segmentation can be automatically and efficiently performed on plant three-dimensional point clouds.

title: Remote and autonomous control intelligent greenhouse device and optimal cultivation method
abstract: The invention discloses a remote and autonomous control intelligent greenhouse device and an optimized cultivation method, and aims to solve the problems that heavy physical labor is heavy, cultivation operation spends a large amount of time and manpower, the remote and autonomous control greenhouse device realizes remote and autonomous control cultivation, irrigation and intelligent planting, and the greenhouse device comprises a sliding device and a sliding module, a temperature acquisition and regulation module, a humidity acquisition and regulation module, a soil sensor acquisition device, an oxygen and carbon dioxide sensor acquisition and regulation device, an air blowing device, an irradiation device, a spraying irrigation device, insect killing, irrigation, fertilization and cultivation are adopted, intelligent crop management and intelligent cultivation are achieved, and the system is applied to the field of artificial intelligence agriculture.

title: artificial intelligence farming type solar power generation system
abstract: The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence agricultural solar power generation system, which comprises: a rotational central axis rotatably coupled between a plurality of holding frames extending vertically to the ground; a photovoltaic power generation unit comprising solar cell panels mounted spaced apart from each other on a support panel coupled to be supported on the rotational central axis; a light emitting unit comprising at least one dichroic mirror mounted between the solar cell panels and transmitting or reflecting light of a set wavelength band with respect to incident light; a panel angle adjustment unit adjusting the rotation angle of the rotational center axis; a sensing unit including at least one among a rain sensor detecting whether it is raining, a snowfall sensor detecting whether snow is falling and a wind speed sensor detecting wind speed; a control unit controlling the support angle of the support panel to be adjusted according to a set adjustment pattern according to the information detected by the sensing unit; an imaging unit capturing an image of a planting area under a photovoltaic power generation unit and providing the image to the control unit; and a machine learning unit connected to the control unit, determining the types of diseases, pests, and weeds from images captured and provided by the imaging unit, and extracting and providing a control or removal method. According to the artificial intelligence agricultural solar power generation system, the advantage of providing an optimized growth environment for crops grown in the area under the solar cell panel can be provided.

title: Building maintenance analysis system and method based on artificial intelligence
abstract: The invention discloses a building maintenance analysis system and method based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of building maintenance analysis based on artificial intelligence. The system comprises a building data acquisition module, a model analysis module and an optimal maintenance scheme generation module, the building data acquisition module is used for constructing a building maintenance area and acquiring historical daily data of a building; the model analysis module is used for constructing a model, generating maintenance early warning information and outputting the maintenance early warning information to the administrator port; and the optimal maintenance scheme generation module is used for acquiring maintenance early warning information data by an administrator port, constructing a building maintenance scheme, further optimizing and generating an optimal building maintenance scheme by utilizing a genetic algorithm, and outputting the optimal building maintenance scheme to a maintenance platform port for front-line personnel to look up. The building maintenance scheme provided by the invention is suitable for the maintenance scheme optimization problem of roads, bridges and general buildings, the application range is wide, and the data is accurate.

title: Deep learning image feature matching method and system based on preference guide filtering
abstract: The invention relates to a deep learning image feature matching method based on preference guide filtering, and the method comprises the following steps: 1, building an initial feature matching set S for given image pairs I and I 'through employing an SIFT algorithm; 2, performing mismatching elimination through a preference guide filtering network to obtain a probability set W which is matched as an inner point; 3, regarding the probability set W obtained in the step 2 as a weight set, and estimating an essential matrix through a weighted eight-point algorithm; and 4, recovering an accurate relative attitude according to the essential matrix obtained in the step 3. The method and the system are beneficial to improving the accuracy of image feature matching.

title: Intelligent environmental control method for agricultural field
abstract: The present invention relates to an intelligent environmental control method, which includes: storing reference data in an artificial intelligence system, analyzing the reference data, and establishing a prediction system. The reference data includes environmental data, environmental control equipment set, and biological properties. The artificial intelligence system analyzes the reference data with algorithm and performs machine learning to establish the prediction system. Environmental parameters of a to-be-controlled agricultural field are input to the prediction system, wherein the environmental parameters include a predicted environmental parameter within an interval, an environmental control equipment parameter, and a biological parameter. The prediction system calculates the environmental parameters to obtain a recommended data and accordingly outputs a recommended equipment list. The artificial intelligence system automatically controls an environmental control equipment module of the agricultural field according to the recommended equipment list, thereby maintaining an optimized environment for agriculture.

title: DEEP LEARNING SYSTEM FOR ESTIMATING OBJECT VOLUME, WEIGHT AND CROP YIELDS BASED ON REMOTE IMAGING
applicants: THE STATE OF ISRAEL MINISTRY OF AGRICULTURE & RURAL DEVELOPMENT AGRICULTURAL RES ORGANIZATION ARO VO [IL]
B G NEGEV TECHNOLOGIES & APPLICATIONS LTD AT BEN GURION UNIV [IL]
abstract: A method of in-situ estimating volume and mass of a plurality of objects comprises: (a) obtaining at least one image including said plurality of objects; (b) detecting said of objects within said image; (c) individually contouring said objects; (d) individually modelling shapes of said objects; and (e) individually estimating a volume and mass of said objects.

title: Branch identification method for pruning robot in unstructured environment
abstract: The invention relates to a branch identification method for a pruning robot in an unstructured environment, and belongs to the field of intelligent agriculture. Firstly, branch images in a natural environment are collected, branch types and pruning modes are manually marked, then the images are preprocessed, encoding and attention weighting are carried out on image features of different sizes, fruits and branches of an original image are segmented, and only branches are left in the images. And finally, carrying out edge extraction on the binarized image, and obtaining the type and pruning method of the branches by using an SVM classifier. The method solves the problems that traditional target detection is easily influenced by a complex background in an unstructured environment and fruit shielding and branch overlapping need to be avoided in the pruning process, and also overcomes the defects that a general deep learning neural network model needs a large number of training sets, the calculation amount is large, the calculation time is long, the requirement for computer hardware is high, and the cost is low. And a lightweight network structure is used, so that the parameter quantity of model training is greatly reduced.

title: Image sample set quality evaluation method and device and storage medium
applicants: ACAD OF AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY SCIENCE IN BEIJING
abstract: The invention discloses a quality evaluation method and device of an image sample set and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: determining face sampling quality associated with a face target in a face sample image, and determining a first evaluation parameter of an image sample set according to the face sampling quality; determining a second evaluation parameter of the image sample set according to the distribution of the face sample images among different personnel categories; according to the number of effective sample images in the image sample set, a third evaluation parameter of the image sample set is determined, and the effective sample images are face sample images suitable for determining categories through a deep learning-based model; and evaluating the quality of the image sample set according to the first evaluation parameter, the second evaluation parameter and the third evaluation parameter.

title: HAMED FD: FARMING, AI-BASED DOCTOR FOR ALL
abstract: It is the time to monitor plants completely automatically, by artificial intelligence means (AI-Based), to watch the plants during growing up [Fig. 1]. This system, HAMED FD, is a comprehensive one to do this and to help all the people around the world or even universe, when travelling to Moon or Mars for instance, disregarding of their race, religion, wealth, etc. It also could be useful for those that are in distant places without accessing to specialists (e.g. farmers), those who live in poor areas or those who travel to distant places without accessing to any specialist. HAMED FD is a completely automatic doctor for all plants (and also seeds) using artificial intelligence means (AI-Based). HAMED FD can help clients to know the best plants/seeds for agriculture in the farms, to watch and control plants/seeds and pests (if any), to control the quantity and quality of water, minerals, pesticides, and so on, and to identify/control if the plants/seeds are growing up normally and productively without human assistance (e.g. farmer help), and if soil, water and environmental conditions in which the plants are (or will be) cultivated have the requirements/benefits for cultivating the plants or seeds. HAMED FD can be used for all kind of plants and seeds. Providing that HAMED FD will be used globally, cultivated and harvested plants can be monitored around the world and some useful information (like availability of certain plants in the case of needs for medical purposes or people's daily consumption in different areas) can be obtained and managed. Thereby, HAMED FD can estimate required future needs like human resources and other facilities to handle different situations before they actually would be happened. As shown in [fig. 1], FD.DATABASE Unit stores all the data required for HAMED FD, and FD.ALGORITHMS Unit represents the correct forms of plants in different stages, from seeds to productive plants, with regard to their pests and pesticides, their needed water, soil and minerals, their needed costs and proposed revenues, and the environmental conditions in which the plants are growing in order to be controlled more easily in FD.AIU Unit for further analysis. FD.DATABASE and FD.ALGORITHMS units shape the first stream reaching FD.AIU Unit. The second stream includes FD.INPUTS and FD.PROCESSING units which then are joined to the first stream and connected to FD.AIU Unit. FD.AIU is the heart of the system and is responsible to detect best plants/seeds for agriculture in the farms, and to automatically control properties (e.g. type, shape, quantity, quality) of plants and seeds, soil, water and minerals, pests, their damages, and related pesticides, and the environmental conditions in which the plants and seeds are cultivating and growing in order to maintain/enhance growth quality and productivity of the plants/seeds (analyzing the output of FD.PROCESSING Unit with regard to FD.DATABASE and FD.ALGORITHMS units). The next step of HAMED FD is to tell the results to the clients via FD.COMM Unit. Ultimately, there are some sorts of facilities that can be offered by HAMED FD via units named as: FD.CW, FD.RA, FD.SUP, FD.FIN, FD.INSUR, FD.EMP, FD.MARK, FD.LEARN, and FD.MAN. Key words: Farming, Agriculture, Doctor, Artificial Intelligence, AI, Virtual, Instrument, Machine Learning, Pattern Recognition, Statistics, Data Mining, Insurance, Finance, Financing, Store, Learn, Marketing, Management, Business, Administration, Nutrition, Plant, Seed, Pest, Pesticide, Farmer, Soil, Water, Mineral, Supplier.

title: Fruit tree statistical method based on deep learning technology
abstract: The invention discloses a fruit tree statistical method based on a deep learning technology. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining a satellite remote sensing image of a to-be-counted area; respectively selecting a plurality of training sample sub-regions and a plurality of test sample sub-regions on the satellite remote sensing image; aiming at the training sample sub-region, sampling the image by adopting a bilinear interpolation method; a random cutting method is adopted to cut the area to serve as a training sample of a deep learning model; performing rectangular frame labeling on the fruit trees in the image, and inputting the rectangular frame into a deep learning model for training to obtain a fruit tree target detection model; for the test sample sub-regions, sampling and then dividing are carried out, and a test sample set is constructed; the test images are sent to a fruit tree target detection model for prediction, and frame coordinates of fruit trees in each image are obtained; performing a non-maximum suppression method on a predicted frame to eliminate a repeatedly predicted bounding box; and counting the line number of the merged annotation file to obtain the number of fruit trees in the region.

title: Rice seedling leaf age identification method based on machine vision
abstract: The invention relates to a rice seedling leaf age identification method based on machine vision, and the method comprises the steps: S1, in a rice seedling raising growth period, manually detecting the leaf age of a seedling, collecting a rice seedling picture through an unmanned plane, and recording the manually detected seedling leaf age corresponding to the rice seedling picture; s2, constructing different training sets by using an image preprocessing technology; s3, constructing a detection model for different leaf ages of the rice seedlings by adopting a traditional machine vision technology; s4, constructing detection models of different leaf ages of seedlings based on deep learning, and comparing the detection accuracy rates of different network models; and S5, selecting evaluation indexes to test a traditional machine learning model and a deep learning detection model, and selecting an optimal or appropriate rice seedling leaf age intelligent detection model. According to the method, an intelligent identification system for the leaf age of the rice seedlings can be constructed, guidance analysis is provided for subsequent rice seedling research, and the method belongs to the technical field of identification of the leaf age of the rice seedlings.

title: AGRICULTURAL SUPPORT SYSTEM AND METHOD USING BIG DATA OF SMART FARM
abstract: The present invention relates to a system and a method for supporting agriculture using smart farm big data. The system of the present invention includes: an interface unit collecting smart farm data including at least one of target crop growth information, environmental information, cultivation facility information, farming information, and management information; an integrated control unit analyzing the collected smart farm data and pre-provided data to generate an artificial intelligence model; and a management server including a management support unit. When smart farm management request information is received, the management support unit analyzes the received smart farm management request information in accordance with the generated artificial intelligence model to generate smart farm decision-making information. According to the present invention, smart farm big data including target crop growth information, environmental information, cultivation facility information, farming information, management information, or the like is collected, a cloud platform built with the collected smart farm big data and artificial intelligence technology are used, and thus agricultural decision making necessary for smart farm operation and management can be effectively supported.

title: Plant leaf disease identification method based on OfficientNet network and deep learning
abstract: The invention provides a plant leaf disease identification method based on an OfficientNet network and deep learning. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring an image data set containing a plant normal state and a plant leaf disease; performing data enhancement processing and data expansion processing on the image data set to obtain a training data set; the method comprises the following steps: building an OfficientNet model on the basis of an OfficientNet network and deep learning; the training data set is input into the OfficientNet model for training, and the OfficientNet model after training is completed is obtained; and carrying out plant leaf disease identification on the image data containing the plant leaf disease by using an EfficientNet model. According to the method, plant diseases in the natural environment can be quickly and accurately identified, corresponding measures can be taken, the method has great significance in control and treatment of plant diseases, plant diseases can be timely and accurately diagnosed, and the method has great significance in sustainable and correct agriculture and prevention of unnecessary waste of financial resources and other resources.

title: MINI DRONE AND AGBOT BASED DISTRIBUTED SYSTEM AND METHOD OF OFFERING AGRONOMICS SERVICES TO FARMERS
abstract: In this invention a Web Server based distributed cellular system to provide 21st century total digital precision agriculture to small and uneducated poor farmers is proposed. A service model is used to avoid farmers owning any equipment and a system's provided service agent becomes on ground mentor of the farmer. The invention uses plurality of low cost mini Dynamic Remotely Operated Navigation Equipment (DRONEs), automated mini robots-size of a shoe box mini AGBOTs wirelessly connected to a remote central Web Server. The central web server system uses agricultural specialists to provide farmers 21st century technology to manage their farms and increase crop yields, save amount of fertilizers used and irrigation needed without owning any equipment. Photogrammetry and radio metric images obtained from multi spectral camera mounted on these mini DRONEs allows agronomists, and other specialists at the central server site to offer all crop management functions. Data analytics, Artificial Intelligence, AI, tools used at the remote server will provide forecast on expected yield of various crops to plan for buffer stocks, and also information to insurance companies on crops affected in case of natural disasters like hail storms, floods and droughts. And thus providing quick and timely relief to affected farmers and produce growers. The system uses Autonomous mini AGBOT DRONE with its built in AI tools to weed the farms and thus avoiding use of herbicides, costly and harmful to farmers as well our environment. The mini AGBOTs can be used with the canopy of crop plants and can analyze soil samples in the field. DRONEs provide selected spraying of fertilizer and fungicide to the crop.

title: Vegetable disease identification method based on Cycle-GAN and ResNeXt
applicants: GUANGZHOU HUA AGRICULTURAL INTELLIGENCE AGRICULTURAL TECH CO LTD
abstract: Aiming at the limitation of the prior art, the invention provides a vegetable disease identification method based on Cycle-GAN and ResNeXt, and the method uses a model based on a deep learning network ResNeXt to carry out the identification of a diseased leaf. Model training is expanded by a mixed data set comprising existing public data, manually acquired data and pseudo data generated by a Cycle-GAN-based model, so that the generalization of the model is improved; according to the scheme of the invention, the method is higher in recognition result refinement degree and accuracy, and has a better practical application value.

title: Piglet nipple counting method based on deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a piglet nipple counting method based on deep learning. The method comprises the following steps of S1, performing video acquisition on the abdomen of a piglet; s2, performing frame-by-frame screening on the acquired video, filtering blurred images, and retaining clear images; s3, performing target segmentation extraction on the pig body by using a target segmentation network; s4, inputting the segmented target extraction image into a counting network to count piglet nipples; and S5, realizing final counting of piglet nipples according to a majority counting result of the multi-frame image. The piglet nipple counting device has the advantages of efficiently, accurately and automatically counting piglet nipples, manual counting is not needed, the labor force is effectively reduced, and the counting efficiency is effectively improved.

title: Automatic feeding equipment for agriculture and animal husbandry for artificial intelligence
abstract: The invention provides automatic feeding equipment for agriculture and animal husbandry for artificial intelligence. The artificial intelligence automatic feeding equipment for agriculture and animal husbandry comprises a feed bin, a quantity control mechanism and a feeding mechanism, a telescopic support is fixedly connected to the bottom of the feed bin, a bottom plate is fixedly connected to the bottom of the telescopic support, a feeding groove is formed in the top of the feed bin, and a baffle is fixedly connected to the inner wall of the feed bin; the bottom of the baffle communicates with a discharging pipe, and an electromagnetic valve is arranged on one side of the discharging pipe. The quantity control mechanism comprises a storage hopper, a movable plate, a weight sensor, an air cylinder, a roller and a controller, the two sides of the storage hopper are fixedly connected with the inner wall of the feed bin through fixing blocks, and one side of the inner wall of the storage hopper is rotationally connected with the movable plate through a rotating shaft. The artificial intelligence automatic feeding equipment for agriculture and animal husbandry has the advantages of being capable of achieving automatic feeding, convenient to use, high in feeding efficiency and capable of controlling the feeding amount.

title: Artificial intelligence tea picking robot
applicants: QINGDAO LARGE GRAIN AGRICULTURAL INFORMATION LTD COMPANY
QINGDAO GREEN AGRICULTURE INTELLIGENT TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE LIMITED COMPANY
abstract: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence tea leaf picking robot which is composed of a tea leaf image collecting device, a 5G image transmission module, a cloud decision-making platform, a control circuit, an intelligent tea leaf picking robot arm, a tea leaf recycling device, a self-propelled operation platform and the like. Tea leaf canopy images are collected in real time through an image sensor, then the canopy images are quickly transmitted to a cloud end in an uplink mode through a 5G base station, target positioning of tender shoot and new shoot picking points is conducted at the cloud end through an image processing method of YoLo deep learning, decision signals are output, the decision signals are fed back to an execution control circuit through a 5G downlink, and the execution control circuit is controlled to execute control on the tea leaf canopy images. The robot arm and the end effector array are driven to achieve tea leaf picking, the tea leaf recycling device adsorbs tea leaves into a collecting box in a negative pressure adsorption mode, and the picking process is completed. The method combines 5G cloud decision and transfer learning, realizes real-time picking of tea tender shoots and new shoots through the two-dimensional spider hand structure, and has great application value.

title: Parameter optimization method and system based on genetic breeding method
applicants: XINJIANG BEAVER AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY SOFTWARE LTD COMPANY
abstract: The invention discloses a parameter optimization method and system based on a genetic breeding method, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence systems.The method comprises the steps that S1, measurement data are obtained and preprocessed, typical sequence data meeting detailed balance conditions are obtained, and the step S2 is executed; s2, establishing an orthogonal coordinate system based on the typical sequence data meeting the detailed balance condition, judging whether the orthogonal coordinate system has invariance or not, if not, executing the step S3, and if yes, executing the step S5; s3, calculating the projection of the measurement data to the orthogonal coordinate system, judging whether the orthogonal coordinate system has invariance or not, if not, executing the step S4, and if yes, executing the step S5; s4, calculating the correlation of the measurement data on the orthogonal coordinate system, judging whether the correlation has invariance or not, if not, executing the step S2, and if yes, executing the step S5; and S5, outputting typical sequence data, performing independent optimization modeling, and outputting a fitting result meeting an optimization condition.

title: Far-end and autonomously-controlled cultivation, irrigation and picking device and method
abstract: The invention discloses a far-end and autonomously-controlled cultivating, irrigating and picking device and method, and aims to solve the problems of high labor capacity, heavy physical labor and low operation efficiency. The far-end and autonomously-controlled cultivating, irrigating and picking device and autonomously control are adopted to realize the purpose of cultivating and irrigating and picking fruits in a house and a far-end and autonomously-controlled cultivating and farming field. Aiming at the problems of crop growth death, poor fruit quality and the like caused by low planting efficiency and unbalanced soil fertilizer and microorganisms, the invention provides a remote and autonomous control telescopic soil turning shovel, shovel, soil loosening device, sharp claw type hoe arm, rake, seeding device, autonomous seeding, radar autonomous navigation, movement, plant soil sampling device and autonomous picking device and method. The method solves the problem of intelligent management of crop cultivation and picking, and is applied to the field of artificial intelligence agriculture.

title: Tree point cloud completion method based on deep learning
applicants: NORTHWEST AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY UNIV
abstract: The invention discloses a tree point cloud completion method based on deep learning. The method comprises two stages of missing point cloud prediction and completion result optimization. In the prediction stage, an end-to-end neural network is used, and missing parts are predicted through given incomplete tree point clouds. In the stage, only the point cloud of the missing part is predicted, and the input point cloud is kept unchanged. However, the prediction result is not well fused with the input point cloud. Therefore, a point cloud optimization network is adopted to further process a prediction result and original input so as to optimize overall distribution. Results show that the combination of the incomplete tree point cloud completion, the prediction network and the optimization network achieves a good effect. The method has the characteristics of high completion efficiency, real form and wide application range. In order to avoid high storage cost and geometric information loss caused by voxelization, the network is constructed and operated on the original point cloud, and the incomplete tree point cloud can be effectively repaired.

title: Disease identification and light supplement adjustment method for vegetable planting
applicants: YUZHOU XUAN HYPER ECOLOGICAL AGRICULTURE SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract: The invention provides a disease identification and light supplement adjustment method for vegetable planting, and relates to the technical field of vegetable planting, and the method comprises the following steps: erecting a shed cover capable of opening a ceiling on a vegetable planting land, and arranging an identification probe and a multicolor lamp in the shed cover; at the control terminal, taking the main vegetables as research objects, utilizing a networking database as a knowledge source, collecting concepts, attributes and instances of the main vegetables, and constructing a knowledge base; the method comprises the following steps: building a variety model of various vegetables around a knowledge base; according to the method, a knowledge base is constructed by utilizing a networked database, so that a model of various vegetables is constructed, the model has a comparison response function through deep learning training and concept attribute response result addition on the basis of spectrum sensitive band extraction and color texture feature extraction, feature comparison is performed after vegetable images are shot, and the analysis result is more accurate. Therefore, the variety and the growth cycle of the vegetables can be determined, the color and the intensity of the multicolor lamp can be accurately controlled to supplement light for the vegetables, and the yield of the vegetables is improved.

title: Remote and autonomous control picking, processing and conveying device and method
abstract: In order to solve the problems of heavy physical labor and low picking operation efficiency, the remote and autonomous controlled picking device is adopted to realize remote and autonomous controlled fruit picking, and the device comprises an autonomous picking device, a radar autonomous navigation device, a moving device, a multi-sensing device and a conveyor belt, the invention discloses a light processing device, which effectively realizes the integration of autonomous identification of plants and maturity thereof, positioning of plants, picking, light processing, packaging, conveying and storage, solves the problem of intelligent management of crop picking, and is applied to the field of artificial intelligence agriculture.

title: Litchi disease and insect pest identification method based on deep learning
abstract: Aiming at the limitation of the prior art, the invention provides a litchi disease and insect pest identification method based on deep learning. According to the method, a deep learning training result is applied, various litchi diseases and insect pests can be automatically identified, and the problems of low efficiency, poor identification effect and the like of a traditional artificial disease and insect pest identification method are solved; according to a litchi disease and insect pest recognition model used in the scheme, an attention mechanism SimAM is introduced on the basis of a lightweight convolutional neural network ShuffleNetV2, an activation function Hardswitch is used, and a Dropout regularization method is adopted in a full connection layer; the litchi disease and insect pest recognition model can effectively extract important features, suppress interference of non-important features and improve network classification recognition performance, the number of network model parameters is not additionally increased, and storage and calculation expenses of the model are reduced.

title: Deep learning-based common crop multi-category pest recognition method and device
abstract: Aiming at the limitation of the prior art, the invention provides a common crop multi-category pest recognition method based on deep learning, the deep learning model DenseNet convolutional neural network is improved, a selective kernel unit, a characterization batch standardization module and an adaptive activation function ACON are combined through integrated learning, and the recognition efficiency is improved. The convolutional neural network can adaptively adjust the size of a receptive field according to the input of the network to capture targets of different sizes; noise of input information is reduced, features of the input information are enhanced, and the features obey stable distribution; the comprehensive performance of the network is enhanced; the DenseNet convolutional neural network can effectively process data sets of multiple crop varieties and multiple pest types, the recognition rate of the pest recognition model obtained after training on crop pests is improved, and the requirements of a real environment can be well met in the actual application process.

title: Citrus nutrient deficiency symptom identification method based on enhanced Raman spectrum and image assistance
abstract: The invention discloses a citrus nutrient deficiency symptom identification method based on enhanced Raman spectrum and image assistance, and belongs to the field of artificial intelligence and Raman spectrum application, the method comprises the following steps: acquiring enhanced Raman spectrum data of citrus leaves, and constructing an enhanced Raman spectrum identification network for nutrient deficiency symptom identification; obtaining a visible light image of a citrus leaf, and constructing a visible light image auxiliary classification network for element deficiency symptom identification; and identifying the element deficiency symptom of the to-be-identified citrus leaf by using the enhanced Raman spectrum identification network and the visible light image auxiliary classification network, and performing weighted summation on the identification results to obtain a final identification result of the element deficiency symptom of the citrus leaf. Raman signals are amplified through the surface enhanced Raman technology, and weak component information in the leaf is reflected; the element deficiency symptom is comprehensively judged by combining the enhanced Raman spectrum recognition network and the visible light image auxiliary classification network, and the accuracy of citrus element deficiency symptom recognition is greatly improved.

title: Group pig lying mode recognition method based on unsupervised clustering and deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a herd pig lying mode recognition method based on unsupervised clustering and deep learning, and the method comprises the following steps: collecting an initial data set, and carrying out the unified cutting of an image; extracting a target image by using a Grabcut image segmentation method; performing binarization on the target image through dynamic threshold segmentation, finding a clustering center by using an unsupervised clustering algorithm Mean-shift, fitting a distance from the center to the clustering center through each ellipse, and outputting a variance and a standard deviation of the distance; and processing the standard deviation to enable the data value to be mapped between [0, 1], and utilizing the trained CNN-SVM model to identify the herd pig lying mode. The method has the beneficial effects that high-precision classification and identification are performed on the five lying modes of the pigs based on the CNN-SVM classification model, the identification accuracy is 97.09%, the balance accuracy is 96.59%, and the balance accuracy weighting is 97.07%.

title: Machine learning sampling method and system with interpretation function
applicants: XINJIANG BEAVER AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY SOFTWARE LTD COMPANY
abstract: The invention discloses a machine learning sampling method and system with an interpretation function, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence systems.The method comprises the steps that S1, machine learning initial data are obtained, after data preprocessing, the machine learning initial data are calculated through a Tagoda algorithm, a two-dimensional conjugate sequence is obtained, and the step S2 is executed; s2, acquiring random data, segmenting the random data, combining the segmented random data to form a random data sequence, fusing the random data sequence and a two-dimensional conjugate sequence, generating an alternative data sequence, judging whether the alternative data sequence has conjugacy or not, and if yes, entering the step S3; if not, returning to the step S1; s3, carrying out exchange pairing on the alternative data sequence, judging whether the paired data sequence meets a convergence condition or not, if so, entering step S4, and if not, entering step S3; if not, returning to the step S1; and S4, performing fitting calculation on the paired data sequence to obtain a statistical relationship value of the paired data sequence.

title: Intelligent fish sorting method and system based on deep feature fusion
abstract: The invention discloses an intelligent fish sorting method based on deep feature fusion, and the method comprises the steps: (1), obtaining an image of a to-be-recognized fish, carrying out the preprocessing through an image preprocessing positioning algorithm, and carrying out the real-time positioning; (2) performing feature extraction on the preprocessed image through a deep learning algorithm, inputting the extracted features into a pre-trained convolutional neural network model, classifying the image to obtain the type of the to-be-identified fish, and outputting an identification result; and (3) the intelligent fish sorting system temporarily stores the to-be-recognized fishes according to the recognition result and the types, and sorting is completed. According to the method, the convolutional neural network based on deep feature fusion is adopted, an up-sampling layer is added to a deep convolutional layer and is spliced and fused with features of a second deconvolutional layer, deep edge detail information and shallow contour features of the image are combined, the method has higher feature capture capability, the features of the image are comprehensively mined, and the image quality is improved. And the fish identification accuracy in the water environment is improved.

title: Deep learning image matching method based on joint representation attention mechanism
abstract: The invention relates to a deep learning image matching method based on a joint representation attention mechanism. Comprising the following steps: step 1, establishing an initial matching set by using an SIFT algorithm and an NN matching algorithm; 2, performing mismatching elimination by using an improved network JRA-Net to obtain a probability set which is matched as an inner point; 3, regarding the probability set output in the step 2 as a weight set, and estimating an essential matrix by using a weighted eight-point algorithm; and 4, carrying out regression on an accurate relative attitude (rotation and translation) through an essential matrix. According to the method, related theoretical knowledge for jointly representing an attention mechanism and a large number of experiments on an indoor and outdoor public data set indicate that the method has the characteristics of high precision, high efficiency and high robustness, and can be widely applied to computer vision tasks such as three-dimensional reconstruction, remote sensing image splicing, instant localization and map construction.

title: Accurate detection method and system for dense plums picked by robot
abstract: The invention discloses a method and a system for accurately detecting dense plums picked by a robot. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring images of fruits in an orchard through image acquisition equipment; performing inspection processing to obtain a target detection image meeting requirements; performing data annotation of fruits with different maturity degrees on the target detection image to obtain an annotated image; dividing the marked image into a training set and a test set according to a proportion, and obtaining the number of mature proportion fruits in the training set; judging whether data balance processing is needed or not according to the fruit ripening proportion in the training set; performing data enhancement processing on the balance training set data; improving the target detection model; training and predicting the data enhancement training set by improving the target detection model to obtain a detection result; according to the invention, the deep learning model is applied to identification and picking of plums, can be deployed on a robot picking platform, and provides technical support for yield estimation of orchards and research of picking robots.

title: Artificial intelligence-based stubble chopping and returning machine capable of automatically cleaning entanglements
applicants: LIYUNNAN HONG KONG CITY RUNNING FIRING MACHINERY LTD COMPANY
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of farming, and discloses an artificial intelligence-based stubble chopping and returning machine capable of automatically cleaning entanglements, which comprises a traction connecting plate, an illuminating lamp, a crushing mechanism, a protective cover, a side supporting plate and an auxiliary crushing device, and is characterized in that the traction connecting plate is fixedly connected to the middle part of the front end of the crushing mechanism; the protective cover is fixedly installed on the upper portion of one end of the crushing mechanism, the illuminating lamps are symmetrically and fixedly installed on the two sides of the front end of the crushing mechanism, the side supporting plates are rotationally installed on the two sides of the front end of the crushing mechanism, and the auxiliary crushing device is fixedly connected to the tail end of the crushing mechanism. In the using process of the device, root systems in a ploughing field can be conveniently crushed, and the wound root systems can be automatically crushed and removed.

title: Fruit tree root system identification and positioning method based on deep learning and ground penetrating radar
abstract: The invention discloses a fruit tree root system identification and positioning method based on deep learning and a ground penetrating radar. The method comprises the following steps: determining a circular orbit taking a target fruit tree as a center as a detection route of the ground penetrating radar; carrying out preprocessing operation on the B-scan image generated by the ground penetrating radar; inputting the preprocessed B-scan image into a pre-trained network model for root target detection, and positioning a target hyperbolic region; and extracting the vertex of the hyperbolic curve of the target, extracting the hyperbolic curve of the root target based on algebraic distance fitting, and calculating the position and diameter of the root target. According to the method, the fruit tree root system can be identified and positioned under the condition that the root system and the surrounding soil environment are not damaged, the detection range is controllable, the method is simple and convenient to operate, and compared with a traditional method, the working efficiency can be remarkably improved, and the identification and positioning accuracy is high.

title: A SELF-CONTROLLED UNMANNED AERIAL VEHICLE SYSTEM FOR FARMING APPLICATIONS AND ITS WORKING METHOD THEREOF
abstract: The present invention generally relates to a self-controlled unmanned aerial vehicle system for farming applications and its working method thereof. The system comprises a cross-configured drone configured to takeoff upon receiving instructions from a ground control centre or a transmitter for flying in a complete angle, wherein butterfly net-wings are attached to proximal ends of the drone. A serial communication controller configured with a GPS (global positioning system) guidance unit to receive real-time coordinates from a pre-loaded trajectory to navigate said drone. A remote sensing camera positioned at distal end of said drone to monitor plants closely and take images/videos in a desired frame under stable flight condition configured to deliver image, audio, and video transmission to said control center and a prediction unit adapting deep learning approach to diagnose said images to detect diseases and other problems of plants and to control flight via a user interface, wherein said user interface comprises preloaded location coordinates and controlling data for complete controlling via a mission plan script feature which send threw a ground telemetry module to aircraft's air telemetry module to avoid human interference in flight control process. co C 2 . ,a & E 03 -! title: Crop seed testing system based on deep learning
applicants: NORTHWEST AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY UNIV
abstract: The utility model relates to a crop seed testing system based on deep learning, belongs to the technical field of agricultural machinery, and particularly belongs to the field of crop seed testing. The device mainly comprises a support frame, a transmission device, a control device, a material conveying device, a baffle device, an information acquisition device and a seed testing device. The motor of the transmission device drives the horizontal conveying belt to convey crop grains, the baffle device enables the crop grains to be tiled in columns, video streams collected by the information collection device are transmitted to the embedded development board through the data line to count the crop grains in the video streams, and phenotypic characters of grain parts are detected. And finally, a detection result is displayed on a display screen. The crop seed testing system based on deep learning has the advantages of being high in seed testing speed, free of influence of environment light sources, low in manufacturing cost, high in testing precision and controllable in working speed, can effectively solve the problems that traditional artificial crop seed testing is long in time consumption, high in cost and the like, and can provide technical help for large-scale development of breeding work.

title: Internet-based information integrated management system
applicants: SHANGHAI RUQIAN NETWORK SCIENCE AND TECH LIMITED COMPANY
abstract: The invention discloses an Internet-based information integrated management system, which can realize intelligent, scientific and unattended irrigation operation in the field of crop irrigation through research and application of the system. The intelligent irrigation information management system based on the Internet can greatly reduce production cost, reasonably control irrigation water, reduce waste of water resources and reduce labor force, provides a more scientific irrigation management decision for crop irrigation operation, conforms to national conditions of China, and has wide application prospects. According to the design of the system, technologies such as a sensor technology, artificial intelligence and big data analysis are adopted, so that self-help irrigation is achieved, manual intervention is completely eliminated, the problem that irrigation depends on labor force is greatly solved, and the system has the advantages of achieving scientific irrigation, saving irrigation water, reducing labor force cost and keeping high efficiency. The method is of great significance to construction and development of intelligent agriculture and smart countryside.

title: Landscaping green land occupation automatic supervision system and tree variety classification method
applicants: ZHEJIANG AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY UNIV YANG COLLEGE
abstract: The invention discloses a landscaping green land occupation automatic supervision system, which comprises an intelligent acquisition terminal, a data analysis processing module and an integrated management module, and is characterized in that the intelligent acquisition terminal comprises a camera, an intelligent sensor and dynamic multi-point monitoring equipment; the data analysis and processing module comprises a data verification and release unit, a network service unit, a data editing and processing unit, a data output unit and a data general control unit, the integrated management module comprises an examination unit, an application unit and an auditing unit, and the output end of the data editing and processing unit is connected with the input end of the data output unit. The output end of the data output unit is connected with the input end of the network service unit, deep learning training is carried out on the planned data set by using a deep belief network to obtain a final classification model for prediction, and finally the category of the point cloud belonging to the landscaping green space is marked in the original point cloud. And the tree classification operation is completed.

title: Task decision-making method and device, equipment and storage medium
abstract: The embodiment of the invention discloses a task decision method and device, equipment and a storage medium, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: sampling from an offline data pool to obtain training sample sets respectively corresponding to a plurality of tasks; adopting a data enhancement method to obtain a plurality of training sample sets corresponding to each task; generating a task representation vector of the training sample set through a task inference network; determining the training loss of the task inference network by adopting a comparative learning method; determining the training loss of the strategy network and the training loss of the evaluation network based on the state vector, the action vector and the task representation vector of each training sample; and training the task decision model based on the training loss. According to the method, the task inference network of the task decision model is trained in combination with comparative learning, and the practicability and generalization performance of the task decision model are improved. The method can be applied to scenes such as robot control, automatic driving and intelligent agriculture.

title: Poultry health assessment method and system based on group exercise amount statistical characteristics
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and provides a poultry health assessment method and system based on group exercise amount statistical characteristics, and the method comprises the following steps: obtaining poultry data from a foot ring which is worn by poultry and is provided with a three-axis sensor, and carrying out the preprocessing of the obtained data, and obtaining the poultry exercise amount data; performing abnormal data detection and correction on the poultry exercise amount data to obtain corrected poultry exercise amount data; performing statistics and data distribution on the poultry exercise amount data of the same individual and group in different time periods according to the corrected poultry exercise amount data, and performing individual scoring and group scoring on the poultry according to the statistics and data distribution results of the poultry exercise amount data; and evaluating the health state of the poultry in combination with the poultry exercise amount data, the individual scoring result and the group scoring result to obtain a poultry health evaluation result. The poultry health detection precision and accuracy can be effectively improved, and the poultry health condition can be visually reflected.

title: Crystal forms of methyl(2R*,4R*)-4-[[(5S)-3-(3,5-difluorophenyl)-5-vinyl-4H-isoxazole-5-carbonyl]amino]tetrahydrofuran-2-carboxylate and their herbicidal synergistic effects
abstract: The present invention relates to the crystal forms of methyl(2R*,4R*)-4-[[(5S)-3-(3,5-difluorophenyl)-5-vinyl-4H-isoxazole-5-carbonyl]amino]tetrahydrofuran-2-carboxylate (I) exisiting in the form of two stereoisomers: Methyl(2R,4R)-4-[[(5S)-3-(3,5-difluorophenyl)-5-vinyl-4H-isoxazole-5-carbonyl]-amino]tetrahydrofuran-2-carboxylate of formula (Ia) and methyl (2S,4S)-4-[[(5S)-3-(3,5-difluorophenyl)-5-vinyl-4H-isoxazole-5-carbonyl]amino]tetrahydrofuran-2-carboxylate of formula (Ib), to a method for preparing the crystal forms, to the use for preparing stable agrochemical formulations, and to the use in the field of agriculture for controlling harmful plants.

title: SYSTEMS AND METHODS OF URBAN ROOFTOP AGRICULTURE WITH SMART CITY DATA INTEGRATION
abstract: An IoT-enabled network of urban rooftop farms. Systems and methods include receiving image data; processing the image data with an artificial intelligence model; determining, based on the processing of the image data, a set of pixels of the image data meets one or more thresholds; and based on determining the set of pixels meets the one or more thresholds, recording the set of pixels as a viable agriculture space. Systems and methods also include receiving data from one or more sensors, wherein each of the one or more sensors is associated with an agriculture space; generating one or more metrics indicative of farming viability associated with the agriculture space based on the data received form the one or more sensors; and generating a user interface comprising the generated metrics.

title: LEAF TEMPERATURE ACQUISITION DEVICE, CROP GROWING SYSTEM, METHOD FOR OBTAINING LEAF TEMPERATURE, AND PROGRAM FOR OBTAINING LEAF TEMPERATURE
abstract: To grow crops based on measurement values.SOLUTION: The temperature of a crop leaf is obtained from a thermal image. In this process, separation of the leaf and the background in the thermal image is performed using deep learning. A growing environment is controlled based on the obtained leaf temperature, the area percentage of the leaf at that temperature, and the duration of the temperature. The environment is controlled so that VPD is in a specific range under the conditions of ΔT=T-Tm and VPD=((100-RH)/100)×SVP, where RH is the humidity of the environment surrounding the leaf, SVP is the saturated vapor pressure of the leaf of the crop, T is the temperature of the leaf, Tm is the temperature of the environment surrounding the leaf.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: Tea garden disease and insect pest automatic detection system based on deep learning
abstract: The utility model discloses a tea garden disease and insect pest automatic detection system based on deep learning, which comprises an image acquisition unit and a disease and insect pest self-diagnosis unit, the image acquisition unit comprises a trolley (1), a sliding table module (2) capable of moving up and down is arranged on the trolley (1), a mechanical arm (3) is arranged on a sliding block of the sliding table module (2), and the mechanical arm (3) is connected with the sliding table module (2). A camera (4) is arranged at the tail end of the mechanical arm (3), the pest and disease damage self-diagnosis unit comprises a diagnosis controller (6) and a communication module (7), and the diagnosis controller (6) is electrically connected with the camera (4) and the communication module (7), receives images shot by the camera (4), conducts pest and disease damage diagnosis through the images and sends diagnosis results to a network through the communication module (7). The tea garden disease and insect pest automatic detection system based on deep learning provided by the utility model solves the problems of low disease and insect pest detection accuracy, low efficiency, waste of human resources and the like.

title: Tea garden environment monitoring system based on Internet of Things and artificial intelligence technology
abstract: The utility model discloses a tea garden environment monitoring system based on the Internet of Things and the artificial intelligence technology, which is characterized by comprising an environment information acquisition subsystem, a network transmission subsystem and an artificial intelligence prediction subsystem, the network transmission subsystem is connected with the environment information acquisition subsystem and the artificial intelligence prediction subsystem, and transmits information acquired by the environment information acquisition subsystem to the artificial intelligence prediction subsystem. The tea garden environment monitoring system based on the Internet of Things and the artificial intelligence technology detects and early warns environment variables of the tea garden in real time, and has the advantages of being low in installation cost, flexible and rapid in installation and the like.

title: Image-based cattle uniqueness recognition method, device and management system
applicants: SICHUAN NANSHUI AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY TECH CO LTD
SICHUAN ANIMAL HUSBANDRY SCIENCE RES INSTITUTE
abstract: The invention discloses an image-based cattle uniqueness recognition method and device and a management system, and relates to the field of cattle nose print recognition. The method comprises the steps of pre-processing a cattle nose print image, sending the processed image into a convolutional neural network to extract the characteristic quantity of the cattle nose prints, and registering the cattle nose prints; acquiring the cattle nose prints needing to be recognized, pre-processing the acquired cattle nose print image, and sending the pre-processed image into a deep learning model for feature extraction to obtain a feature vector; matching the feature vector with the feature quantity, and calculating the cosine similarity of the feature vector and the feature quantity; and setting a threshold value, and comparing the cosine similarity with the threshold value to obtain a cattle recognition result. According to the method, the extracted features are matched with the cattle nose prints registered in a database to finally obtain the matched cattle nose prints, so that the cattle individuals are accurately recognized.

title: Automatic feeding equipment for agriculture and animal husbandry for artificial intelligence
