abstract: The utility model discloses an automatic feeding device for artificial intelligence agriculture and animal husbandry, a plurality of feeding basins are installed on a base, a first motor is installed in the base, a connecting rod is installed at the upper end of an output shaft, the axis of the connecting rod and the axis of the output shaft are collinear, the upper end of the connecting rod is fixedly connected with a connecting box, and the connecting box is fixedly connected with the base. A push plate mechanism is installed in the connecting box, a material mixing box is welded to the upper portion of the connecting box, feeding pipes are arranged on the two opposite sides of the material mixing box, the lower ends of the feeding pipes communicate with the material mixing box, a mixing mechanism is installed on the material mixing box, and a quantifying mechanism is connected to the outer side of a connecting rod. According to the artificial intelligence automatic feeding equipment for agriculture and animal husbandry, a second motor is arranged to be matched with a rotating shaft to achieve the effect of rotating and mixing different feeds for stirring spoons, and the stirring spoons are irregularly mounted on the outer side of the rotating shaft, so that the feed mixing effect of the equipment is improved; by arranging the mechanism, the livestock can eat uniformly mixed feed.

title: Livestock body condition monitoring method and system based on binocular vision
applicants: SICHUAN XUEYUE TIANYOU AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention provides a livestock body condition monitoring method and system based on binocular vision, and belongs to the technical field of livestock body condition monitoring. The method comprises the following steps: collecting a binocular image of the tail of livestock by using a camera; positioning the tail of the livestock according to the binocular images of the tail of the livestock, judging whether the livestock moves to a graded position or not according to the size of a calibration frame in the binocular images of the tail of the livestock, and screening out the binocular images of the tail of the livestock meeting conditions; and carrying out classification processing on the livestock tail binocular images meeting the conditions by utilizing a classification network to obtain the body condition score of the livestock. According to the invention, the artificial intelligence technology is adopted to convert the body condition score into a classification problem, and the deep learning algorithm has the characteristics of high precision, high reliability, strong real-time performance and the like; meanwhile, the system is fully automatic, does not need manual assistance or cooperation of livestock, and automatically captures and scores key parts.

title: Farming robot-oriented field corn plant contour extraction method and system
abstract: The invention is suitable for the field of image processing and artificial intelligence, and provides a farming robot-oriented field corn plant contour extraction method and system, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a leaf part image and a root part image of a corn plant in an original image of the corn plant; respectively carrying out denoising processing on the leaf part image and the root part image; extracting blade feature points and root feature points by using a Forstner algorithm, and describing information of the blade feature points and the root feature points by using a Brief algorithm; splicing the denoised leaf part image and the denoised root part image according to the information of the leaf feature points and the root feature points, and determining a spliced image of the corn plant; and extracting the corn plant contour in the spliced image. According to the scheme, the leaf part image and the root part image of the corn plant are processed separately, then the contour is extracted after splicing, contour loss caused by color inconsistency is avoided, and the integrity of the contour of the corn plant is guaranteed.

title: Manipulator for picking different fruits
abstract: The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, and discloses a manipulator for picking different fruits, which comprises a base, an arm part is fixedly mounted at the top end of the base, a fan is fixedly mounted at the top of the arm part, a fixed support is fixedly mounted on the back of the arm part, a big arm is hinged to the top of the fixed support, and a small arm is hinged to the top of the big arm. A middle arm is hinged to the top of the large arm, and an air bubble film is fixedly installed in an inner cavity of the middle arm. The pneumatic telescopic rods are fixedly installed in the middle of the base plate, the paws are arranged in a matched mode, the paws can grab round fruits of different sizes, the paws are hinged to the right pneumatic telescopic rod, the paws on the right side can rotate downwards, and meanwhile the air bubble film is fixedly installed in the middle of the middle arm. According to the fruit picking device, the gripper and the middle arm are arranged in a matched mode, long fruits can be placed between the gripper and the middle arm, it is guaranteed that the gripped fruits cannot be squeezed, and the effect of picking different types of fruits is achieved.

title: Moistureproof Internet of Things storage cabinet
applicants: GUANGZHOU AIRICE ECOLOGICAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AGRICULTURE CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses a moistureproof internet of things storage cabinet, including cabinet body, drying subassembly and data subassembly, the casing of cabinet body includes a pair of outer casing and inner casing that are arranged in parallel, the drying subassembly includes drying filter element and fan, the drying filter element is vertically arranged in the circulation chamber of cabinet body both sides, and the fan is arranged in the circulation chamber of cabinet body both sides. An opening is formed in the bottom of the inner cavity, the fan is arranged in the opening in the bottom of the inner cavity, and the data assembly comprises a temperature sensor and a processing center; according to the storage cabinet, moisture prevention and drying of the interior of the storage cabinet are achieved through the arrangement of the drying assembly, meanwhile, real-time remote monitoring of the humidity in the storage cabinet is achieved through the arrangement of the data assembly, the environment humidity in the storage cabinet can be controlled through the mobile terminal, use is more convenient and reliable, and humidity control is more accurate and timely.

title: Artificial intelligence feeding system for agriculture
applicants: TIANJIN XINCHENG TECH SERVICE CO LTD
abstract: The agricultural artificial intelligence feeding system comprises a supporting column, a base, a top seat, a material collecting box, a water basin and a food basin, the supporting column is fixedly installed on one side of the upper surface of the base, the top seat is fixedly installed at the top end of the supporting column, the lower end of the top seat is fixedly connected with a fixing frame, the material collecting box is fixedly connected with the top seat through the fixing frame, and the water basin is fixedly connected with the food basin. The water basin and the food basin are located on the two sides of the lower portion of the material collecting box respectively, the middle of the bottom end of the material collecting box is rotationally connected with a fixing barrel, and the water basin and the food basin are located on the two sides of the fixing barrel respectively. By arranging the angle adjusting mechanism, when the water basin and the food basin need to be cleaned, the transmission lead screw can be utilized to rotate, so that the lead screw nut moves downwards, the angles of the water basin and the food basin are changed by pulling the connecting rod, the water basin and the food basin are cleaned, and dirt in the water basin and the food basin can be poured out; meanwhile, the water basin and the food basin can be washed through the cleaning water pipe and the high-pressure spray head, and the good cleaning effect is guaranteed.

title: Intelligent multi-arm tea-leaf picker
applicants: BEIJING SINO HORIZON AGRICULTURE SCIENCE AND TECH CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses an intelligent multi-arm tea-leaf picker which comprises a moving device, a stand column, a lifting arm, a picking assembly, a collecting device, a power supply device, a controller and a navigation antenna. The stand column vertically extends upwards, the two opposite sides of the stand column in the circumferential direction are each provided with a lifting arm, the lower side of each lifting arm is provided with a picking assembly, each picking assembly comprises a lifting mechanism, a picking mechanical arm, a picking chuck and a composite probe, the lifting mechanisms are connected to the lower sides of the lifting arms, and the lifting mechanisms are connected with one ends of the picking mechanical arms; the other end of the picking mechanical arm is connected with the picking chuck and the composite probe; the moving device, the lifting arm, the lifting mechanism, the picking mechanical arm, the picking chuck, the composite probe, the collecting device, the power supply device and the navigation antenna are all connected with the controller. The intelligent tea-leaf picker has the advantages that the intelligent tea-leaf picker adopts artificial intelligence, visual identification and multi-mechanical-arm movable tea-leaf picking, the tea-leaf picking problem of tea farmers can be well solved, continuous operation is achieved in the daytime and at night, and a solid technical foundation is provided for unmanned tea gardens.

title: MOBILE AI, CANTILEVER, ROBOT AND DRONE APPLICATIONS
abstract: Robots and Drones using cantilevers combined with artificial intelligence, machine learning and data mining to detect pathogens in the agriculture industry.

title: PREPARATION METHOD AND APPLICATION OF TREMELLA FUCIFORMIS GEL
abstract: The present invention belongs to the field of deep processing of edible fungi, and particularly 5 relates to a preparation method and an application of Treme/Ia fuciformis gel. The preparation method includes: cleaning, chopping and filling Tremel/a fuciformis in filter bags; performing negative pressure extraction and concentration on the Tremel/a fuciformis under conditions of a temperature of 70-80°C and a negative pressure of -0.06 to -0.02 MPa; and finally, performing vacuum drying to obtain the finished product. In the preparation method provided by the present 10 invention, active materials in the prepared Tremel/a fuciformis gel are well ensured; the influence of high temperature on the Tremel/a fuciformis is avoided; and the obtained product is a flake-like dried solid, contains no preservative, and is convenient to preserve and transport. The product is an edible Tremel/a fuciformis extract, is a nontoxic and harmless product, and may serve as a medicine and a food additive. The Tremel/a fuciformis gel produced by the process serves as a 15 beverage stabilizer, a thickening agent and a gelatinizing agent in food industry, may be applied to production of household chemicals, is beneficial to human health, and does not endanger the environment. Pollution may be avoided during production.

title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR GENERATING FARMING MAP OF AGRICULTURAL ROBOT BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: The present invention relates to a system and method for generating a farming map for an agricultural robot based on artificial intelligence, and more specifically, to a technology for performing polygon rendering using an aerial photographed image to identify the boundary between farming fields, to identify an actually available space according to a type of crop and generating a farming map to provide it to a robot farm machine, thereby accurately performing a farming work even in the available space area near the boundary between the farming fields, and efficiently performing the farming work.

title: Water and fertilizer integrated system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: ZHUHAI DIBIAO HUINONG TECH AGRICULTURE CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence-based water and fertilizer integration system, which comprises a frame, the upper surface of the frame is provided with an operation box, the bottom output end of the operation box is provided with an electric wire, the inner side of the top of the frame is provided with a sliding chute, and the inner side of the sliding chute is clamped with a hook. Mounting grooves are symmetrically formed in the ends, facing the sliding grooves, of the hooks, connecting springs are arranged on the inner sides of the mounting grooves, rubber blocks are fixed to the ends, facing the side walls of the sliding grooves, of the connecting springs, damping blocks are arranged on the side walls, facing the sliding grooves, of the rubber blocks, and the damping blocks are tightly attached to the side walls of the sliding grooves; the bottom of the hook is of a hook-shaped structure. Through the designed hook, electric wires at the bottom of the operation box can be collected and limited in the use process, the phenomena of scattering and knotting are avoided, meanwhile, later maintenance is facilitated, the complexity in an existing structure is greatly reduced, the position of the hook cannot shake after being adjusted, and the installation stability is high.

title: Crop agriculture collaborative robot platform for artificial intelligence technology
abstract: The invention discloses a crop agriculture collaborative robot platform for artificial intelligence technology in the field of agricultural robots. The platform comprises a bottom plate, a rotating mechanism is arranged in the bottom plate, the top of the rotating mechanism is fixedly connected with a box body, a lifting mechanism is arranged in the box body, and a cutting mechanism and a supporting plate are arranged on the right side of the lifting mechanism respectively. The top of the supporting plate is in threaded connection with a connecting plate through bolts, the right side of the connecting plate is fixedly connected with a net bag, the left side of the box body is fixedly connected with a shell, a storage battery is arranged in the shell, a solar panel is arranged at the top of the shell, and the rotating mechanism comprises a first motor, a rotating rod, a first fluted disc, a second fluted disc, a movable rod and a rotating plate. The bottom of the first motor is fixedly connected with the interior of the bottom plate. The platform has functionality, reliability, maintainability and economical efficiency, is advantageous in price, after-sales service and the like compared with foreign like products, and has the advantage of meeting the actual requirements of crop picking of numerous domestic small and medium-sized enterprises.

title: Artificial intelligence model development platform based on deep learning
abstract: The invention relates to an artificial intelligence model development platform based on deep learning, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence. Functions of data management, algorithm development, model training, model management, model deployment, model refining, authority management and the like are provided in the artificial intelligence model development platform, standardized unified management is performed on data, algorithms and models, the reusable degree of the algorithms and the models is high, repeated development is avoided, and the development efficiency is improved; different items can be called in parallel, the existence of data islands is avoided, meanwhile, autonomous service docking is supported, and the docking difficulty is reduced.

title: Agricultural product nutritional quality grading system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: INSTITUTE OF FOOD AND NUTRITION DEVELOPMENT MINI OF AGRICULTURE AND RURAL AFFAIRS
abstract: The invention provides an agricultural product nutritional quality grading system based on artificial intelligence, and relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence. The system comprises the following steps: S1, detecting agricultural products, and inputting agricultural product detection data; S2, processing the detected data of the agricultural products; wherein the data processing comprises a multispectral instrument data processing system and an omics data analysis system; S3, carrying out data modeling on the agricultural product nutritional quality basic database; S4, establishing a chemometrics and machine learning algorithm library for grading the agricultural products; and S5, constructing an agricultural product grading system. By the combination level of agricultural product detection and artificial intelligence, deep understanding of the material basis and the action rule of the nutritional quality of the agricultural products is promoted, grading of the agricultural products is promoted, and transformation development of agricultural production in China from survival type food supply to healthy type nutritional quality improvement is promoted.

title: MICROORGANISM READER AND SENSOR BASED ON ALTERATIONS IN ELECTROMAGNETIC PROPERTIES OF AN RFID TAG
applicants: FUNDACAO UNIV FEDERAL DE SAO CARLOS [BR]
abstract: The present invention pertains to the fields of engineering, physics and chemistry, biotechnology, monitoring technology, more specifically the monitoring of microorganisms, and relates to a testing system for the real-time, in situ detection of qualitative and quantitative measurements of microbiological analytes present in samples of the environment that require monitoring for pollution control. The system is characterized by alterations in electromagnetic properties of the RFID biosensors identified by a radio-frequency reader to monitor the presence of microorganisms. In addition to including a biosensor (RFID transponder/tag), the system also includes a reader with built-in software and/or artificial intelligence (AI) for real-time processing of the measurement data, and a wireless communication system for storing the information in a database. The present invention also relates to the built-in software used to analyze the read data provided by the biosensor. The invention can be used in the fields of human health, animal health, farming and fisheries, foodstuffs, environment and fields that require microbiological control.

title: Matrix stirring-quantitative groove loading all-in-one machine for automatic vegetable planting production line
applicants: QIYA ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH RESEARCH INSTITUTE NANJING CO LTD
abstract: The utility model belongs to the field of modernized agriculture, and particularly relates to a matrix stirring-quantitative loading all-in-one machine for an automatic vegetable planting production line, which comprises a matrix bin with a stirrer, a quantitative box and an automatic matrix loading control system. By controlling the opening and closing states of the feed port opening-closing insertion plate and the discharge port opening-closing insertion plate and utilizing the volume of the quantitative box, quantitative loading of substrates can be achieved. Meanwhile, by means of the arrangement of the stirring machine in the matrix bin, especially the design of a stirring shaft, a stirring knife and a scraping rod, adhesion and caking of the matrix in the bin and at the discharging port can be avoided.

title: Plant disease and insect pest diagnosis method and system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHOUGUANG DEFENG ECOLOGICAL AGRICULTURE CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to a plant disease and insect pest diagnosis method and system based on artificial intelligence, and belongs to the technical field of plant disease and insect pest diagnosis. The method comprises the following steps: according to a color texture distribution diagram, obtaining disease style characteristics of each plant sample image with labels; training a variational auto-encoder by using each tagged plant sample image to obtain a Gaussian model corresponding to each to-be-tagged plant sample image; according to a Gaussian model, labels are distributed to the to-be-labeled plant sample images, and label data corresponding to the to-be-labeled plant sample images are obtained; training a target network according to the tagged plant sample images, the tag data corresponding to the tagged plant sample images, the to-be-tagged plant sample images and the tag data corresponding to the to-be-tagged plant sample images; and inputting the target plant image into the trained target network to obtain a diagnosis result corresponding to the target plant image. The method can improve the accuracy of target network diagnosis of plant disease and insect pest infection.

title: 5G artificial intelligence picking robot capable of accurately clamping crop mother branches
applicants: INFORMATION CENTER BEIJING MUNICIPAL BUREAU OF AGRICULTURE AND RURAL AFFAIRS
abstract: The invention discloses a 5G artificial intelligence picking robot capable of accurately clamping crop mother branches. The 5G artificial intelligence picking robot capable of accurately clamping the crop mother branches comprises a base, wherein a lifting mechanism is arranged on the right side of the top of the base, an adjusting mechanism is arranged in the lifting mechanism, a first fixing plate is fixedly connected to the right side of the adjusting mechanism, a first motor is fixedly connected to the interior of the first fixing plate, a rotating shaft of the first motor is fixedly connected with a lead screw, the surface of the lead screw is sleeved with a thread sleeve, the right side of the thread sleeve is fixedly connected with a second fixing plate, a clamping mechanism is arranged in the second fixing plate, the top of the first fixing plate is fixedly connected with a connecting block, and the right side of the connecting block is fixedly connected with a camera. The 5G artificial intelligence picking robot capable of accurately clamping the crop mother branches solves the problems as follows: picking of crops by an existing robot is inconvenient, the crops are easily damaged, the image collection is easily by factors such as collection pixels, light and other factors in the picking process, and some linear positioning errors are caused accordingly.

title: Corn ear high-flux intelligent screening virtual simulation experiment system
abstract: The invention discloses a corn ear high-flux intelligent screening virtual simulation experiment system, and belongs to the technical field of virtual simulation. The system comprises a main interface guiding module, an artificial intelligence principle learning module, an artificial intelligence algorithm practice module and a corn ear screening virtual simulation module, wherein the main interface guiding module is linked with the other three modules so as to guide skipping among the modules; the artificial intelligence principle learning module comprises a biological neural network principle learning module and an artificial neural network principle learning module; the artificial intelligence algorithm practice module trains a network according to a neural network model and parameters and displays a training result; and the corn ear screening virtual simulation module displays a corn ear screening process in a three-dimensional scene. The system provided by the invention constructs a teaching experiment system with low cost, high availability and good effect, and can play an important role in artificial intelligence teaching, especially in the artificial intelligence teaching related to agriculture and machinery.

title: A computer implemented and IoT based method for increasing crop production using machine learning model
abstract: Abstract A computer implemented and loT based method for increasing crop production using machine learning model The present invention relates to the field of Internet of Things (loT) and agricultural crops. More specifically, the present invention relates to the field of increasing crop production using loT sensors and machine learning model. In today's world, with the advancement in technology, increasing farming yield with the use of the current technology will boost the growth of a nation as well as individual farmers. The present system is a combination of various loT sensors, central server, database, client devices and expert devices. The agricultural field contains various kind of sensors e.g. soil moisture sensors, environmental humidity sensors, rain sensor, temperature sensor, air-flow sensor, a camera unit and soil nutrients determination sensor. These sensors are operated by solar powered battery. These sensors use ZigBee chip integrated wireless sensors and data collecting modules and communicates to server through wireless communicating modules. The sever collects data at predetermined intervals and analyses the said data. The server machine utilizes the data from the database and database is equipped with initial data about agricultural aspects. Further, the server machine is trained on the data from the database through deep learning algorithm based on machine learning model (MLM) for making an artificial intelligent model to suggest the individual farmers regarding growth of the current agricultural crop. The captured/collected data from various loT sensor modules is analysed by the analyser module and alarm the individual farmers regarding their individual agricultural fields based on the results of the analyser and individual farmers act accordingly. The individual farmers are already linked with their corresponding agricultural field based on the registration done on the central server machine. Further, the said system can remotely, by the mobile application, start the irrigation system installed in the agricultural field using the solenoid valve as there is a need to irrigate the field and determined by the machine learning model. The proposed system also provides the feature of providing expert advice in need. If the server alarms any abnormal situation to an individual farmer about crop and suggest for an expert advice. The server then sends the query or abnormal situation to the farming expert if requested by an individual along with the images of the agricultural field taken by camera sensor to aid in providing suitable advice. The suggested advice by the farming expert is then forwarded to the client device by the server to act accordingly. The alarms and advice may be provided to the client device as per the language selected by the individual for communication and the server machine is equipped enough to translate and provide the alarms and advice to the individual farmer in their selected language. Thus, the present system automatically increases crop production using current technology and farmers will get benefited of the technology. Training the server with the machine learning model using large database and test cases of agricultural aspects (101) captures data from various loT sensors at predetermined interval and transmit to central server through communication module (102) Server analyses the collected data with the database stored using adopted machine learning model (MLM) (103) Generating and sending an alarm to client application of a specified user along with request for expert advice if needed(104) starting remotely, by the client application, irrigation system installed in field using solenoid valve as determined by the machine learning model and notifies to the farmer (105) Figure 1 - Flow-diagram of the method for increasing crop production using loT sensors and machine learning model in accordance with present invention

title: Method for preprocessing data from edge end camera to algorithm reasoning process
applicants: SHANGHAI HUACE NAVIGATION TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a method for preprocessing data from an edge end camera to an algorithm reasoning process; the method comprises the following steps: S1, starting data processing, and selecting cameras of different specifications in specific scenes; s11, judging whether the resolution of the camera meets the requirement or not, if the resolution does not meet the requirement, returning to the step S1, and if the resolution meets the requirement, turning to the step S12; and S12, judging whether the power meets the requirement or not, and if the power does not meet the requirement, returning to S1. The invention provides a method for preprocessing data from an edge end camera to an algorithm reasoning process. The method is applicable to industrial fields such as precision agriculture and high-precision data surveying and mapping, and the data quality is managed and controlled in multiple dimensions by adopting an SPV data acquisition method, an MPP data processing method and an LM data labeling method according to specific corresponding scenes. Therefore, the defect that in existing surveying and mapping and precision agriculture scenes, the precision of a deep learning algorithm cannot be further improved in data preprocessing, and consequently landing is difficult is overcome.

title: Artificial intelligence insect situation prediction method based on multi-parameter fusion
applicants: NINGBO MICROENERGY LINK TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence insect situation prediction method based on multi-parameter fusion; the method employs a multi-layer network which is formed by the interconnection of an input layer, an output layer and a plurality of hidden layer nodes, and enables a multi-layer feedforward network to be capable of building a proper linear or nonlinear relation between the input and the output; wherein the BP neural network is used for predicting the number development trend of various insects in any day in the next year, real-time monitoring and analysis of insect conditions are achieved, insect condition state data are calculated in real time, analysis data of different dimensions and early warning are provided, insect damage is prevented in advance, and insect damage loss is reduced; besides, efficient and accurate prediction is still kept when the collected data volume is large; and meanwhile, the insect situation prediction model is iteratively corrected by using external parameters collected regularly, so that the prediction accuracy is further improved, the insect control level is improved; the method serves green agriculture and organic agriculture and has a wide prospect.

title: Cyclopropyl-pyrazole derivative and application thereof in agriculture
abstract: The invention provides a cyclopropyl-pyrazole derivative and application thereof in agriculture. Specifically, the invention provides a compound as shown in a formula (Ia) or a stereoisomer, nitrogen oxide or salt of the compound as shown in the formula (Ia), a preparation method, a composition containing the compounds and application of the compounds in agriculture, especially application of the compounds as an active ingredient of a herbicide for preventing and treating unwanted plants. In the formulas, R1, R2, R3, R4, R5, R6, R7, n and Y have the meanings as described in the invention.

title: Pest monitoring, early warning and prevention and control integrated device based on artificial intelligence and Internet of Things
abstract: The invention discloses a pest monitoring, early warning and prevention and control integrated device based on the Internet of Things and artificial intelligence. The pest monitoring, early warning and prevention and control integrated device integrates functions of a traditional pest situation forecasting lamp and an electric shock type pest killing lamp. Firstly, a core technology, namely a high-voltage insect-killing electrified fence, is subjected to substantive technology upgrading, so that the common defect that too many insects are blocked is overcome, and it is ensured that trapped insects are effectively killed; secondly, an instant pest image acquisition mechanism is installed on the device, acquired images can be directly uploaded to a network, target pests in a specific land parcel can be recognized and trained through the artificial intelligence, and the target pests can be directly recognized through a completed model; thirdly, the device is provided with an Internet of Things module, so that the operation condition of the device in a set plot range can be known in real time; and finally, the use of an injection molding part is abandoned in the manufacturing of the device, so that the device becomes a durable agriculture and forestry pest prevention and control facility, and the spontaneous combustion phenomenon of the device occasionally occurring is also avoided.

title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MONITORING NUMBER OF LIVESTOCK, AND COMPUTER DEVICE AND STORAGE MEDIUM
applicants: PINGAN INTERNATIONAL SMART CITY TECHNOLOGY CO LTD [CN]
abstract: The embodiments of the present application belong to the technical field of artificial intelligence, are applied to a smart city, are specifically applied to smart agriculture, and relate to a method for monitoring the number of livestock. The method comprises: performing livestock detection on an obtained collected picture according to a target detection AI model, so as to obtain a detection frame; cutting out an image of a single head of livestock in the detection frame so as to obtain a livestock sample graph, and processing the livestock sample graph by means of a deep tracking model and a livestock classification model, so as to obtain tracking detection matching frames, redundant tracking frames, and tracking and missed detection compensation frames; adding the number of obtained tracking and missed detection compensation frames and the number of tracking detection matching frames together, so as to obtain the actual number of livestock and take same as a statistical result; comparing the statistical result with the number of livestock stored in a database; and if the statistical result is inconsistent with the number of livestock stored in the database, determining that the number of livestock is anomalous, and sending an anomaly alarm to a user, wherein the obtained statistical result can be stored in a blockchain. Further provided are an apparatus for monitoring the number of livestock, and a computer device and a storage medium. By means of the present application, the rate for redundant detection of livestock and the rate for missed detection thereof are effectively reduced.

title: Image acquisition processing method and system based on artificial intelligence, and storage medium
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of communication, and provides an image acquisition processing method and system based on artificial intelligence, and a storage medium. The method comprises the following steps: firstly, carrying out image acquisition on queuing and waiting conditions in front of each door of a subway platform, and calculating to obtain first time when the subway stays; in the process that the subway door is in the open state, performing image collection on the condition of an elevator leading to a subway platform and the condition of a step ladder, counting the number of passengers and predicting the passing time of the passengers arriving at the subway to obtain the second time and the third time when the subway stays are obtained; finally, based on the first time, the second time and the third time of the metro staying, determining the final time of the metro staying at the platform comprehensively. The operation efficiency of the subway can be improved.

title: Mobile AI, Cantilever, Robot and Drone Applications
abstract: Robots and Drones using cantilevers combined with artificial intelligence, machine learning and data mining to detect pathogens in the agriculture industry.

title: Fusion model construction method, fusion model use method, fusion model construction device, fusion model use device and electronic equipment
applicants: INST GEOGRAPHIC SCIENCES & NATURAL RESOURCES RES CAS
abstract: The invention provides a fusion model construction method and device, a fusion model use method and device and electronic equipment, and relates to the technical field of remote sensing image processing, and the fusion model construction method comprises the steps: constructing a static knowledge graph according to remote sensing classification knowledge of a target crop group; constructing a dynamic knowledge graph according to the static knowledge graph of each time point; and fusing the dynamic knowledge graph and the deep learning model to obtain a fusion model which is used for classifying crop types of the target crop group. According to the embodiment of the invention, the knowledge graph is constructed according to the remote sensing classification knowledge of the crop group which needs to be subjected to crop type classification, and fusion training is performed on the knowledge graph and the deep learning model, so that the crop type classification accuracy of the fusion model can be improved, and support is provided for intelligent agriculture development.

title: Yield estimation method and device based on artificial intelligence, equipment and storage medium
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of agriculture, and discloses a yield estimation method and device based on artificial intelligence, equipment and a storage medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining the current growth image information of a target crop, and extracting the target feature information of the current growth image information; searching corresponding historical growth information in a big data platform according to the target feature information; obtaining a preset neural network model, and obtaining a target yield estimation model according to the preset neural network model and the historical growth information; and acquiring environment image information of the target crop, and performing yield prediction through the target yield prediction model according to the current growth image information and the environment image information to obtain an estimated yield of the target crop. Compared with the prior art that the crop yield is speculated through single data measured by sensors with different functions, the accuracy of estimating the crop yield can be effectively improved, and the estimation cost is reduced.

title: Farming system methods and devices
abstract: A load handling device for operating in a farming system comprising a growing facility with at least one growing floor (see Figs 3-5) comprising a track network, based on a grid system. The track network a first set of track members extending in a first (x-) direction, and a second set of track members extending in a second (y-) direction. Second set of track members runs transversely to the first set of track members in a substantially horizontal plane. The network comprises access aisles (2) and growing aisles (2) with at least one booth 1for receiving growing trays and at least one load handling device operating on the track network for lifting and transporting growing trays. An associated control facility for controlling and operating the farming system is provided (see Fig 22), and has one or more of: an environment control module (see Fig 23); a booth control module; a growing system planner and or manager module; a task planner; a bot path planning module; a bot path clearance module; a communications module; a lift task planner; a bot charge state manager; a data storage and persistence module; a long term data storage module for providing data to machine learning algorithms; a recovery, repair and or maintenance manager module to modify plans and schedules to facilitate recovery, repair and maintenance operations; and a machine learning and or artificial intelligence module designed to fine tune the system based on its previous operational history

title: Farming system methods and devices
abstract: A farming system comprising a growing facility with at least one growing floor (see Figs 3-5) comprising a track network, based on a grid system. The track network a first set of track members extending in a first (x-) direction, and a second set of track members extending in a second (y-) direction. Second set of track members runs transversely to the first set of track members in a substantially horizontal plane. The network comprises access aisles (2) and growing aisles (2) with at least one booth 1for receiving growing trays and at least one load handling device operating on the track network for lifting and transporting growing trays. An associated control facility for controlling and operating the farming system is provided (see Fig 22), and has one or more of: an environment control module (see Fig 23); a booth control module; a growing system planner and or manager module; a task planner; a bot path planning module; a bot path clearance module; a communications module; a lift task planner; a bot charge state manager; a data storage and persistence module; a long term data storage module for providing data to machine learning algorithms; a recovery, repair and or maintenance manager module to modify plans and schedules to facilitate recovery, repair and maintenance operations; and a machine learning and or artificial intelligence module designed to fine tune the system based on its previous operational history

title: Artificial intelligence agricultural automatic management system
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence agricultural automatic management system, and relates to the technical field of agriculture. Crops are automatically irrigated through an automatic irrigation unit; an automatic fertilization unit is used for automatically fertilizing crops; an automatic deinsectization unit is used for identifying insect pests of the crops and automatically deinsectizing the crops; an automatic disease removal unit is used for judging diseases of crops and automatically removing the diseases; and the crop dynamic state of the farm is comprehensively detected in real time through the automatic irrigation unit, the automatic fertilization unit, the automatic deinsectization unit and the automatic disease removal unit, automatic operation processing is carried out according to artificial intelligence analysis and the like, manpower and material resources are saved, and the problem of consumption of a large number of manpower resources is solved for the farm.

title: Smart home multi-sensor detection method and system based on artificial intelligence, and storage medium
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of communication, and discloses a smart home multi-sensor detection method and system based on artificial intelligence, and a storage medium, wherein the method comprises the steps: S1, obtaining the data of a plurality of sensors on smart home devices in a working state; S2, predicting the working state data of the smart home devices at the next moment by using neural network models; S3, constructing a two-layer neural network model based on the neural network models of the plurality of smart home devices; S4, using the two-layer neural network model to predict the cooperative work state among the plurality of smart home devices at the next moment; and S5, making a control strategy for the smart home devices according to the prediction result of the two-layer neural network model, and sending the control strategy to the corresponding smart home devices to control the smart home devices. Not only can the abnormal conditions that can occur in the devices be detected in advance, but also the cooperative working state among the plurality of smart home devices can be predicted.

title: Banana phenological period monitoring module and planting system
abstract: The invention relates to an image processing method, in particular to an image processing method, and particularly relates to a banana phenological period monitoring module and a planting system. According to the invention, through a large number of banana phenological period images, agronomic personnel mark the images; training is carried out by using deep learning, finally, new banana phenological period images are automatically identified, phenological periods of bananas are intelligently identified, and growth stages such as a seedling stage, a vegetative growth stage, a flower bud differentiation stage, a bud stage, a young fruit stage and an expansion stage are identified, so that remote intelligent identification is realized, agricultural personnel do not need to go to a banana field for manual judgment, and the time cost, the labor cost and the area limitation are reduced. The identification of the phenological period of the bananas provides an important basis for farming operation, fertilization, pesticide application and marketing time judgment. According to the intelligent banana planting system provided by the invention, banana planting guidance schemes including corresponding farming operation, fertilization and pesticide application and the like can be given according to the growth stages of bananas, and a scientific and reasonable planting scheme is given.

title: Small target fruit detection method and system
abstract: The invention belongs to the related field of deep learning intelligent agriculture, and provides a small target fruit detection method and system. The method comprises obtaining a small target detection result according to a to-be-detected target image by using a trained small target fruit detection model. The training process of the small target fruit detection model comprises the following steps: acquiring a target image, and marking a target fruit; constructing a small target fruit detection model, adopting a ResNeXt network to obtain features of C5 layers, and then adopting an expansion encoder to generate output features of various receptive fields to cover all target scales; screening an anchor frame and extracting a test sample by adopting an IoU algorithm and a k-nearest neighbor algorithm; obtaining a small target detection result based on an output result of the classification sub-network and an output result of the regression sub-network; and training the small target fruit detection model by using a loss function until the total similarity loss of the model is less than a set threshold.

title: Piglet pressed detection method based on deep learning model
applicants: SHANDONG NEW HOPE LIUHE AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY TECH
XIAJIN XINXIWANG LIUHE AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY CO LTD
BEIJING XINLIU AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY TECH CO
SICHUAN NEW HOPE LIUHE PIG BREEDING TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a piglet pressed detection method based on a deep learning model, and relates to the technical field of breeding, and the technical scheme comprises steps: arranging a microphone array in a pigsty of a pig delivery room; collecting sound of two columns through the microphone; judging the position of a sound source according to the collected sound; and judging whether the piglet is pressed or not by combining a pressed piglet sounding model established based on the CNN and a spectrogram. The beneficial effects of the invention are that the method provided by the scheme liberates the demand of a delivery room for labor force, reduces the production management cost of an enterprise, and improves the digital intelligence level of livestock breeding. Besides, from the perspective of production, by means of the scheme and method, the death and culling rate of the piglets can be reduced, more piglets can be rescued, the piglets can be converted into growing-finishing pigs which continue to be bred, and great help is provided for further improving the operating profit of animal husbandry enterprises.

title: Animal individual identification method
abstract: The invention discloses an animal individual identification method. The method comprises the steps of deep learning model training, video acquisition and animal detection and identification. The deep learning model is a residual deep learning model and comprises six convolution layers, one average pooling layer and one full connection layer. According to the invention, the identity recognition of the animal can be completed only by inputting the image of the animal individual to be recognized into the network model, and the method has the advantages of real-time performance and automation. According to the method, only breeding personnel are liberated from heavy work, and manpower and material resources are greatly saved.

title: Intelligent agriculture AIOT distributed big data storage platform
applicants: SHENZHEN CITY AIYUN INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
abstract: The intelligent agriculture AIOT distributed big data storage platform comprises an intelligent agriculture big data basic supporting platform and an intelligent agriculture data middle platform, and the intelligent agriculture big data basic supporting platform is used for managing and supporting the whole life cycle of mass big data. The smart agriculture data middle platform is used for planning the basic business data stored by the smart agriculture big data basic support platform so as to ensure that the smart agriculture AIOT distributed big data storage platform plays a distributed architecture role; according to the invention, a distributed architecture is adopted, and a data model basis is provided for an intelligent agriculture big data service platform established based on artificial intelligence and Internet information sharing by providing full-life-cycle management and support for massive big data.

title: Greenhouse automation system based on deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a greenhouse automation system based on deep learning, and belongs to the field of agriculture. The greenhouse automation system comprises data acquisition equipment, a greenhouse equipment gateway and a cloud server. The data acquisition equipment is in communication connection with the greenhouse equipment gateway through a ZigBee wireless technology, and the greenhouse equipment gateway is in communication connection with the cloud server through the Internet; the data acquisition equipment is used for acquiring the humidity, the temperature, the illumination intensity, the soil acidity and alkalinity and the carbon dioxide concentration in the air of the soil at a specified position in real time; the data is sent to the greenhouse equipment gateway through a wireless network; the greenhouse equipment gateway is used for forwarding the environment data received at the acquisition equipment to the cloud server through the Internet; the cloud server is also used for receiving an equipment instruction from the cloud server and operating greenhouse equipment to execute; and finally, when the greenhouse environment is abnormal, the greenhouse equipment can be automatically started to deal with problems, and automatic management of a greenhouse is achieved. The system does not need to be maintained frequently, and manpower cost is saved.

title: Artificial intelligence insect pest situation prediction system and prediction method
applicants: MIENERGY ZHEJIANG SENSOR TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence insect pest situation prediction system and a prediction method. The artificial intelligence insect pest situation prediction system and the prediction method disclosed by the invention are particularly important for monitoring and early warning work of insect pests, so that the insect pest situation monitoring system provides a set of comprehensive management and analysis service based on big data for insect pest situation prediction work through networking, the occurrence rule of the insect pests can be better and deeply known, the pest control level is further improved, and the system serves green agriculture and organic agriculture and has a wide prospect; and the development cost of the system development is relatively low, a user can log in through a user client to check the equipment condition, operation can be conveniently carried out, and the cost is relatively low.

title: SMART ORGANIC LED FARMING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE & MACHINE LEARNING MODEL
abstract: SMART ORGANIC LED FARMING SYSTEM BASED ON ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE & MACHINE LEARNING MODEL The present invention is related to a smart organic led farming system based on artificial intelligence & machine learning model. The objective of present invention is to solve the anomalies presented in the prior art techniques related to controlled environment based precision agriculture. Cover Lijbtsensor Hot iproc'ider Con 1tro 0mmm Monitoring unit Artificial Intelligence Algorithm Unit

title: Automatic real-time sheep behavior identification method
abstract: The invention discloses an automatic real-time sheep behavior identification method. The method comprises the following specific steps: S1, obtaining a streaming media video image of a monitored sheep; S2, performing gray processing on the streaming media video image to obtain a gray image; and S3, inputting the grayscale image into a deep learning network YOLOv3-s, performing feature recognition, and outputting features. According to the automatic real-time sheep behavior identification method adopting the structure, gray processing is firstly performed on the streaming media video image, and then feature identification is performed, so that the interference of colors on feature identification is greatly reduced, meanwhile, a learning network is simplified, subsequent hardware arrangement is facilitated, and the identification speed is greatly increased under the condition that the detection precision is ensured.

title: Grape leaf disease detection method
abstract: The invention discloses a grape leaf disease detection method. The method comprises the steps of image super-resolution processing, deep learning network training and virus detection. The deep learning network comprises a large convolutional layer Conv_1-Conv_6, a feature output layer Predict1-Predict3, and a connection layer Concatenate1-Concatenate2, and the large convolutional layer Conv_6 comprises an SPP module. The method replaces the traditional manual naked eye detection of grape leaf diseases, improves the detection speed and accuracy of grape leaf black rot, and reduces the labor cost and the detection period. According to the method, a loss function is improved, the problem that two target frames are not overlapped and are zero can be avoided, the gradient can be continuously updated, and a better regression frame can be obtained in training; and the data set is subjected to super-resolution processing, so that the target detection precision is improved.

title: Automatic agriculture and animal husbandry feeding method and equipment for artificial intelligence and medium
applicants: GUANGZHOU LANGO ELECTRONIC SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of agriculture and animal husbandry feeding, in particular to an automatic agriculture and animal husbandry feeding method for artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: receiving ID information of a to-be-detected target sent by a radio frequency module; obtaining individual feature information according to the ID information, wherein the individual feature information comprises body weight; obtaining calendar information, inputting the calendar information and the individual feature information into a preset model, and outputting food intake; controlling the blanking time of a grooved wheel blanking device corresponding to the ID information according to the food intake; receiving the residual feed amount collected by a meter; and updating the food intake according to the food intake and the residual feed amount and a preset rule. According to the technical scheme, the feeding amount can be changed according to the change of agricultural and pastoral growth and environmental factors, so that accurate feeding is realized.

title: Guiding robot for farming museum
abstract: The utility model discloses a navigation robot for a farming museum, and belongs to the technical field of artificial intelligence equipment. A navigation robot for a farming museum comprises a box body, a motor and a driving motor, a display screen and a control panel are arranged at the front end of the box body, the control panel is arranged below the display screen, a sound outlet hole is formed in the rear end of the box body, a cross beam is fixedly installed at the rear end of the box body, a supporting frame is fixedly connected to the cross beam, and the supporting frame is fixedly connected to the motor. A head part is fixedly installed on the supporting frame, a camera is fixedly connected to the head part, mechanical arms are fixedly connected to the two sides of the box body, a plurality of connecting columns are fixedly connected to the bottom of the box body, a connecting shell is fixedly installed at the other ends of the connecting columns, and the motor is fixedly installed at the bottom of the connecting shell; the teaching aid can be used for explaining at a fixed point, is high in stability, and does not incline forwards or backwards or fall down.

title: Real-time data processing method
abstract: The invention discloses a real-time data processing method, and real-time data processing is a basic link of big data application and is a key for realizing data-based quick response and quick decision. According to the real-time data processing method disclosed by the invention, the real-time redundancy elimination is performed on the data generated by the automatic driving of the agricultural machinery in the field of intelligent agriculture by using the deep learning technology based on the artificial intelligence technology, so that the real-time data processing capability in the automatic driving process of the agricultural machinery is improved.

title: Plug-in type intelligent sorting method and device based on Nash game
applicants: XINJIANG HAILI AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY SOFTWARE CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence, in particular to an external mounting type intelligent sorting method and device based on the Nash game, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining original data; determining a finite condition, carrying out sorting learning on the learning sample set according to the finite condition, and outputting a simplest optimization rule meeting the finite condition; and executing the simplest optimization rule on the test sample set by adopting recursive sorting to obtain a corresponding optimal test result, and outputting a corresponding model. The method is an artificial intelligence software application library, has independence, can run on various operating systems and software architectures, and is simple to operate, and operators do not need to learn programming knowledge, do not need to set hyper-parameters and do not need manual intervention. Meanwhile, the Nash game theory is used as a theoretical basis, the simplest sorting operation of learning samples is found through a bounded search learning mechanism, a limited game is completed, and then recursive sorting is adopted to execute a simplest optimization rule on a test sample set, and a limited strategy is completed.

title: Agricultural Products Classification Apparatus Using Artificial Intelligence
abstract: The present invention relates to an agricultural product sorting apparatus and, more specifically, to an agricultural product sorting apparatus using artificial intelligence, capable of helping farming workers to escape from simple repetitive labor for sorting agricultural products by automatically determining grades of the agricultural products through artificial intelligence technology. Moreover, according to the present invention, the agricultural product sorting apparatus includes: a conveyor belt transferring agricultural products; a camera photographing the agricultural products on the conveyor belt to transmit the photographed images to an artificial intelligence sorting machine; a supporter supporting the camera; the artificial intelligence sorting machine comparing the agricultural product images transmitted from the camera to existing learning data to determine grades thereof; a motor controller receiving the grade information determined by the artificial intelligence sorting machine to sort the agricultural products by controlling a motor; a pair of motors controlled by the motor controller; and a pair of sorting plates separately rotated in accordance with the rotation of the pair of motors. According to the present invention, farming workers can escape from simple repetitive labor for sorting agricultural products, and labor costs can be saved.

title: Artificial intelligence method and system for obtaining water nitrogen strategy and electronic equipment
applicants: LANZHOU LIFENG ZHENGWEI INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
INNER MONGOLIA HENGYUAN HYDRAULIC ENG CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of agriculture, and provides an artificial intelligence method and system for obtaining a water nitrogen strategy, and electronic equipment. The method comprises the following steps: obtaining a target value of each parameter associated with soil fertility at a preset time point; inputting a preset time point, a preset depth and all target values into a preference neural network with a preference mechanism to obtain a water nitrogen strategy including a target irrigation amount and a target nitrogen application amount, the preference mechanism being used for representing a relationship between each parameter and the irrigation amount and the nitrogen application amount, a preference mechanism used for representing the relationship between each parameter and the irrigation amount and the nitrogen application amount is proposed for the first time, the obtained preference neural network with the preference mechanism can naturally fuse the neural network structure and the prior rule of data in nature, and while the convergence of the model, namely the preference neural network, is greatly improved, the prediction precision can be effectively improved, and an optimal water nitrogen strategy is obtained.

title: Agricultural artificial intelligence fertilization device
abstract: The utility model discloses an agricultural artificial intelligence fertilization device, including roller, car body, monitor, display controller and fertilizer applicator, car body is provided on the roller, the monitor is provided on the car body, the display controller is provided on the car body, the fertilizer applicator is provided on the car body and is located between the monitor and the display controller, and the display controller is provided on the display controller. The monitor comprises a lifting box, a lifting motor, a threaded rod, a limiting rod, a lifting nut, a limiting sleeve, a supporting rod, a fixing box, a rotating motor, an incomplete gear, a rotating shaft, a driven gear and a camera, and the fertilizer applicator comprises a fertilizer applying barrel, a material passing pipe, a fertilizer applying motor, a transmission shaft and a spiral discharging blade. The utility model relates to the field of design of intelligent fertilizing devices, in particular to an artificial intelligent fertilizing device for agriculture.

title: Network encryption traffic identification method, device and equipment based on deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a deep learning-based network encrypted traffic identification method, device and equipment, belongs to the technical field of computers, and particularly relates to a deep learning-based network encrypted traffic identification method. The method comprises the following steps: preprocessing mobile traffic data to obtain preprocessed data; carrying out data normalization processing on the preprocessed data, carrying out convolution operation on the data subjected to data normalization processing, calculating an obtained convolution result by adopting a linear stream function as an activation function, and classifying the obtained calculation result to obtain a classification result. According to the invention, normalization operation is carried out on the preprocessed data; convolution operation is carried out, and finally classification and identification are carried out, so the problem that flow identification is only carried out for flow generated by the traditional internet and a PC terminal in the prior art can be solved, mobile flow and encrypted flow can be classified and identified, the processing speed is high, and the classification result precision is high.

title: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROBOTIC BASED SYSTEM IN AGRICULTURE FOR OPTIMIZATION OF IRRIGATION
applicants: AL ASADI HAMID ALI ABED DR [IQ]
abstract: AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ROBOTIC BASED SYSTEM IN AGRICULTURE FOR OPTIMIZATION OF IRRIGATION The present invention relates to an artificial intelligence robotic based system in agriculture for optimization of irrigation. Artificial Intelligence in agriculture has brought an agriculture revolution. This technology has protected the crop yield from various factors like the climate changes, population growth, employment issues and the food security problems. This patent is used to audit the various applications of Artificial intelligence in agriculture such as for irrigation, weeding, spraying with the help of sensors and other means embedded in robots and drones. These technologies saves the excess use of water, pesticides, herbicides, maintains the fertility of the soil, also helps in the efficient use of man power and elevate the productivity and improve the quality.

title: Smart aquarium management solution using the smart farm platform
abstract: The present invention relates to technology for managing an aquarium and a fishbowl using a smart farm platform and, more specifically, to technology for adding an AI function to integrated control by upgrading an existing simple sensor-based control monitoring system. A key point thereof is to constitute a platform where anyone can easily perform integrated operation of an aquarium and water management system using the technology. In any industry, a future key point is to have an AI function for implementing full automation through a deep learning step of meaningfully analyzing and using data, which is more important than how to collect the data. The method is technology for integrating an existing simple water management or water-quality management control monitoring system with the platform, requiring interlinkage-type technology and a big data processing platform function. The smart farm platform already collects all kinds of information related to plants and uses the same information, and, when there is difficulty in farming and aquarium management due to the absence of aquarium water management and fish management data, the management can become easier through the program.

title: Intelligent agricultural machine operation management method and system
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT AGRICULTURE
abstract: The embodiment of the invention provides an intelligent agricultural machine operation management method and system, and the method comprises the steps of: obtaining a plurality of land parcel local images collected by an unmanned aerial vehicle, and the pose information of the unmanned aerial vehicle corresponding to the land parcel local images; splicing all the land parcel local images according to the corresponding unmanned aerial vehicle pose information to obtain a land parcel image; inputting the land parcel image and the key points of an operation area marked by a user into a trained semantic segmentation network model to obtain the operation area; and determining a path planning result according to the operation area, and sending the path planning result to the intelligent agricultural machine. According to the method, the land parcel image is obtained by splicing a plurality of land parcel local images collected by the unmanned aerial vehicle, manual collection by means of a high-precision GPS is not needed, collection by means of an agricultural machine provided with a high-precision GPS is also not needed, the farmland land parcel information obtaining mode is simplified, the data collection efficiency is high, and the precision requirement can be met. User experience and an artificial intelligence algorithm can be effectively combined, and the segmentation precision of the neural network is improved.

title: ENHANCED MANAGEMENT ZONES FOR PRECISION AGRICULTURE
abstract: The present invention is a system and method for agricultural management-zone delineation to be done over broad geographic extents without overly-localized field-specific data. The instant innovation guides precision agricultural sampling and management by delineating enhanced management zones based upon remote sensing and artificial intelligence and combining the two with data derived from an existing countrywide soil survey database. In an embodiment, the instant innovation uses artificial intelligence from multiple sources to provide granular zone detail. Output of the present innovation can be aggregated to produce management zone sizes that have a level of uncertainty compatible with the needs of the customer-farmer and implementable given the capabilities of available equipment.

title: Fruit sugar degree detection method and system
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT AGRICULTURE
abstract: The invention provides a fruit sugar degree detection method and system. The method comprises the following steps: collecting near infrared spectrum data of a fruit to be detected; inputting the near infrared spectrum data into a sugar degree detection model so as to obtain a sugar degree predicted value corresponding to the near infrared spectrum data according to an output result of the sugar degree detection model; the sugar degree detection model being constructed on the basis of a trained convolutional auto-encoder by adopting a transfer learning method. According to the fruit sugar degree detection method and system provided by the invention, on the basis of a transfer learning method, the trained to-be-migrated auto-encoder is utilized to establish the convolutional auto-encoder model for extracting the apple near infrared spectrum data features, so that the apple near infrared spectrum data set is utilized to train the convolutional auto-encoder model. According to the method, the problem that deep learning needs a large amount of data is solved, the characteristics of the apple near infrared spectrum can be effectively extracted, and the characteristics are used as input variables to be input into the sugar degree detection model, so that high-precision and high-efficiency detection of the apple sugar degree can be effectively realized.

title: Artificial intelligence land-sea-air linkage operation and maintenance system
applicants: ZHONGKE YUNSHANG NANJING INTELLIGENT TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention provides an artificial intelligence land-sea-air linkage operation and maintenance system. The system comprises an inspection platform, a server and a client. The inspection platform comprises an unmanned aerial vehicle and an unmanned vehicle and/or an unmanned ship. The unmanned aerial vehicle carries out flight detection on the assembly and sends fault information to the server, and the server controls the unmanned vehicle or the unmanned ship to confirm the fault information and carries out cleaning and reinspection on fault points. And if the fault information still exists after reinspection, the fault information is analyzed, a fault report is generated, and the fault report is sent to the client. The operation and maintenance system provided by the invention is used for detecting the photovoltaic power station, the detection precision reaches 99%, and the system is suitable for any environment such as complex mountainous regions, water surfaces, agriculture and light complementation and large-scale environments. The system is accurate and comprehensive, supports calling in any mode, provides accurate data support for big data analysis and intelligent operation and maintenance, enables personnel to be in zero contact with a power station, and guarantees the safety of operation and maintenance personnel. The method has high timeliness, can be completed in a short time, is high in consistency, and can be repaired and maintained immediately.

title: Bayesian network-based fruit visual classification method and system
abstract: The invention relates to the field of agriculture and artificial intelligence, in particular to a fruit visual classification method and system based on a Bayesian network. The method comprises the steps of obtaining to-be-classified fruit data of to-be-classified fruits, and performing preprocessing to obtain a plurality of to-be-classified fruit visual feature values; discretizing each visual feature value of the to-be-classified fruits, inputting the discretized visual feature values to a pre-trained fruit classification Bayesian network model, and processing the discretized visual feature values to obtain grade classification probabilities of the to-be-classified fruits under a plurality of grade classifications; and performing grade classification on the to-be-classified fruits according to the plurality of grade classification probabilities. According to the fruit sorting system, accurate classification of fruits is achieved, and manpower and material resources consumed in fruit sorting are effectively reduced. By constructing the complex Bayesian network model for fruit classification, accurate classification of fruits can be achieved, manpower and material resources are reduced, and rapid classification of fruits is achieved.

title: NUTRIENT DEFICIENCY STRESS DETECTION AND PREDICTION IN CORN FIELDS FROM AERIAL IMAGES USING MACHINE LEARNING
abstract: NUTRIENT DEFICIENCY STRESS DETECTION AND PREDICTION IN CORN FIELDS FROM AERIAL IMAGES USING MACHINE LEARNING Abstract: Early, accurate diagnosis of nutrient deficiency stress (NDS) has important economic and environmental implications; precision application of chemical rather than blanket application decreases grower maintenance costs while minimizing the chemicals amount that can reach the atmosphere unnecessarily. Furthermore, early treatment decreases crop damage and, as a result, increases crop yield within a given season. In order to identify and predict NDS around the region, we collect sequences of aerial imagery of high-resolution and create models for semantic segmentation. Agriculture, deep learning, modern machine vision, and remote sensing all collide in our research. To begin, we create a benchmark for detection of full-field nutrient deficiency stress (NDS) and quantify the pretraining effects, architecture of backbone, representation of the input, and strategy sampling. This research leads to recent advances in deep learning (DL) for agriculture and remote sensing while also tackling a major social issue with sustainability and economic ramifications. Thus, this invention is intended in detecting the nutrient deficiency in corn fields using aerial images. Machine learning uses the aerial images in identifying and classifying the nutrient deficiency corn plant based on the severity of stress and symptom of each specific nutrient type. This invention of detecting NDS uses support vector machine (SVM) algorithm.
