title: Enhanced Management Zones for Precision Agriculture
applicants: UNIV IOWA STATE RES FOUND INC [US]
abstract: The present invention is a system and method for agricultural management-zone delineation to be done over broad geographic extents without overly-localized field-specific data. The instant innovation guides precision agricultural sampling and management by delineating enhanced management zones based upon remote sensing and artificial intelligence and combining the two with data derived from an existing countrywide soil survey database. In an embodiment, the instant innovation uses artificial intelligence from multiple sources to provide granular zone detail. Output of the present innovation can be aggregated to produce management zone sizes that have a level of uncertainty compatible with the needs of the customer-farmer and implementable given the capabilities of available equipment.

title: Integrated intelligent management and control system for vegetable input products
applicants: SHANGHAI CITY CHONGMING DISTRICT VEGETABLE SCIENCE AND TECH EXTENSION STATION
WUXI XUELANG DIGITAL SYSTEM TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an integrated intelligent management and control system for vegetable input products, and relates to the technical field of agriculture. A management and control platform in the system obtains identity information of a user entering an input product warehouse through a warehouse entrance guard installed at an entrance of the input product warehouse and performs identity verification; when the identity verification is passed, an entrance of the input product warehouse is opened, and a warehouse camera is activated to collect a video stream of an activity process of the user in the input product warehouse; and a management and control platform identifies an input product receiving behavior of the user from the video stream based on a pre-trained and stored input product receiving behavior detection model, generates a corresponding input product receiving record and user identity information, and correspondingly stores the input product receiving record and the user identity information in a management database. According to the system, the information technology and the artificial intelligence technology are effectively combined, a real and effective input product receiving record can be automatically formed in a non-perceptual, automatic and traceable manner in the whole process from entering a warehouse to receiving of input product users, and an input product management party is helped to carry out convenient and reliable management.

title: Method and system for detecting small-size pests on sticky trap image
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INFORMATION TECH AGRICULTURE
abstract: The invention provides a method and a system for detecting small-size pests on a sticky trap image, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a target image which is a sticky trap image for capturing a target pest; inputting the target image into a trained pest detection and recognition model to determine the type information and position information of the target pest, wherein the trained pest detection and recognition model is constructed based on a single-stage target detection algorithm; and obtaining the quantity information of the target pests by counting the detected type information and position information. According to the method and the system for detecting the small-size pests on the sticky trap image provided by the invention, the deep learning model for detecting the small-size pests is adopted to count the number of the target pests on the sticky trap image, and feature splicing is utilized to enlarge a feature map and increase residual units, automatic and accurate detection of small-size pests on the field pest sticking plate image is realized, an accurate data acquisition method is provided for pest population density estimation, and a data basis is provided for a later pest control strategy.

title: Non-contact live pig body size parameter measuring system
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INFORMATION TECH AGRICULTURE
NONGXIN NANJING SMART AGRICULTURE RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract: According to the non-contact live pig body size parameter measuring system provided by the utility model, the limiting fence bracket is arranged in a pig house channel in a live pig farm to form a live pig channel; the industrial camera is used for collecting an image containing pig face information; the depth camera is used for collecting images containing body length information of live pigs; the RFID reader-writer is used for determining individual identification codes of the live pigs; the industrial personal computer is used for generating a pig body data file according to the first image and the second image; and the server is used for obtaining body size parameters of the live pigs according to the pig body data file and the individual identification codes of the live pigs. According to the embodiment of the utility model, the characteristics of the depth camera and the industrial camera are combined, the Internet of Things, machine vision, image processing, deep learning and intelligent information processing are fused, non-contact measurement of body size parameters of live pigs is realized, live pig breeding is assisted by utilizing a datamation means, manual intervention and stress response of the live pigs are reduced, and the production efficiency is improved. And the production standardization, informatization, intelligence and automation levels of the live pig farm are improved.

title: Early warning method for delivery period of sheep
abstract: The invention discloses an early warning method for delivery period of sheep, which comprises the following steps of S1, monitoring sheep in a sheep house through a camera, and obtaining a streaming media video image; S2, inputting the streaming media video image into a deep learning network; S3, performing image recognition by using a deep learning network, recognizing standing and lying behaviors of the pregnant sheep, and performing real-time counting on the behavior from standing to lying and the behavior from lying to standing; S4, based on the real-time counting result, calculating the rising and lying frequency of the pregnant sheep; S5, judging whether the rising and lying frequency of the pregnant sheep reaches an early warning value or not and when the rising and lying frequency reaches the early warning value, giving an alarm; otherwise, returning to the step S3. Artificial interference is not needed, pregnant sheep monitoring can be carried out only through the monitoring camera of the sheep house and the computer carrying corresponding method programs, and therefore prenatal early warning is achieved, and the invention can save a large amount of manual labor and has the advantages of being real-time and automatic.

title: Intelligent control method of separating device for corn harvesting
abstract: The invention relates to intelligent work control in the field of intelligent agriculture, and particularly discloses an intelligent control method of a separating device for corn harvesting, which controls the separating device through a classification problem based on deep learning so as to improve the working efficiency. Specifically, in the control process, a first area corresponding to a corn crop in a current image and a second area except the first area in an initial feature map are determined through an object detection and division technology, and the second area comprises corn silk, straw, weed vines and other components; then an area difference value matrix between the first area and the second area is calculated to extract the characteristics related to the proportion of the corn cobs in the current harvesting batch to other components; and the regional differential value matrix is coded and then passes through a classifier to obtain a classification result used for representing whether a separation device at a discharge port of the elevator should be started or not.

title: An artificial intelligence based organic LED farming during post Covid 19
abstract: An artificial intelligence based organic LED farming during post Covid 19 The present invention relates to an organic LED (Light emitting diode) fanning using artificial intelligence is paving the way to increase crop production effectively with LED lights. Users can select specific wavelength to elicit targeted photo morphogenic, bio chemical, or physiological plant responses. LED can prevent physiological disorder that are common in indoor environments, and help reduce incidence if pest and diseases pressure in agriculture, which could ultimately increase crop production efficiency by preventing crop losses. The output response to the environment or to certain physiological parameters, energy efficiency and plant productivity can be optimized with LEDs using artificial intelligence. iNil . - ~jN po -w~". , rZ.. title: AN AGRICULTURAL SMART ROBOT DEVICE
abstract: The agriculture smart robot device comprising to automation and precise work improve by agricultural robot. The present invention more particularly invention enable an agricultural robot system and method of robotic harvesting, pruning, culling, weeding, measuring and managing of agricultural crops. Specifically to the use of robotic armatures, a computer or artificial intelligence system that can sense and decide before acting on the work object, alerting a human operator where intervention is required coupled with, machine vision, laser rastering, radar, infrared, ultrasound, touch or chemical sensing. A robot moves through a field first to "map" the plant locations, number and size of fruit and approximate positions of fruit or map the cordons and canes of grape vines. Once the map is complete, a robot or server can create an action plan that a robot may implement. An action plan may comprise operations and data specifying the agricultural function to perform as easy. title: Ethyl isoxazoline derivative and application thereof
applicants: DONGGUAN HEC PESTICIDE RES AND DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract: The invention provides an ethyl isoxazoline derivative and application thereof. Specifically, the invention provides a compound as shown in a formula (Ia) or a stereoisomer, nitrogen oxide or salt of the compound as shown in the formula (Ia), and a preparation method thereof. N is 0, 1 or 2; R<1a> is C1-6 alkyl or phenyl optionally substituted by 1 to 5 halogen atoms; and X is chlorine, a C1-6 alkoxy group or a halogenated C1-6 alkoxy group. Furthermore, the invention provides a composition containing the compounds and application of the composition in agriculture, especially application of the composition as a herbicide active ingredient for controlling unwanted plants.

title: THE CONTROLLING IRRIGATION AND PESTICIDES IN AGRICULTURAL USING METHOD OF ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
abstract: The controlling irrigation and pesticides in agricultural using method of artificial intelligence comprising a crop and a mild touchy sensor having a photograph-detector for monitoring mild intensity of a crop, an irrigation conduit extending alongside the span of the irrigation area and adapted to carry fluid, with one or greater controllable valves and sensors, increase sensors located in close proximity of the crop sensors, a laptop manipulate machine, an irrigation controller, and a communications hyperlink between the computer manipulate machine, the one or extra crop sensor, the or extra increase sensors, and the irrigation controller. Moreover agricultural platform guidance system and method will make it possible for small scale farming to take up automated mechanical farming practices which are currently only practical for large scale farming thus improving land utilization efficiency while lowering manpower costs dramatically. Additionally, for a humans are operator as integral to the operation either locally or remotely. APPLICANTS NAME:- RAVI HEMRAJ GEDAM; Dr. D. Arul Pon Daniel ; SRILATHA TOOMULA; Dr. Ajay Singh Yadav ; Dr.VIRESH SHARMA; Sampath Kumar; Todupunuri Somasekhar; Selvam Loganathan; Kavitha Perumal Sheet lof 2 INTERFACE TOYFROM MEDIA REMOTE OUTPUT F DEVICE Figure 1 Dated 1 1th February 2021.

title: SMART IRRIGATION ENRICHED WITH FERTILIZER MIXING AND WATER WASTAGE REDUCTION USING DEEP LEARNING TECHNIQUES
abstract: SMART IRRIGATION ENRICHED WITH FERTILIZER MIXING AND WATER WASTAGE REDUCTION USING DEEP LEARNING Abstract The major problem faced by today's world is water scarcity. If the effective usage of water is minimal when compared with the total amount of water drawn, then water wastage is more. Even though the water scarcity persists, agriculture have to be sustained in order to satisfy the food requirements of human race. With the help of recent technologies, we can design a smart irrigation model which in turn maximizes the amount of effective usage of water in agriculture field. In this work, three varieties of sensors are used such as climatic sensors, soil sensors and soil NPK sensors. The climate sensors assess the environmental conditions and gathers the details like temperature, humidity and wind speed. These are the main factors which are responsible for rainfall. If there is a possibility for excess rain or excess wind, then the irrigation to the agriculture field will be delayed to certain time. This feature of our model is developed with deep learning technique, which in turn improves the efficiency of the machine by learning from the previous results. The soil and NPK sensors gathers the details like moisture, NPK nutrients traces in the soil of the agriculture field. The input fed to this system is, soil type, relative humidity and plant type. The output will be suggestion predicting the need for irrigation with a period and also the amount of fertilizer needed to provide the maximum yield in an agriculture field. The radio circuit model gathers the details from climate sensors and soil sensors. The data measurements of the parameters such as temperature, humidity and wind speed will be given as input to the input layer of the Convolutional Neural Network (CNN). The processing will take place in the hidden layer and the following outputs will be produced. • Due to the prediction of excess wind in the near future, the distribution of water in unnecessary area will be avoided. • The system could provide a suggestion regarding the irrigation at right time and right quantity. • The duration of irrigation for the agriculture field is predicted accurately with the help of moisture sensors. title: MULTI-DIMENSION ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AGRICULTURE ADVISOR
abstract: A method, a computer system, and a computer program product for a multi-dimension artificial intelligence (AI) agriculture advisor is provided. Embodiments of the present invention may include creating a user profile. Embodiments of the present invention may include preparing and transforming the external data. Embodiments of the present invention may include conducting a hypothesis on the transformed data. Embodiments of the present invention may include validating the transformed data. Embodiments of the present invention may include training an artificial intelligence (AI) model based on the transformed data. Embodiments of the present invention may include validating and retraining the artificial intelligence (AI) model. Embodiments of the present invention may include matching the user data with the artificial intelligence (AI) model. Embodiments of the present invention may include ranking results based on the matching the user data with the artificial intelligence (AI) model.

title: AI-BASED CROP RECOMMENDATION SYSTEM FOR SMART FARMING TOWARDS AGRICULTURE 5.0
abstract: AI-BASED CROP RECOMMENDATION SYSTEM FOR SMART FARMING TOWARDS AGRICULTURE 5.0 According to a report of the Food and Agriculture Organization, the world population is projected to increase another two billion by 2050, while the arable region is expected to only grow by 5%. To increase productivity in agriculture, clever and effective agricultural techniques are therefore required. The determination of land adequacy for agriculture is a basic instrument for the growth of agriculture. Agriculture is using many emerging technologies and inventions as an approach to the gathering and distribution of agricultural knowledge. The rapid growth of wireless sensor networks has led to the creation of Internet of Things (IoT) of low cost and compact sensor devices, which are a feasible method for automating and making decisions in agriculture. This study proposes an expert framework for the evaluation of agricultural land suitability, by combining sensor networks with artificial intelligence systems such as neural networks and multi-component perceptron. This innovation would help farmers determine the farmland for agriculture according to four classes of judgment, i.e. more acceptable, suitable, reasonably appropriate and unsuitable. This measurement is based on the data from the different sensor instruments used for machine training. The results achieved by MLP with four hidden layers are seen in contrast to the other current model, to be successful for the multiclass classification system. This learned model is used to evaluate potential evaluations and to identify the land after each harvest. title: Agricultural internet-of-things management monitoring system
abstract: The invention discloses an agricultural internet-of-things management monitoring system. The system comprises a sensing module used for collecting and detecting various data, a data module used for collecting the data, an Internet of Things cloud platform used for sharing and analyzing the data, an application platform used for data mining and application, a digital platform used for centralized management, a monitoring module used for monitoring the crop environment in real time, a suggestion module used for carrying out targeted analysis on farmers, and a management module used for carryingout intelligent management on crops; and the management module is used for setting various data in the planting process by utilizing an artificial intelligence technology. According to the invention,the artificial intelligence technology and the crop growth model are used to globally optimize the planting process, the deep neural network model is used to identify the types and severity of infected diseases, and the treatment scheme is recommended in combination with the disease and pest knowledge base; meanwhile, optimal matching of resources is carried out, so that the resources are saved tothe maximum extent; and the accuracy is high, alarming is timely, and operation is simple and convenient.

title: Orchard farming activity automatic recording method
abstract: The invention discloses an orchard farming activity automatic recording method, which uses video monitoring to capture orchard farming activity images and recognize and classify farming activities, and uses figure dynamic detection, posture recognition and time sequence algorithm technologies in each process of image capture, recognition and classification and farming activity recording. Accuracyand authenticity of farming activity records are improved by means of a deep learning training model, so that orchard farming activity account records are supplemented, and reliability of fruit anti-counterfeiting traceability data is guaranteed.

title: Financial data processing system
abstract: The invention discloses a financial data processing system, and the system comprises a financial data collection module which is used for achieving the collection of financial data; a financial data classification module whcih is used for realizing pre-classification of financial occurrence data based on a deep learning algorithm of an infinite deep neural network; a financial data auditing modulewhich is used for realizing pre-auditing of financial occurrence data based on a preset financial data auditing model; an accounting voucher compiling module which is used for compiling a corresponding accounting voucher for each piece of financial occurrence data meeting the auditing standard, generating an electronic edition accounting voucher and finishing registration of corresponding daily accounting; and a financial statement compiling module which is used for periodically compiling financial statements based on the electronic edition accounting voucher. According to the system, automatic auditing of financial occurrence data can be realized, dangers existing in the financial occurrence data can be found in time, reasons of the dangers and related responsible persons are obtained, the workload of financial personnel is greatly reduced, and the financial security of enterprises is improved.

title: Artificial intelligent weeding machine for dwarfing fruit trees
applicants: ANHUI DEFENG ECOLOGICAL AGRICULTURE CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence weeding machine for dwarfing fruit trees, and relates to a weeding machine. The artificial intelligence weeding machine comprises a weeding box, wherein a motor is fixedly connected to the top of the weeding box, a longitudinal rotating sleeve is fixedly connected to the output end of the motor, a sliding rotating rod is connected to the bottom ofthe longitudinal rotating sleeve in a sliding manner, a knife rest is fixedly connected to the bottom of the sliding rotating rod, a crushing knife is fixedly connected to the outer side of the kniferest, a cam is fixedly connected to the outer side of the longitudinal rotating sleeve, a guide support is fixedly connected to the right side of the bottom of the weeding box, a sliding guide rod isconnected to the inner side of the guide support in a sliding manner, and a rotating block is rotationally connected to the right end of the sliding guide rod. When the artificial intelligence weeding machine is used, the artificial intelligence weeding machine is manually pushed to advance, weeds along the way are cut and removed through the crushing knife, cleaning is conducted after treatment,in addition, the machine can synchronously spray liquid to the outer side through a water pump, irrigation can be synchronously conducted, herbicide spraying can also be conducted, and when liquid issprayed, the spraying range is greatly increased through a moving spray head and the use experience is good.

title: PRECISION AGRICULTURE IMPLEMENTATION METHOD BY UAV SYSTEMS AND ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE IMAGE PROCESSING TECHNOLOGIES
abstract: A precision agriculture implementation method by UAV systems and artificial intelligence image processing technologies provides an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV), a wireless communication device, a central control unit, and a spray device and a multispectral camera installed to the UAV. The farming area is divided into an array of blocks. The central control unit controls the UAV to fly over the blocks according to navigation parameters and the multispectral camera to capture a multispectral image of each block. A projected leaf area index (PLAI) and a normalized difference vegetation index (NDVI) of each block are calculated by the multispectral image, and a spray control mode of the spray device of the corresponding block is set according to the PLAI and NDVI. The spray device is controlled to spray a water solution, salt solution, fertilizer solution, and/or pesticide solution to the corresponding block according to the spray control mode.

title: Automatic farmland head identification method and system
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT AGRICULTURE
abstract: The embodiment of the invention provides an automatic farmland head identification method and system. The method comprises the steps that a farmland head image is acquired; inputting the farmland edgeimage into a farmland edge recognition network model, and obtaining a farmland operation environment category corresponding to the farmland edge image according to an output result of the farmland edge recognition network model; wherein the farmland head recognition network model is obtained by training a farmland head image sample with a farmland operation environment category label; the farmland operation environment types comprise a non-crop farmland, a crop farmland, a green vegetation border, a yellow vegetation border, a bare soil border and an artificial facility border. According to the farmland head automatic identification method and system provided by the embodiment of the invention, the farmland head image in the agricultural machinery operation scene is identified based on deep learning, the operation environment of the current agricultural machinery operation can be accurately obtained, the real-time performance is good, and a feasible technical solution can be providedfor the autonomous perception of the field head environment of the intelligent agricultural machinery.

title: Ragweed monitoring method based on deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a ragweed monitoring method based on deep learning. According to the invention, with the help of an unmanned aerial vehicle platform, an efficient and real-time deep neural network D-linknet is designed to complete monitoring of ragweed in a farming area. The operation process of the whole system comprises the steps that firstly, an image of a ragweed occurrence area is collected through an unmanned aerial vehicle to serve as a training sample, then an efficient and real-time D-linknet semantic segmentation network is designed based on a Pytorch deep learning framework,model training is conducted on the training sample, and finally the generated model is applied to real-time monitoring of ragweed. The ragweed in a certain area of the Inner Mongolia region is monitored by using the Xinjiang Yu unmanned aerial vehicle. Vegetation area investigation video streams are obtained in real time through the unmanned aerial vehicle equipment, and finally segmentation results are transmitted back to the terminal, so that ambrosia is monitored, the ambrosia detection effect is guaranteed, workers do not need to detect ambrosia areas in real time, and the labor burden ofthe workers is reduced.

title: Red tide image automatic identification method and device
abstract: The invention provides a red tide image automatic identification method and device, and the method comprises the steps: carrying out the feature extraction, red tide pixel marking, red tide feature extraction and red tide feature weight training of a conventional red tide image, determining the features and weight associated with a red tide in a deep learning mode, and obtaining a red tide image.Therefore, pixel point feature analysis and image processing are carried out on the marine picture obtained through monitoring, red tide information in the marine picture is automatically recognized,the problems that in the prior art, the red tide cannot be accurately recognized from the marine picture, and timely and effective monitoring of the red tide cannot be achieved are solved, and high-precision and low-cost timely monitoring of the red tide is achieved.

title: System and method for automatically labeling town information by utilizing artificial intelligence
applicants: JIANGXI YUFENG INTELLIGENT AGRICULTURE TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a system and a method for automatically labeling town information by utilizing artificial intelligence. The method comprises the following steps: periodically updating a town map, forming a second neural network model by identifying feature points of the updated town map, and matching the second neural network model with a first neural network model formed by the town map based on the feature points. With the method, map unification is realized, the town map is updated each time, and each updated town map is matched with the town map of the previous version, so that theconsistency of contours of maps of all versions can be ensured, the correspondence of maps of new and old versions is realized, and the problem that town information labeling is dislocated due to urban development and change of feature points can be effectively prevented.

title: Credit rating generation method and system for agricultural social service subjects
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INFORMATION TECH AGRICULTURE
NONGXIN NANJING SMART AGRICULTURE RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
abstract: The invention provides a credit rating generation method and system for agricultural social service subjects and the method comprises the steps: selecting a credit evaluation index set for the agricultural social service subjects by big data analysis, and obtaining the index values of all service subjects from each historical moment to the current moment; inputting the index values of each servicesubject at all moments into a preset deep learning credit classification model, and outputting a credit category of each service subject at each moment; determining the comprehensive credit rating ofeach service subject according to the credit categories of each service subject at all historical moments and the current moment; and visually displaying the credit rating and the change process of the service subjects. Credit rating of the agricultural social service subjects is classified by using the deep learning technology, so that the credit rating result can reflect the credit condition ofthe agricultural social service subjects more comprehensively and accurately, and the scientific and intelligent level of the credit rating of the agricultural social service subjects is improved.

title: METHOD FOR ARTIFICIAL INSEMINATIONS OF COWS AND HEIFERS
abstract: The invention relates to the farming, in particular to the techniques for the artificial inseminations of the cattle. The method for the artificial inseminations of the cows and the heifers comprises recording the external manifestations of the estrus and double administration of the sperm with 8-12-hour interval. Prior to each administration, in the area of the biologically active point of uterus between the last lumbar vertebra and the first sacral vertebra, the potential of the biologically active point is measured under the constant current to be measured within 10-20 iA. The rectal temperature is measured as well.

title: ROBOT SYSTEM USING ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE FOR PREVENTING BLIGHT AND HARMFUL INSECTS FROM DAMAGING PLANTS
abstract: According to the present invention, an operating method of a robot system for plant blight prevention using artificial intelligence comprises: a step of storing input data for blight and a plant to be removed in the robot system; a step of setting blight and a plant to be removed and a work method in the robot system; a step of setting a work area or a work area boundary; a step of supplying a required material and power to the robot system; a step in which the robot system moves in response to a work start instruction of a user; a step in which the robot system recognizes a blight-infected plant to be removed; a step in which the robot system removes the plant infected by blight; a step in which the robot system processes and stores the removed blight-infected plant; and a step in which the robot system ends work. Accordingly, plants infected by blight such as produce, fruit trees, garden products, and trees can be perfectly prevented from spreading the blight at very low costs in an eco-friendly manner to improve farming productivity, reduce environmental pollution, and produce healthy and inexpensive produce, forest products, garden products, etc.

title: Unmanned aerial system and liquid spraying method with artificial intelligence image processing technology capable of accurately controlling irrigation and spraying timing for water/liquid fertilizer/medicine solution required for crop growth
abstract: This invention discloses an unmanned aerial system and a water/liquid fertilizer/medicine solution spraying method with artificial intelligence image processing technology. In which, the unmanned aerial vehicle is mounted with a spraying device and a multispectral camera. The farming area is divided into multiple blocks. Each block is set with navigation parameters. According to the spraying flight path, the unmanned aerial vehicle is controlled to fly through each block in sequence and the multispectral camera is used to capture the multispectral image for each block. The navigation parameters and multispectral images of each block are transmitted to the monitoring unit through signal transmission means. The image processing module built in the monitoring unit will perform the image processing on the multispectral images and interpret the navigation parameters for each block. The image processing module calculates a projected leaf area index and a normalized vegetation index for each block based on the multispectral images to determine the blocks to be sprayed with water/liquid fertilizer/medicine solution and the spraying amount of each block, so as to accurately control the irrigation and spraying timing of the water/liquid fertilizer/medicine solution required for crop growth. Therefore, this invention may improve the pesticide abuse issue, reduce the cost of agricultural planting, and enhance the efficiency of agricultural pest management.

title: USE OF SOIL AND OTHER ENVIRONMENTAL DATA TO RECOMMEND CUSTOMIZED AGRONOMIC PROGRAMS
abstract: The subject invention provides systems and methods for classifying a microbiome at a geographic site where agricultural activity is, or will be, conducted in order to improve and/or promote agricultural productivity at the site. The subject invention utilizes a large sample set of diverse DNA sequencing input data collected from soil, plant, water and/or air samples, as well as environmental information, to determine relationships between environmental factors and the identities, quantities and distributions of microbial species, taxonomies, and/or groupings thereof, at a chosen site. Machine learning and/or artificial intelligence classifier tools use this information to generate various output data, such as, for example, recommendations for customized soil and/or crop treatment compositions, irrigation practices, and/or other agricultural activity, to enhance plant health and crop productivity at the site.

title: USE OF SOIL AND OTHER ENVIRONMENTAL DATA TO RECOMMEND CUSTOMIZED AGRONOMIC PROGRAMS
abstract: The subject invention provides systems and methods for classifying a microbiome at a geographic site where agricultural activity is, or will be, conducted in order to improve and/or promote agricultural productivity at the site. The subject invention utilizes a large sample set of diverse DNA sequencing input data collected from soil, plant, water and/or air samples, as well as environmental information, to determine relationships between environmental factors and the identities, quantities and distributions of microbial species, taxonomies, and/or groupings thereof, at a chosen site. Machine learning and/or artificial intelligence classifier tools use this information to generate various output data, such as, for example, recommendations for customized soil and/or crop treatment compositions, irrigation practices, and/or other agricultural activity, to enhance plant health and crop productivity at the site.

title: INTEGRATED AGRICULTURE INFORMATION AND MANAGEMENT SYSTEM, AND METHODS OF USING THE SAME
abstract: An integrated agriculture information and management system (AIMS system) for managing a produce from a farmer to a retailer, includes a central processing module including data management unit, analytics unit, business case making analysis unit, functionality unit, customer relationship management unit and financial unit; a harvesting module operable to provide information related to harvesting of produce to the central processing module; a vendors module for vendors including cold storage unit, pack house unit, processing center, distribution center, transportation unit and bankers unit, and a retailer module. The plurality of modules are augmented and integrated with at least one of blockchain technology, internet of things, artificial intelligence, customer relationship management, and application programming interface such that movement of the produce is recorded in real time and instantaneously, and when the produce is delivered to the retailer, the farmer and vendors are automatically paid for the produced delivered to the retailer.

title: Target spraying test bed based on machine vision
applicants: NANJING INST AGRICULTURAL MECHANIZATION MINI AGRICULTURE & RURAL AFFAIRS
abstract: A target spraying test bed based on machine vision adopts deep camera machine vision based on deep learning to identify and position target crops, and can obtain three-dimensional information of the target crops at the same time, thereby accurately guiding the spatial position of a nozzle, and effectively improving the spraying quality and effect. A parallel manipulator is adopted as a nozzle position moving device, the positioning precision is high, the running speed is high, the stability is high, and the nozzle position can be accurately and rapidly conveyed; the adjustable trolley wheel track and the track distance are adopted, field environments in different planting modes can be simulated, meanwhile, a sand table crop planting mode is adopted, layout of different target crops and non-target crops can be achieved, the number of simulable scenes is large, operation is easy and convenient, the difficulty of field tests is lowered, and the field test efficiency is improved. And meanwhile, the whole system can be trained and subjected to parameter adjustment through different scenes, so that the running speed and accuracy are improved.

title: End-to-end plant root system characteristic automatic segmentation system
abstract: The invention discloses an end-to-end plant root system characteristic automatic segmentation system. The system comprises a scanning camera, a USB connecting line, a Raspberry Pi, an HDMI connectingline and a display screen. A scanning camera is used for collecting images of plant roots in a cultivation container, a scanning camera is arranged beside the cultivation container, and the scanning camera is connected to a USB interface of the Raspberry Pi through a USB connecting line. The deep learning semantic segmentation algorithm after iterative training is burned into the Raspberry Pi. Thescanning camera transmits root system images of plants in different growth periods into the Raspberry Pi for pixel segmentation through root system image acquisition based on time sequence nodes, a display screen is connected to an HDMI interface of the Raspberry Pi, and a segmentation result is directly output to the display screen to be displayed and stored. The plant root system characteristicautomatic segmentation system provided by the invention is simple in structure and easy to achieve, and compared with a traditional root system segmentation method, the system can acquire a root system visual image with a larger area on the premise of ensuring the segmentation precision, and end-to-end plant root image segmentation is achieved.

title: Method for pruning trunk type apple seedling based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANDONG FENCER INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
SHUIFA WISDOM AGRICULTURAL TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a method for pruning a trunk type apple seedling based on artificial intelligence. The method includes the steps of step one, trunk fixing which includes that after field planting, when the seedling height is more than 20 cm higher than a preset trunk height, fixing a trunk at the preset trunk height through a preset expert system; if the seedling height does not exceed thepreset trunk height for 20 cm, fixing the trunk in the next year of field planting; and during trunk fixing, a position, 95-105cm above the ground, on the trunk is locked through a robot vision system, and dug information is fed back to a background processing unit. The method for pruning the trunk type apple seedling based on artificial intelligence belongs to the technical field of agriculturalplanting. According to the method for pruning the trunk type apple sapling based on artificial intelligence, a branch or trunk processing mode can be formed according to basic information such as varieties and planting time input by a user, the expert system preset by a processing platform, and collected fruit tree trunks and branch states, the thought is suitable for production, so that the practicability is high, and the popularization is easy. An intelligent method is used for farming operation of a field orchard, and the problems of discontinuous labor and low working saturation of workers in an early stage of orchard construction are solved.

title: Physical pest control remote monitoring device applied to facility agriculture
applicants: JIANGSU NUOLI ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses a physical pest control remote monitoring device applied to facility agriculture. The utility model belongs to the technical field of pest control equipment. Stand column,a solar power generation panel is fixedly arranged at the top end of the stand column. A bearing seat is arranged at the bottom end of the stand column; a rubber pad is arranged at the middle sectionof the stand column; storage grids are formed in the positions, located below the rubber pads, of the surfaces of the stand columns; a revolving door is arranged at the position, corresponding to thestorage grid, of the surface of the stand column; according to the utility model, the heating device is arranged; electronic elements in the monitoring device can be effectively heated by controllingthe heating principle of the heating ring at a low temperature; damage of electronic elements can be avoided, fog and frost can be prevented from falling on the surface of the lens to affect the shooting effect, the solar power generation panel is arranged and can be effectively matched with the storage battery to supply power to the monitoring equipment, the investment cost can be reduced while energy conservation and environmental protection are achieved, and the practicability of the equipment is improved.

title: Farmland soil fertility evaluation method based on convolutional neural network
abstract: The invention discloses a farmland soil fertility evaluation method based on a convolutional neural network. The method comprises the steps: obtaining an original farmland image, and building a farmland soil fertility classification model; performing normalization processing on each original farmland image, and performing data expansion on the normalized original data to form a training set; training the farmland soil fertility classification model by adopting the training set, obtaining a plurality of images of the target farmland as to-be-evaluated pictures, inputting the to-be-evaluated pictures into the trained farmland soil fertility classification model, and outputting a corresponding classification result; and obtaining the fertility evaluation grade of the target farmland after statistical analysis. According to the method, samples are obtained under the condition of not damaging farmland and crop growth, the soil fertility condition of the current land parcel is repeatedly calculated through deep learning, manpower and material resources are saved, and the classification accuracy is high; meanwhile, by combining a soil fertility multi-parameter space-time distribution rule, effective technical support is provided for accurate fertilization in final intelligent agriculture.

title: Canopy density measurement method and device, electronic equipment and storage medium
applicants: RURAL ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENT AGENCY MINI OF AGRICULTURE AND RURAL AFFAIRS
abstract: One or more embodiments of the invention provide a canopy density measurement method. The canopy density measurement method comprises the following steps: acquiring a color image containing crops; extracting color features of the color image as input features of a crop identification model; based on the crop identification model, identifying crops in the color image according to color features ofthe color image, wherein the crop identification model is a deep learning segmentation network U-net model used for identifying crops in a color image based on input features; and determining the canopy density of the crops according to the proportion of the crops in the identified color image in the color image. Corresponding to the canopy density measuring method, the invention further providesa canopy density measuring device, electronic equipment and a computer readable medium.

title: Rice disease type identification method based on deep residual convolutional neural network
applicants: GUANGZHOU AIRICE ECOLOGICAL ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE AGRICULTURE CO LTD
abstract: The invention provides a rice disease type identification method based on a deep residual convolutional neural network, and is applied to the field of computer vision. The method comprises the following steps of forming disease recognition training data by acquiring disease rice photo data and receiving data annotation of a user on a disease rice photo; zooming a diseased rice picture according todifferent proportions, and mixing the zoomed diseased rice picture with an original diseased rice picture to improve robustness of the model; and associating a preset rice color value weight ratio with disease category labels in the disease identification training data, thereby training a rice disease identification model through the disease identification training data and the example data. Thenatural law that diseases have certain color value difference is utilized, and the rice color value weight ratio and the disease data are associated to serve as priori knowledge, so that the early disease recognition rate of the rice is increased.

title: Efficient breeding method for early-maturing disease-resistant cotton
applicants: GRAIN & OIL CROP INST HEBEI ACADEMY AGRICULTURE & FORESTRY SCIENCES
abstract: The invention discloses an efficient breeding method for early-maturing disease-resistant cotton. The method comprises the following steps: screening a target cotton variety as a female parent or a male parent based on a preset target disease-resistant character; selecting a target early-maturing cotton variety as a recurrent parent based on a preset advantage complementation rule, and finishing directional hybridization of the female parent or the male parent and the recurrent parent to obtain an F1 generation group; performing genetic similarity analysis on the F1 generation group obtained in the step S2 based on a molecular marker of a target disease resistance character by utilizing an SSR marking method; and carrying out backcross on the recurrent parent serving as a father parent andthe F1 single plant carrying a target disease-resistant character gene, and breeding an early-maturing and high-yield strain carrying the target disease-resistant character from offspring. Through combination of SSR molecular markers and deep learning, the breeding speed of germplasm resource innovation is greatly increased, and meanwhile, varieties integrating multiple excellent traits can be screened out.

title: LIGHT BLOCKING DEVICE FOR APPLICATIONS IN AGRICULTURAL BUILDINGS, IN PARTICULAR FOR USE IN INDOOR CROP GROWING AND LIVESTOCK FARMING
abstract: The invention concerns a light blocking device and a corresponding light blocking panel for applications in agricultural buildings. The light blocking device comprises a plurality of overlapped flaps (20) spaced from one another at a certain centre distance (IA) to frontally define a pair of inlet passage (12) and outlet (14) surfaces for an air current; the first surface (12) is designed to face the outside and the second surface (14) is designed to face the inside, or vice versa, of an agricultural building structure where the light blocking device (10) is installed, the plurality of flaps (20) having longitudinal development characterised by a profile (21) comprising at least a wave-shaped curve (22-24), the flaps (20) defining with their longitudinal development a plurality of passage channels (16) for the air current which passes through said pair of passage surfaces (12, 14). The invention is characterised by the fact that the longitudinal development of the profile (21) of the flaps (20) comprises at least a pair of main wave-shaped curves (22, 24) orientated in a same direction and having different heights (H), the centre distance (IA) between the flaps (20) being substantially constant throughout their longitudinal development. The substantial asymmetry of the longitudinal development of the profile of the flaps gives the panel according to the invention a great versatility of use, where a high light blocking power LRF and/or a low pressure drop ΔΡ can be prioritised.

title: Method and device for automatically measuring soft rot spot area of in-vitro plant
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of agriculture, in particular to a method and device for automatically measuring the soft rot spot area of an in-vitro plant. The method comprises: acquiring a sample picture of an in-vitro plant; calibrating the resolution in the sample picture; acquiring a sample picture, extracting a lesion area in the sample picture, and performing semantic segmentation on the lesion area by adopting full convolutional networks (FCN) in deep learning during extraction to automatically extract a lesion area, wherein the full convolutional neural network is trained through a manually labeled sample set; and counting the total number of pixel points in the scab area, and calculating the scab area. According to the method, the purpose of automatically, efficiently and accurately measuring the area of the soft rot spot is achieved, and support can be provided for actual requirements of in-vitro disease spot area measurement in current soft rot research.

title: METHOD OF FOREST DEVELOPMENT OF LANDS CONTAMINATED WITH RADIONUCLIDES
applicants: FEDERALNOE BYUDZHETNOE UCHREZHDENIE VSEROSSIJSKIJ NAUCHNO ISSLEDOVATELSKIJ INSTITUT LESOVODSTVA I ME [RU]
abstract: FIELD: agriculture; forestry.SUBSTANCE: invention relates to agriculture and forestry. Disclosed is a method of forest development of lands contaminated with radionuclides, involving development of lands not covered by forest and excluded from agricultural use by planting forest tree plants to form forest stands, density of planting of which is determined through parameters of crowns in middle-aged plantation. At the same time forest development is carried out in one stage by setting of English oak. Number of trees to be planted is set depending on the yield class by formula: N≥ 10,000/D, where N- number of trees to be planted in a site with a certain class of site quality, not less than, pieces/ha, D- diameter of crowns of trees in middle-aged plantation on a site with a certain class of quality, m. Diameter of crown of oak tree in middle-aged plantation according to classifications is equal to: Ib - 2.5 m; Ia - 2.3 m; I - 2.0 m; II - 1.8 m, and its landing is carried out simultaneously with treatment of soil in the pre-winter period to stable frosts during the beginning of formation of snow cover.EFFECT: method ensures formation of environmentally sustainable forest phytocenosis of high productivity and low natural burning with minimum silvicultural treatment.1 cl

title: Intelligent Shopping Card by using Internet of Things (IoT), Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) Technologies
abstract: Intelligent Shopping Card by using IoT (Internet of Things), Al (Artificial Intelligence) and ML (Machine Learning) technologies The IoT, Al and ML are the advanced technologies, which has the applications in almost all the fields like agriculture, healthcare, retail, etc. the present invention is the application in the retail field. Currently the users are standing in a long queue to pay the payments, discounts are given generally for all the customers, customers need to carry the shopping bags/trolleys and cannot pay bill remotely while doing the shopping in the shopping mall. The invention is done with the IoT, AL and ML technologies, where this will make users to pay amount remotely, and will suggest individual discounts that which will increase the sales for the seller and got better service for the Customers. _ _ _100 301

title: Agricultural production planning accurate decision-making method and system based on big data and artificial intelligence
abstract: The invention discloses an agricultural production planning accurate decision-making method and system based on big data and artificial intelligence and relates to the field of agriculture, the systemcomprises a data collection module, an intelligent collection terminal, a cloud data processing system, a decision terminal and a farmer, the data collection module is responsible for data collection. The data collection module wirelessly transmits collected data to the intelligent collection terminal through the Internet. The cloud intelligent collection terminal analyzes and processes the received information. According to the invention, big data and artificial intelligence are used for assistance; agricultural production of farmers is guided; meanwhile, various kinds of data are collected;the technical guidance of '3S' and related experts is used; a farmer can make a final production decision only through the decision terminal, so that the production of the farmer is scientifically guided, the industrialization of agricultural production is promoted, the quality and yield of agricultural products are improved, the income of the farmer is increased, and the method has a large-areapopularization and application value.

title: Text sentiment analysis method based on deep learning and TFIDF algorithm
abstract: The invention relates to a Chinese sentiment analysis method based on combination of deep learning and a TFIDF algorithm. The method includes: carrying out text preprocessing on the obtained Chinese corpus and Wikipedia Chinese corpus, then respectively performing training by using a word2vec model, then combining word vectors obtained by training the Chinese corpus and the Wikipedia Chinese corpus to serve as input of a deep learning training model, and then constructing an emotion analysis model; and finally, predicting the new corpus. According to the method, complex dictionary constructionis not needed, the labor cost is reduced, the influence of tedious feature engineering construction on the classification result is avoided, meanwhile, the features learned in the deep learning modelare combined with traditional semantic information, and the classification accuracy is improved. In addition, the field of the text and the Chinese corpus of Wikipedia are considered in the trainingof the word vector, so that the accuracy of expressing the semantic information of the text by the word vector is improved.

title: Intelligent breeding management system
applicants: SHANDONG YIYUAN AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY MACHINERY TECH CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses an intelligent breeding management system, which comprises a sensor group arranged in a shed and used for collecting environmental data, and the sensor group is connected with a main processor; the material tower is used for storing feed and provided with a weighing sensor, and the weighing sensor is connected with the main processor; the camera is used for monitoring conditions in the greenhouse and is connected with the main processor; the main processor is also connected with a display screen for displaying parameters; wherein the upstream processor is arranged in a feed factory, the downstream processor is arranged in a slaughter house, and the upstream processor and the downstream processor are respectively connected with the main processor through a firstwireless communication module. The system has an upstream and downstream information interaction function, can realize effective intercommunication among farmers, slaughter houses and feed factories,and does not need the farmers to follow the feed factories and the slaughter houses; artificial intelligence breeding can be achieved through intelligent breeding, breeding indexes are improved, breeding safety is improved, manpower is liberated, and breeding is truly simpler.

title: Improved Faster RCNN hydroponic vegetable seedling state detection method
abstract: The invention discloses an improved Faster RCNN hydroponic vegetable seedling state detection method, and belongs to the technical field of agricultural cultivation. According to the method, an improved Faster RCNN detection network is provided, aiming at the characteristic that hydroponic vegetable seedling images are tiny and dense, HRNet is adopted as a feature extraction network, information loss in the down-sampling process is reduced, information of small target objects is well reserved, and therefore good semantic information is provided for regression and classification of follow-up candidate boxes. According to the method, the RoI Align and Soft NMS methods are applied to improve the recognition precision and recall rate of the model, so that the detection effect of the model is improved, a good and reliable feature map is obtained, and a good foundation is laid for subsequent candidate box classification and regression; in the modernization process of the facility agriculture, a deep learning algorithm is migrated to the field of seedling images of the facility agriculture, automatic detection of the seedling state of the hydroponic vegetables is achieved, and manual labor is reduced.

title: Directional artificial intelligence training method and device and storage medium
applicants: INNER MONGOLIA ZHONGFUMINGFENG AGRICULTURE TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a training method of agricultural directional artificial intelligence. Graphic data of agricultural land and corresponding agricultural data are continuously collected, and pretreatment is performed, a training set and a test set are performed, a simulation platform is built, a corresponding artificial intelligence algorithm is selected according to the performance of thecomputing terminal, training is performed through a parallel virtual system; calculation power distribution is performed according to performance requirements in various artificial intelligence algorithms, an evaluation network is constructed, each decision is evaluated, the decision training efficiency is improved, the decision made by each grid is planned as a whole, the cost of the made corresponding decision is selected according to the grid distance, and the obtained optimal decision is deployed. According to the method, training is carried out in a single operation node through multipleartificial intelligence training methods, more parallel operations of a CPU and a GPU are mobilized under the condition that the computing power is limited, an evaluation function is introduced to reduce the training expenditure, and the operation cost of agricultural execution is greatly reduced.

title: A SYSTEM MONITORING FOR HARVESTING OF FARMING USING DRONE TECHNOLOGY
abstract: A SYSTEM MONITORING FOR HARVESTING OF FARMING USING DRONE TECHNOLOGY The present disclosure provides a system for monitoring and controlling farming using drone technology comprising a drone system (101) for monitoring the farm and transmitting information and a ground control system (106) for controlling the drone system and receiving the information. A camera (102) is provided in the drone system (102) for capturing images and video, a GPS module (103) is provided in the drone system (101) for locating image and video captured by the camera, a sensor module (104) is provided in the drone system (101) for measuring parameters of temperature, humidity, gas and pH. A microcontroller (105) is provided in the ground control system (106) for processing the parameters and transmitting to an artificial intelligence module (108) and the artificial intelligence module (108) is configured for determining present crop growth and predicting future crop growth in the farm based on the data. Fig. 1 Drone system 101 Camera 102 Sensor module 104 Microcontroller 105 t Ground control system 106 Control module 107 Artificial intelligence module Crop growth monitoring module 109 Crop growth predicting module 110 Database 111 Display 112 Fig. 1

title: AI artificial intelligence training device and training method thereof
abstract: The invention discloses an AI artificial intelligence training device and a training method thereof. The AI artificial intelligence training device is specifically designed in the technical field of AI artificial intelligence control, has rich high-simulation three-dimensional scenes, and is suitable for training of multiple industries such as intelligent agriculture, intelligent traffic, intelligent logistics, intelligent medical treatment, intelligent industry, intelligent safety and intelligent buildings. The system is simple and easy to operate, rich and flexible in system debugging, and easy to update, maintain and use. The technical principle of the training device is that IOT is used for data collection, 5G communication is used as a channel, sensing data is transmitted to the training device for cloud computing processing, and artificial intelligence understanding and judgment are realized. That is to say, an actual sensor is connected to the training device, and equipment operation in a simulation scene of the training device is controlled through a data source generated by the actual sensor, so that an associated real-time dynamic effect is generated.

title: Agricultural product quality control traceability platform based on block chain
abstract: The invention discloses an agricultural product quality control traceability platform based on a block chain. The platform collects agricultural product planting, warehousing, processing, package tagging, evaluation, logistics, sales and supervision link data, uploads the data to a block chain platform to ensure that the data cannot be tampered, adopts a data collection mode of system collection +Internet of Things + artificial intelligence, and uploads the data through a DAPP application on each link. According to the invention, the quality tracing problem of high-quality agricultural products can be solved, the codes of different links are established according to the production, processing and circulation processes based on batches, the correlation between the codes needs to be established, and it is ensured that the quality information of all the links is traced.

title: Artificial intelligence general investigation management device for forestry harmful organisms
applicants: ANHUI KANGHE AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY INSECT DISEASE INTEGRATION CONTROL CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence general investigation management device for forestry harmful organisms. The artificial intelligence general investigation management device comprisesa forestry harmful insect storage management assembly, wherein a plurality of groups of adjustable partition plate assemblies and a plurality of groups of automatic jacking partition transverse plateassemblies are arranged in the forestry harmful insect storage management assembly; the adjustable partition plate assemblies are inserted into the forestry harmful insect storage management assembly, and two W-shaped elastic positioning pieces at the end parts of each adjustable partition plate assembly are slidably connected in two side box bodies in the length direction of a rectangular harmful insect storage box through guide sliding grooves, wherein the two end pieces of the W-shaped elastic positioning pieces are tightly clamped among the three positioning convex heads through clampinggaps; and plate bodies of rectangular automatic jacking transparent partition transverse plates on the automatic jacking partition transverse plate assemblies elastically expands and contracts relative to the plate bodies of the rectangular transparent partition transverse plates through the matching of guide sliding rods and jacking springs, and a plurality of triangular sealing sheets form an inverted conical elastic sealing structure inside a storage pipe.

title: Vegetable sorting system
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT AGRICULTURE
abstract: The utility model relates to the technical field of vegetable sorting assembly lines, and discloses a vegetable sorting system, which comprises a conveying mechanism for placing vegetables, a controller, and a vegetable recognition mechanism and a sorting mechanism which are sequentially arranged along the conveying direction of the conveying mechanism, the vegetable recognition mechanism comprises an image acquisition assembly and an image recognition processor which are connected with each other, a lens of the image acquisition assembly faces the conveying mechanism, and a neural network module is arranged in the image recognition processor to judge whether vegetables in images acquired by the image acquisition assembly are qualified or not; the sorting mechanism is used for selectivelymoving the vegetables; the sorting mechanism and the image recognition processor are electrically connected to the controller. According to the vegetable sorting system, machine vision and a mechanical sorting production line are combined, the application range is wider, the flexibility is higher, and automatic recognition, grading and screening of leafy vegetables can be achieved through deep learning training.

title: Artificial intelligence agricultural irrigation device with low energy consumption and high efficiency in multiple directions
applicants: BOZHOU ZHONGSEN AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY TECH CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence agricultural irrigation device with low energy consumption and high efficiency in multiple directions. Device comprising a device body, a water tank is arranged at the top of the device body; a storage battery is arranged at the bottom of the water tank; wheels are arranged at the bottom end of the storage battery; a water tank water inlet isformed in the top end of the water tank, a push-pull handle is arranged at one end of the water tank, a power supply control panel is arranged at the top end of the push-pull handle, and a pedal is arranged at the bottom end of the power supply control panel. The irrigation device is suitable for mountainous area field crop irrigation, more suitable for plain large-area farming irrigation, high inflexibility, easy and convenient to operate and wide in irrigation range. The irrigation device not only can irrigate crops, but also can spray pesticide to the crops, and is multiple in function, high in efficiency, high in speed and uniform in spraying. The irrigation device has the advantages of full-automatic control, automatic braking, automatic stretching and unfolding, no need of manual pushing, manpower saving, capability of adjusting the spraying distance, capability of improving the spraying uniformity and water resource saving.

title: Agricultural intelligent platform based on Internet of Things
applicants: HUNAN FENGMAO PLANT PROT MACHINERY CO LTD
abstract: The utility model relates to the field of agricultural management, in particular to an agricultural intelligent platform based on the Internet of Things, which comprises an IaaS module, a PaaS moduleand an SaaS module, the IaaS module is connected with the PaaS module, and the PaaS module is connected with the SaaS module; the IaaS module comprises an Internet of Things base station, an agricultural sensor and an insect condition acquisition device, and the agricultural sensor and the insect condition acquisition device are connected with the Internet of Things base station through adapters and transmit data to the Internet of Things base station; the PaaS module comprises a data processing module and an artificial intelligence module, and the data processing module is connected with theartificial intelligence module; the SaaS module comprises a user processing module, and a user manages the platform through the user processing module. Artificial intelligence agriculture can be comprehensively achieved, labor force is reduced, production cost is saved, grain quality safety is improved, and agricultural intellectualization is achieved.

title: Road pedestrian automatic identification and positioning method based on deep learning and U-V parallax algorithm
abstract: The invention relates to a road pedestrian automatic recognition and positioning method based on deep learning and a U-V parallax algorithm, and the method comprises the steps: collecting a road foreground binocular image through a binocular road intelligent sensing system, and training a target pedestrian recognition model through a RetinaNet deep learning algorithm; based on a deep learning identification result, using a semi-global block matching (SGBM) algorithm to realize parallax calculation of a pedestrian road foreground binocular image. Based on the calculated disparity map, the disparity values in the U-V direction are counted respectively, the three-dimensional coordinates of the target pedestrian are obtained according to the binocular stereo camera imaging principle, and finally positioning of the pedestrian on the road is achieved. The method can achieve the detection of pedestrians on a road, assists a driver in judging the distance between pedestrians in front of a driving vehicle, and improves the driving safety of the driving vehicle in a traffic environment.

title: Image detection and recognition method and device
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INFORMATION TECH AGRICULTURE
abstract: The embodiment of the invention provides an image detection and recognition method and device, and the image detection and recognition method comprises the steps: inputting the aerial image data of anunmanned plane into a network model of a Faster-RCNN, and obtaining the accurate position of a target object outputted by the network model of the Faster-RCNN, wherein the network model of the Faster-RCNN is obtained by training the classification probability and the frame regression according to the detection classification probability and the detection frame regression. Image data collected byan unmanned aerial vehicle platform is combined based on an image recognition technology; a target detection algorithm in deep learning is applied and a learning model with a specific depth is trainedso that accurate positioning and identification of the target object can be realized; and the complex image preprocessing process can be reduced, and the detection efficiency is high, and the detection precision is high, and the practicality is high, and the adaptability and the reliability are great, and the target object can be rapidly detected and identified.

title: Stable fixing device for artificial intelligence robot
abstract: The utility model discloses a stable fixing device for an artificial intelligence robot. The cabinet comprises a cabinet body, a sealing mechanism is arranged on one side of the cabinet body; u-shapedplates are fixed at the top and the bottom in the cabinet body; adjusting mechanisms are arranged in the U-shaped plates; a first straight rack and two push rods are arranged on the adjusting mechanism; the two first straight racks correspond to the sealing mechanism; each U-shaped plate is provided with two first openings, the push rods are located in the first openings, one ends of the two pushrods in the same horizontal plane are jointly connected with a connecting plate in a rotating mode, two telescopic rods are jointly fixed between the connecting plate and the U-shaped plates, and theconnecting plate is sleeved with four sliding rods in a sliding mode. The distance between the bearing boxes can be well adjusted, so that a robot is conveniently clamped between the two bearing boxes, the robot can be effectively isolated from the outside, the good blocking and buffering effects can be achieved, and the stability of the robot in the transportation process is guaranteed.

title: Water-fertilizer integrated system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANDONG MUYUTIANHE INTELLIGENT AGRICULTURE CO LTD
abstract: The utility model relates to a water and fertilizer integrated system based on artificial intelligence, which belongs to the technical field of agricultural irrigation and comprises an information acquisition and processing system, a water and fertilizer mixed application system, an inspection robot, a cloud platform and a distributed monitoring center. Wherein the information acquisition and processing system acquires data such as soil moisture content, soil pH value, soil EC value, soil temperature value, air temperature and humidity, illumination intensity and trace elements, the data is transmitted to the cloud platform through a network after fusion processing, and the water and fertilizer mixed application system performs water and fertilizer mixed application according to the soil moisture content, crop growth cycle and growth condition. The inspection robot regularly inspects crops, monitors and locates diseases and insect pests on line, identifies disease and insect pest typesand accurately sprays pesticides to targets; and the cloud platform issues instructions for fertilizing and irrigating crops to the water and fertilizer mixed application system or issues instructions for treating crop diseases and insect pests to the inspection robot according to information fed back by the information acquisition and processing system and the inspection robot.

title: Artificial intelligence feed putting device based on cattle and sheep breeding
applicants: SHANDONG VOCATIONAL ANIMAL SCIENCE & VETERINARY COLLEGE
abstract: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence feed putting device based on cattle and sheep breeding. The utility model discloses a novel agricultural pesticide spraying device, which belongsto the technical field of agriculture, and comprises a bottom plate, the upper surface of the bottom plate is fixedly connected with the lower surface of a box body through a weightometer, four grooves are formed in the left side surface of the box body, and the inner walls of the grooves are fixedly connected with the right side surface of a side plate through strong springs. The artificial intelligence-based feed putting device for cattle and sheep breeding has the advantages that the operation is simple; the box body, a brush plate, a threaded column, a threaded cap, a moving plate, a connecting block, a motor and a baffle plate are matched with one another; meanwhile, the motor drives the threaded column to rotate; at the moment, the brush plate moves leftwards to clean the box body;when the movable plate pushes the connecting block and the baffle to move leftwards, feed can be thrown at the moment, meanwhile, residues in the box body can be pushed leftwards out of the box body through the brush plate, the cleaning process of the box body can be achieved at the same time, the manual cleaning time of workers is saved, and the feeding process can be simpler and faster to a certain extent.

title: Navel orange grading screening device
applicants: GANZHOU NANSENLIN MODERN AGRICULTURE DEV CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses a navel orange classifying and screening device. The top of a workbench of the rack is fixedly connected with a feeding hopper through a supporting frame. A discharging opening is reserved in the feeding hopper and communicates with an inclined plate; the lower end of the inclined plate is arranged on the workbench; a limiting groove of the screening assembly is formedin the surface of the workbench in the length direction of the workbench. A plurality of conveying roller shafts are rotationally connected between the two sides of the limiting groove in the length direction of the limiting groove; one end of the conveying roller shaft extends to one side of the workbench, and the end of the conveying roller shaft is fixedly connected with a rotating motor. A conveying gap is reserved between every two adjacent conveying roller shafts. A portal frame is further fixed to the workbench and transversely arranged on the workbench, cameras are arranged on the inner walls of the three sides of the interior of the portal frame respectively, the output ends of the cameras are connected to a deep learning controller, the output end of the deep learning controlleris connected to the driving assembly, and the other side of the workbench communicates with a plurality of discharging pipelines. The navel orange sorting device effectively sorts navel oranges.

title: Target spraying test bed based on machine vision and control method
applicants: NANJING INST AGRICULTURAL MECHANIZATION MINI AGRICULTURE & RURAL AFFAIRS
abstract: According to a target spraying test bed based on the machine vision and a control method, the depth camera machine vision based on deep learning is adopted for identifying and positioning target crops, and three-dimensional information of the target crops can be obtained at the same time, so that the spatial position of a spray head is accurately guided, and the spraying quality and effect can beeffectively improved. The parallel manipulator is adopted as a nozzle position moving device, so that the positioning precision is high, the operation speed is high, the stability is high, and the nozzle position can be accurately and quickly conveyed. An adjustable trolley wheel track and a track distance are adopted. Field environments under different planting modes can be simulated. Meanwhile,a sand table crop planting mode is adopted, layout of different target crops and non-target crops can be achieved, the number of simulative scenes is large, operation is easy, the field test difficulty is lowered, training and parameter adjustment can be conducted on the whole system through different scenes, and therefore the running speed and accuracy are improved.

title: Artificial-intelligence-technology-based multi-spray-path precise toward-target weeding module with controlled spray span
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial-intelligence-technology-based multi-spray-path precise toward-target weeding module with a controlled spray span, and relates to the field of agricultural machinery. The artificial-intelligence-technology-based multi-spray-path precise toward-target weeding module with the controlled spray span is specifically applied to intelligent field weeding of multiple kinds of crops of the field of agriculture. The module is used for multiple kinds of carrying platforms, and fast plug-in mounting can be achieved. The device is suitable for field weeding of the multiple kinds of field crops in different growth cycles. According to the device, a lightweight convolutional neural network is adopted for recognizing weed information, so that bases are provided for agent type selection, target spray parameters and flows, the pressure, automatic optimization of spray head angles and sedimentation region planning.
