A multi-channel target spray unit can spray differenttypes of weed killers onto different types of weeds, a synchronous belt sliding table drives spray heads to transversely move to conduct precise toward-target spray on the weeds, and a spray range can be adjusted according to the size of weed groups. By means of the toward-target spray system, the pesticide usage can be reduced, pollution to an ecological environment is abated, and the working efficiency is effectively improved.

title: Full-automatic hybrid power cotton picking machine
abstract: The utility model discloses a full-automatic hybrid power cotton picking machine, and belongs to the technical field of cotton picking machines. A cotton placing bin is arranged at the upper part of the rack; the solar cell panel is mounted at the upper part of the cotton placing bin; wherein a bin door is arranged at the rear part of the cotton putting bin, the picking type automatic mechanical arm is arranged at the front part of the rack, the rack at the front part of the cotton putting bin is provided with an internal combustion test engine, a stereoscopic vision positioning device and a micro-control panel with artificial intelligence, and the stereoscopic vision positioning device is arranged at the front part of the picking type automatic mechanical arm. According to the machine, anautomatic mechanical arm and a picking type automatic mechanical clamping finger are used for grabbing a formulated article, and a suction type pipe is used for placing the picked article into a formulated bin; by means of the mode, the collecting and recycling speed and accuracy of products in agriculture or other industries can be improved, the expenditure and time for manual picking and recycling can be reduced, the expenditure and time for secondary processing can be greatly reduced, a solar cell and an internal combustion engine are used as energy of the machine, energy can be saved, andair pollution can be properly reduced.

title: Winter wheat spike density detection method and device
applicants: INST OF ENVIRONMENT AND SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT IN AGRICULTURE CHINESE ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURAL SCIEN
abstract: The embodiment of the invention provides a winter wheat spike density detection method and device, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a to-be-detected canopy image after a flowering periodof winter wheat, and dividing the to-be-detected canopy image into a plurality of to-be-detected subgraphs; inputting the plurality of to-be-detected sub-graphs into a convolutional neural network model, and outputting a sub-density graph; determining the density of winter wheat ears according to the sub-density map; wherein the convolutional neural network model is obtained by training based on asample canopy image and a pre-determined spike density map corresponding to the sample canopy image. According to the winter wheat spike density detection method and device provided by the embodimentof the invention, the artificial intelligence technology is used for detection, the automation degree is high, the manual intervention of spike density estimation can be effectively reduced, the application cost and the complexity are reduced, and the accuracy and the real-time performance of winter wheat spike density estimation are effectively improved.

title: IoT Smart farm IoTInternet of Things system for rice cultivation management using Deep leaning
abstract: The present invention provides a smart farming IoT system for managing rice cultivation using deep learning, the smart farming IoT system including: an automatic water supply unit (100) and a discharge adjusting device part (200); a measurement device part (300) attached to the discharge adjusting device part (200) and including a water level sensor; a power supply part (500) that supplies electric power to the discharge adjusting device part; and a control part (600) connected to the measurement device part (300) to transmit, receive, and store data, and control driving of the water supply part (100) and the discharge adjusting device part (200), wherein an operation of the water supply part (100) or the discharge adjusting device part (200) may be automatically controlled according to data detected by the measurement device part (300), and wherein the smart farming IoT system further includes a wireless communication part (700) connected to the control part (600) to transmit data received from the control part (600) to an external terminal (900) of a manager connected wirelessly, receive data generated by the external terminal (900) to deliver the generated data to the control part (600) so as to adjust the opening degree of a water gate of the water supply part (100) or the discharge adjusting device part (200) connected to the control part (600), whereby the level of the freshwater can be adjusted. The opening degree of the water gate of the water supply part (100) and the discharge adjusting device part (200) can be remotely adjusted from a site that is remote from a rice field, and a water environment that is suitable for rice cultivation for growth timings can be automatically adjusted, whereby a rice farming environment can be created in an optimum condition.

title: Enhanced Management Zones for Precision Agriculture
abstract: The present invention is a system and method for agricultural management-zone delineation to be done over broad geographic extents without overly-localized field-specific data. The instant innovation guides precision agricultural sampling and management by delineating enhanced management zones based upon remote sensing and artificial intelligence and combining the two with data derived from an existing countrywide soil survey database. In an embodiment, the instant innovation uses artificial intelligence from multiple sources to provide granular zone detail. Output of the present innovation can be aggregated to produce management zone sizes that have a level of uncertainty compatible with the needs of the customer-farmer and implementable given the capabilities of available equipment.

title: Regional wave height forecasting method based on deep learning and terminal
abstract: The invention discloses a regional wave height forecasting method and terminal based on deep learning, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining data generated by a numerical mode in a preset timeperiod, wherein the data comprises regional wave height, air pressure, air temperature and a wind field component; dividing the data into training data and test data; training a neural network by utilizing the training data to obtain different neural network models, with the neural network comprising an input layer, a hidden layer and an output layer, and the hidden layer comprising an LSTM layerand a convolution layer; testing the different neural network models by using the test data, determining a neural network model with the best prediction effect, and forecasting the regional wave height in the to-be-predicted time according to the neural network model with the best prediction effect; by superposing the LSTM layer and the convolution layer together, the sequential relationship of the data can be obtained, and the spatial features can be extracted, so that the spatial and temporal features of the wave height data can be learned, and the regional wave height prediction precisioncan be improved.

title: Internet platform combining virtual farm and real life
abstract: The invention discloses an internet platform combining a virtual farm and real life. The internet platform comprises a virtual farm module, a real life merchant module and a diet manager module, and the virtual farm module comprises virtual currency, virtual props and virtual agricultural products corresponding to agricultural products in real life; the real life merchant module is in butt joint with a vegetable and fruit supermarket, a vegetable and fruit exclusive store and a farm in real life; the recommendation mode of the diet manager module comprises the following steps: 1) recommendingdishes according to the types of crops planted in a virtual farm; 2) performing recommendation by following friends; and 3) performing recommendation according to a healthy diet concept. Compared withthe prior art, the internet platform has the advantages that the use experience of a user can be improved, people can be conveniently guided to solve the diet problem every day, artificial intelligence, big data, healthy diet and other modes are introduced, and the internet platform truly belonging to agriculture and the internet and capable of improving the diet mode of people is built in an omnibearing mode.

title: Water and fertilizer integrated system based on artificial intelligence
applicants: SHANDONG MU RAINY DAY HE WISDOM AGRICULTURE CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to a water and fertilizer integrated system based on artificial intelligence, which belongs to the technical field of agricultural irrigation. The water and fertilizer integratedsystem comprises an information acquisition and processing system, a water and fertilizer mixed application system, an inspection robot, a cloud platform and a distributed monitoring center. The information acquisition and processing system acquires data such as soil moisture content, soil pH value, soil EC value, soil temperature value, air temperature and humidity, illumination intensity and trace elements, and transmits the data to the cloud platform through a network after fusion processing. The water and fertilizer mixed application system performs water and fertilizer mixed applicationaccording to the soil moisture content and crop growth cycle and growth condition. The inspection robot regularly inspects crops, monitors and locates diseases and insect pests on line, identifies disease and insect pest types and accurately sprays pesticides to targets. The cloud platform issues an instruction for fertilizing and irrigating crops to the water and fertilizer mixed application system or issues an instruction for treating crop diseases and insect pests to the inspection robot according to the information fed back by the information acquisition and processing system and the inspection robot.

title: Artificial intelligence monitoring camera convenient to adjust
abstract: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence monitoring camera convenient to adjust. The wall comprises a wall body and a fixing plate arranged on the surface of the wall body. A first mounting plate is arranged on the upper side of the fixed plate; a pre-positioning mechanism is arranged between the first mounting plate and the fixed plate; wherein the first mounting plate is fixedly connected with a fixing plate through a plurality of mounting bolts, a rotatable rotating base is arranged on the upper side of the first mounting plate, a vertical rod is fixedly connected to the upperside of the rotating base, a second mounting plate is fixedly connected to the upper end of the vertical rod, and a camera is fixedly connected to the lower side of the second mounting plate. The utility model has the advantages that the structure design is reasonable, the bolt can be screwed up without aligning the mounting hole, the time for aligning the mounting hole is reduced, the mounting speed is accelerated, and the direction of the camera can be adjusted, so that the monitoring range of the camera is enlarged, and the monitoring effect is improved.

title: Farming automation system using crop image big data
abstract: The present invention relates to a farming automation system using big data of crop images. The farming automation system using big data of crop images comprises: farming automation equipment including a growth sensing module to transmit temperature, humidity, sunshine, and weather sensor data, and a camera module to photograph and transmit an image of a crop; a smart farming automation server including a data collection module to continuously collect and store various sensor data and crop images outputted by the farming automation equipment, and an artificial intelligence module to compare data collected in the data collection module and an embedded crop growth database to form and store big data by an artificial intelligence method; and an integrated control module which is included in the smart farming automation server, drives the artificial intelligence module to output a growth management control signal when an image of a crop is collected by the data collection module, and produces comprehensive control information from collected sensor data to transmit the comprehensive control information to a worker computer or a smartphone. When an image of a crop is photographed and transmitted while driving the farming automation equipment, an algorithm of the artificial intelligence module is driven to optimize and derive temperature, humidity, carbon dioxide, ground temperature, soil water, sunshine, pest control, fertilizer application, crop water supply amount, oxygen supply amount, and sunshine for each crop growth stage to automatically manage a crop growth environment and update big data by a learning algorithm of the artificial intelligence module.

title: CONFIGURABLE CONTROLLED-ENVIRONMENT AGRICULTURE SYSTEM
abstract: An apparatus, system, and method for controlled-environment agriculture, including a closed-loop conveyor for transporting at least one container housing one or more plants to static or locally moveable service station(s) delivering at least one service in a sequential manner to plants on the conveyor and in parallel with other service stations for other services. A transition section conveys plants between an illuminated zone and a dark zone on FIFO basis. The conveyor cycle is computer programmable on a plant-by-plant basis for i) service station frequency and duration; and ii) illuminated zone/dark zone duty cycles for desired growth pattern and conveyor path routing based on sensor input to database. Different plant types at different growth stages are ‘interleaved’ on a same compact system (sensors, conveyor, and service stations) using artificial intelligence, deep learning, and computer vision for wide plant variety inventory management and programmed selective harvesting.

title: Agricultural image semantic segmentation method
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of agricultural image recognition and artificial intelligence, and provides an agricultural image semantic segmentation method, which comprises the steps of performing large picture segmentation on an original agricultural image; performing data enhancement on the image by using data enhancement methods such as image rotation and translation transformation; training the processed picture by adopting a u-net neural network model added with an attention mechanism to obtain a model; and predicting by using the model, and segmenting the crops. The technical problem that a traditional method for interpreting remote sensing image target information in a manual mode is difficult to adapt to collection of modern facility agriculture ground feature information is solved. The method is novel, reasonable and good in recognition effect, can be widely applied to the field of crop semantic segmentation, provides powerful theoretical and technical supportfor crop image segmentation, and has a wide application prospect.

title: Noise suppression method applied to compressed sensing spectral imaging system
abstract: The invention discloses a noise suppression method applied to a compressed sensing spectral imaging system, and belongs to the field of computational photography. According to the method, a hyperspectral reconstruction problem is converted into a plurality of sub-optimization problems. The method comprises: using a Lagrange multiplier method for solving a spectral data cube from a compressed observation image; estimating a noise mean value from the solved difference between the spectral data cube and the original compressed observation image; and correcting the compressed observation image byusing the estimated noise mean value; alternately iterating the three steps to judge whether to continue iteration or output a spectral reconstruction image, and when the noise mean value in the compressed observation image is accurately estimated and suppressed through iteration, outputting the noise mean value and the hyperspectral image updated at the last time, so that the noise suppression of the compressed sensing spectral imaging system is completed. The method has the advantages of high convergence rate and high reconstruction efficiency. The method can be applied to multiple fields of precision agriculture, biomedicine, artificial intelligence and the like.

title: Internet of Things intelligent agricultural irrigation device and method based on deep learning
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of agriculture, and particularly relates to an Internet of Things intelligent agricultural irrigation device and method based on deep learning. The devicecomprises a central processing device, a soil humidity sensor, a spray irrigation device, an image collection device, a meteorological collection sensor, a first data collection module, a second datacollection module, a third data collection module, an SVM classification module, a pre-processing module and a neural network module based on deep learning. Soil information, environment information and crop information are collected through an Internet of Things device, crops are recognized by adopting a deep learning method to judge crop category, growth stage, whether there is a sign of water deficiency or not and water deficiency degree, corresponding irrigation strategies are adopted according to moisture needs of each crop at different growth stages, and proper irrigation modes are selected for different crops, in this way, crop growth can be better promoted, and scientific irrigation is realized.

title: Rice ear recognition method, system and device based on deep learning and medium
abstract: The invention relates to a rice ear recognition method, system and device based on deep learning and a medium, and the method comprises the steps: obtaining a plurality of original rice sample imagesof a farmland, and constructing a rice image database according to all original rice sample images; processing all the original rice sample images to obtain a plurality of target rice sample images, storing the target rice sample images into a rice image database, and obtaining a target rice data set from the rice image database; based on a YOLOv3 deep learning method, training the target rice data set to obtain a neural network rice spike recognition model; and identifying to-be-detected rice ears in the farmland by using the neural network rice ear identification model to obtain an identification result. According to the method, interference factors of complex background environments of farmlands can be overcome, positioning and recognition of small targets such as rice ears are achieved, the positioning and recognition effects are greatly improved, the growth state of rice can be observed through the rice ears, the rice yield can be guaranteed, and development of smart agriculture is promoted.

title: Goat breeding feeding device with artificial intelligence function
applicants: LUOYANG ZHAOLONG AGRICULTURE AND ANIMAL HUSBANDRY TECH CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses a goat breeding feeding device with an artificial intelligence function. A discharging mechanism for discharging materials is arranged in the box body; and a controller electrically connected with the walking mechanism and the discharging mechanism is installed at the lower end of the box body, a discharging port corresponding to the discharging mechanism is formed in the left end of the box body, and an elastic tough conveying mechanism which discharges raw materials into the feeding groove and can be stressed to incline after colliding with the goats is connectedto the discharging port. The controller controls the walking mechanism and the discharging mechanism. The feeding groove is used for injecting materials from the guide rail to a set position; securinga launch position, when goats eat materials in the trough, the goats can make contact with the discharging pipe close to the upper side of the trough, the poking rods on the discharging pipe can makecontact with animals, the poked animals can rapidly escape, material injection is facilitated, the discharging pipe and the box body are connected through the rubber pipe and the spring, and therefore the feeding device has certain toughness, can achieve inclined buffering after being stressed, and cannot hinder walking of the walking mechanism.

title: Vegetable sorting system and control method thereof
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT AGRICULTURE
abstract: The invention relates to the technical field of vegetable sorting assembly lines, and discloses a vegetable sorting system and a control method thereof. The vegetable sorting system comprises a conveying mechanism used for placing vegetables, a controller, a vegetable recognition mechanism and a sorting mechanism, wherein the vegetable recognition mechanism and the sorting mechanism are sequentially arranged along the conveying direction of the conveying mechanism; the vegetable recognition mechanism comprises an image acquisition assembly and an image recognition processor which are connectedwith each other, a lens of the image acquisition assembly faces the conveying mechanism, and a neural network module is arranged in the image recognition processor so as to judge whether the vegetables in the image acquired by the image acquisition assembly are qualified or not; the sorting mechanism can be used for selectively moving the vegetables; and the sorting mechanism and the image recognition processor are both electrically connected to the controller. According to the vegetable sorting system, the machine vision and the mechanical sorting production line are combined, the adaptive range is wider, the flexibility is higher, and through deep learning training, automatic recognition, classification and screening of leaf vegetables can be realized.

title: Artificial intelligence monitoring terminal for urban greening construction
applicants: ZHEJIANG CHENGKONG ENV CONSTRUCTION CO LTD
abstract: The utility model relates to the technical field of organic agriculture. The utility model relates to a monitoring terminal, in particular to an artificial intelligence monitoring terminal for urban greening construction. The monitoring terminal comprises a monitoring terminal shell, a front side door, a rain shielding roof and a water baffle, a front side door is hinged to the front side face ofthe monitoring terminal shell. A grid plate is welded to the upper portion of a bottom plate of the monitoring terminal shell, a containing groove is formed between the lower surface of the grid plateand the upper surface of the bottom plate of the monitoring terminal shell, a moisture absorption pad is placed in the containing groove, a rain shielding roof is fixedly installed at the top of themonitoring terminal shell, and lengthening plates are arranged on the front side and the rear side of the rain shielding roof. The monitoring terminal has the beneficial effects that the extension plates are arranged on the front side and the rear side of the rain shielding roof, so that the rain shielding range can be expanded, and water is prevented from entering the monitoring terminal shell when it rains or water is sprinkled on roadsides; by arranging the water baffle, the heat dissipation holes in the surface of the shell can be shielded, and by arranging the supporting rods, the angle of the water baffle can be adjusted, and the water baffle can be fixed at a certain angle.

title: Banana disease online identification system based on artificial intelligence
abstract: The utility model relates to a banana disease on-line identification system based on artificial intelligence. The banana disease on-line identification system comprises a banana disease leaf data acquisition and disease information display terminal, a banana disease analysis server cluster, a banana disease sample library, a banana disease characteristic library and an expert auditing terminal. The banana disease leaf data acquisition and disease information display terminal acquires banana disease leaf image data; transmitting to a banana disease analysis server; the banana disease analysis server extracts banana disease features from a banana disease feature library for comparison; and according to the compared probability value, selecting to return to the banana disease leaf data acquisition and disease information display terminal or send to the expert auditing terminal, performing expert auditing judgment or directly giving up a result, and finally storing the obtained data into abanana disease feature library after being analyzed and processed by the banana disease sample library server. The system is good in load balance, high in reliability and availability and high in response speed.

title: Artificial intelligence liquid crystal display television fish tank
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence liquid crystal display television fish tank in the technical field of fish tanks. The fish tank comprises an artificial intelligence liquid crystal television, a display screen is embedded in the center of the front surface of the artificial intelligence liquid crystal television, a control box is in lap joint with the center of the top of the artificial intelligence liquid crystal television, a chip groove is formed in the bottom of the left side of the control box, a chip is inserted into an inner cavity of the chip groove, and a connectingport is formed in the top of the right side of the artificial intelligence liquid crystal television. According to the invention, programming design of the chip is realized by technicians according toprogramming; various fish living scenes are simulated; scenes in the chip are displayed on a display screen of the artificial intelligence liquid crystal display television through the control box, simulation experience of pleasure of fish farming is simulated, real fish farming in a fish tank is abandoned, pleasure of fish farming is experienced, water is saved, simulation fishes cannot die, emotion lowering caused by failure of fish farming is avoided, physical and psychological health is facilitated, and cost performance is high.

title: Deep learning-based intelligent prediction method for porcine neurological diseases
abstract: The invention discloses a deep learning-based intelligent prediction method for porcine neurological diseases. Firstly, video samples of normal walking and crippling of a pig are collected; extractinga series of single-frame images and a complete target contour; a triangular skeleton model is constructed by extracting key points of a pig body contour, gait angle information is extracted accordingto the model, synchronous optimization of feature selection and gait parameters is achieved, finally, the optimized gait information is divided into a training model and a test model through a test platform, and a final detection platform is obtained after cross validation. According to the present invention, with the non-contact detection and diagnosis method, the early pig ataxia, the gait swing, the tremor and other diseases of the pig neurological disease can be rapidly and accurately determined.

title: Isoxazoline derivative and applications in agriculture
applicants: DONGGUAN DONGYANGGUANG PESTICIDE RES AND DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract: The invention provides an isoxazoline derivative and applications in agriculture, specifically a compound represented by a formula (Ia) or a stereoisomer, a nitrogen oxide or a salt thereof, and a preparation method thereof, wherein R<1>, R<2>, R<3>, R<4>, n, R<5>, R<6>, X and Y are defined in the specification. Further the present invention provides compositions containing the compounds and applications in agriculture, particularly applications as herbicidal active ingredients in prevention and control of unwanted plants. .

title: OXAZOLINE DERIVATIVES AND USES IN AGRICULTURE THEREOF
applicants: DONGGUAN HEC PESTICIDES R&D CO LTD [CN]
abstract: Provided are isoxazoline derivatives having formula (Ia), or a stereoisomer, an N-oxide or a salt thereof, preparation methods thereof, compositions containing these compounds and uses in agriculture thereof, particularly uses as active ingredients of herbicide for controlling unwanted plants.

title: Fall detection and early warning method and system for old people in gerocomium
abstract: The invention discloses a fall detection and early warning method and a system for old people in a gerocomium. The method comprises the steps: obtaining human body contour image information of old people based on a fuzzy camera; performing human body fall detection on the human body contour image information based on a deep learning algorithm to obtain a fall detection result; acquiring physiological feature information of the old people based on a wearable device; and carrying out fusion analysis on the fall detection result of the old people and the corresponding physiological feature information, and carrying out early warning and medical personnel scheduling based on the current fusion analysis result of the old people. According to the embodiment of the invention, the grade early warning of the physical state and fall of the old people and scheduling of medical personnel are realized on the premise of protecting the privacy of the old people; medical personnel is reasonably arranged for timely treatment, medical resources are reasonably distributed while timely treatment is ensured, and the efficiency of the gerocomium is improved.

title: Formula checking calculation board for artificial intelligence algorithm
abstract: The utility model discloses a formula checking calculation board for an artificial intelligence algorithm. The utility model relates to the technical field of artificial intelligence auxiliary equipment. The utility model particularly relates to a formula checking calculation board for an artificial intelligence algorithm. Including a support base, a supporting column is fixedly connected to the middle of the upper surface of the supporting base. The end, away from the supporting base, of the supporting column is in threaded connection with a writing checking calculation plate. A push-pull plate is fixedly connected to one side of the writing checking calculation plate, a through groove is formed in the surface of the push-pull plate, a supporting plate is fixedly connected to the other side of the writing checking calculation plate, a containing box is fixedly connected to the front face of the supporting plate, and a handle is fixedly connected to one side of the front face of the containing box. According to the formula checking calculation plate for the artificial intelligence algorithm, through the arrangement of the movable plate, the bottom rod and the movable rod, when thewriting checking calculation plate needs to be placed on a table top, the movable plate is pulled open, then the movable rod on the bottom rod is put down and fixed through the fastening screw, and then the effect of diversified using methods is achieved.

title: Intelligent agriculture doctor management system and method
abstract: The invention discloses an intelligent agriculture doctor management system and method. Crop diseases and insect pests are accurately identified by utilizing big data and a residual neural network algorithm in the field of artificial intelligence; an information system platform integrating crop disease and insect pest identification, diagnosis, product supply, expert questioning and answering andagricultural socializing is constructed through a database technology, a wireless communication internet technology, a TFT capacitive touch screen liquid crystal, an embedded image sensing and collecting technology and an API interface technology. High-accuracy machine vision crop disease and insect pest diagnosis and expert inquiry, pesticide supply and information interaction one-stop service are realized.

title: Crop planting management system and method based on cloud services
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT AGRICULTURE
abstract: Embodiments of the invention provide a crop planting management system and method based on cloud services. The system comprises an information acquisition subsystem used for acquiring growth process data of target crops and environment data of a target crop planting area in real time, a data analysis service subsystem used for storing and processing the data acquired by the information acquisitionsubsystem and building a planting management decision model of the target crops based on deep learning, a visual subsystem used for performing growth period recognition, disease and pest recognition,growth vigor recognition, intrusion recognition and yield prediction on the target crops, a management service decision subsystem used for realizing seeding control, fertilization control, irrigationcontrol, environment control, production archive management, disease and pest control, intelligent equipment patrol and early warning, and a display pushing subsystem used for sending a decision result to an intelligent equipment terminal and a user terminal for displaying. The crop planting management system and method based on cloud services can be used for realizing intelligent, scientific andunmanned agricultural planting management.

title: Coffee fruit maturity identification method based on deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a coffee fruit maturity identification method based on deep learning, and belongs to the field of intelligent agriculture, and the method comprises the steps: collecting original coffee fruit images with different maturity degrees, cutting the images into a uniform size, and processing the image into a form required by neural network model input; sending the training sampledata into a convolutional neural network model composed of a continuous convolutional layer and a sparse activation Maxout function layer to extract coffee fruit image features; and training a coffeefruit maturity classifier according to the extracted features to obtain a final recognition model. According to the invention, whether coffee fruits are ripe or not can be automatically identified without manual participation, so that the identification accuracy and efficiency are improved, and the labor cost can be reduced.

title: Sower for intelligent agriculture
applicants: XIAMEN TAISHANG ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses a sower for an intelligent agriculture. The sower comprises a rack, wheels are arranged on the left and right sides of the rack, and a control platform is arranged above the rack; seats are arranged on the control platform, and a backboard is arranged on one sides of the seats; a main control device is arranged on the control platform of the sower, a supporting frame of a furrowing blade is provided with a furrowing control device, and a sowing pipe is provided with a sowing control device; the main control device, the furrowing control device and the sowing control device are in wireless communication connection, wherein the main control device is further provided with a voice input module, a voice identifying module, a voice processing module, control keys and a controller, controllers and voice executing modules are further arranged in the furrowing control device and the sowing control device, multiple structures cooperate with one another for the operation, the function of controlling the furrowing speed and sowing speed of the sower through voices can be achieved, the intelligent degree is high, and a good sowing effect is achieved.

title: High-resolution remote sensing image northwest region agricultural film extraction method based on deep learning
applicants: RURAL ENERGY AND ENVIRONMENT AGENCY MINI OF AGRICULTURE AND RURAL AFFAIRS
BEIJING SATLMAGE INFORMATION TECH CO LTD
CHINESE SOC OF AGRO ECOLOGICAL ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION
abstract: The invention provides a high-resolution remote sensing image northwest region agricultural film extraction method based on deep learning. According to the northwest region mulching film information extraction method based on the high-resolution remote sensing image, the farmland mulching film information in the high-resolution image is extracted by using the SSD deep learning model, so that the farmland mulching film extraction precision can be improved; a radiation characteristic loss function and a geometric characteristic loss function construction method are constructed, a traditional SSDdeep learning model is combined, the farmland mulching film extraction precision is greatly improved, the automation degree is high, user intervention is not needed, and the extraction efficiency ishigh; secondly, based on a deep learning target detection model, a radiation and geometric feature loss function is constructed, and the farmland mulching film extraction precision is high.

title: Automatic medlar planting field insect pest monitoring and early warning station
applicants: NINGXIA ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY SCIENCES AGRICULTURE ECONOMY AND INFORMATION TECH INSTIT
abstract: The automatic monitoring and early warning station comprises a frame body, an insect sticking device, an infrared camera shooting device, an image recognition processor, an insect pest counting device, a controller and power supply equipment, the insect sticking device, the infrared camera shooting device, the image recognition processor and the insect pest counting device are assembled with the controller; the controller controls automatic replacement of insect sticking paper of the insect sticking device, the infrared camera shooting device shoots images of the insect sticking paper of the insect sticking device in real time, the image recognition processor recognizes and processes the images, and deep learning image processing software in the controller recognizes the types of diseasesand insect pests in the images. The insect pest counting device counts the number of insect pests in a preset time period in real time, and the controller compares and analyzes the number of insect pests. According to the utility model, intelligent real-time monitoring of plant diseases and insect pests in the medlar planting land can be realized, manual monitoring is replaced, and the accuracy ofinsect pest statistics is improved.

title: CHEMICAL INFORMATION IDENTIFICATION METHOD BASED ON DEEP LEARNING IMAGE IDENTIFICATION TECHNOLOGY
applicants: QINGDAO KINGAGROOT PRECISION AGRICULTURE TECH CO LTD [CN]
abstract: A chemical information identification method based on deep learning image identification technology, the method comprising the following steps: (1) using a node target identifier to implement identification of an inputted image; (2) using a handwritten font target identifier to implement identification of the text content for the nodes identified in step (1) and thereby determine specific atoms corresponding to the nodes; (3) combining the identified plurality of atoms in pairs, and then using a chemical bond target identifier to implement identification of the chemical bonds between two atoms; (4) finding the attributes of the identified atoms in a database, calculating the relevant attributes of the structural formula, and outputting same; or storing the identified atoms and chemical bonds between the atoms as a custom king format file or drawing into a new image, and outputting same. The present method can solve the problem of identifying chemical structural or reaction formulae in hand drawings and pictures, and can be widely used in the daily work of chemists.

title: Yield evaluation method for fruit tree crops
applicants: INST OF ENVIRONMENT AND SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT IN AGRICULTURE CHINESE ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURAL SCIEN
abstract: The embodiment of the invention discloses a yield evaluation method for fruit tree crops. The evaluation method comprises the following steps: establishoffing a fruit size identification system, inputting a large number of shot fruit photos; using a deep learning algorithm, fruit photos and photo pixels to carry out training learning, matching corresponding pixels according to fruits of differentsizes, achieving intelligent judgment of the fruit sizes, and using a machine vision processing platform to recognize the collected actual fruit photos, judging the fruit sizes and analyzing the fruittree crop yield conditions. The method solves the problems that existing fruit tree yield assessment is low in efficiency and high in cost.

title: Temperature control planting greenhouse based on artificial intelligence
abstract: The utility model discloses a temperature control planting greenhouse based on artificial intelligence. The temperature control planting greenhouse comprises a greenhouse body, a detection system, a control system, a carbon dioxide generator and a temperature control system. The greenhouse comprises a greenhouse frame and a greenhouse film used for covering the greenhouse frame, a greenhouse cavity is defined by the greenhouse frame and the greenhouse film, and a spraying mechanism is arranged at the top of the greenhouse cavity. The detection system is arranged in the greenhouse cavity and comprises a temperature sensor, a carbon dioxide concentration sensor and a humidity sensor, and the temperature sensor, the carbon dioxide concentration sensor and the humidity sensor are all electrically connected with the control system; and a gas outlet of the carbon dioxide generator is communicated with the greenhouse cavity through a through pipe. By combining artificial intelligence with modern agriculture, real-time detection and real-time adjustment of environmental factors in the greenhouse are realized, so that a good growth environment is maintained in the greenhouse, and intelligent control and management of the greenhouse are realized. The utility model is applied to crop planting equipment.

title: Unmanned aerial vehicle on-board real-time image processing method and system for crops
abstract: The invention discloses an unmanned aerial vehicle on-board real-time image processing method and system for crops, and relates to the technical field of image processing and recognition. The method comprises the steps of carrying out the image collection on the crops in a target area through an unmanned aerial vehicle image collection module; carrying out real-time processing on the acquired image through an image processing method to obtain the image data; uploading the image data to a server through a data uploading module, and performing interpolation in a map grid according to the coordinates and the crop growth data to form a crop growth condition distribution map of the target area; and selecting any image, inputting the selected image into a deep learning model, outputting a semantic segmentation map of the same size, wherein the values of different pixels in the semantic segmentation map represent the semantic categories to which the objects at the positions belong and predicted by the deep learning model; and respectively calculating the values of the pixels to obtain the crop growth data. The method and the system facilitate the precise agriculture, enable the plant protection cost to be reduced and the plant protection quality to be improved, and meanwhile save the manpower and financial resources.

title: Soil moisture content prediction and irrigation decision-making method and device
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INFORMATION TECH AGRICULTURE
abstract: The embodiment of the invention provides a soil moisture content prediction and irrigation decision-making method and device. The method comprises: acquiring surface soil moisture content data and meteorological data of a planting area, and characteristics of the planting area are acquired according to the surface soil moisture content data and the meteorological data; inputting the characteristics of the planting area into a preset deep learning network, and obtaining crop root area soil moisture content prediction data of the planting area according to an output result of the preset deep learning network. The embodiment of the invention provides a soil moisture content prediction and irrigation decision-making method and device. According to the method, multi-source heterogeneous monitoring information is subjected to data fusion, the crop root area soil moisture content is predicted through the preset deep learning network according to the surface layer soil moisture content characteristics and the meteorological characteristics of the planting area, the sensor burial depth can be reduced, the operation steps are simplified, the cost is reduced, and the prediction precision andthe decision precision can be improved.

title: crop disease and pest intelligent detection method based on deep learning
abstract: The invention discloses a crop disease and pest intelligent detection method based on deep learning, belongs to the technical field of computer vision and artificial intelligence, and solves the problems that the manual disease and pest detection efficiency is low and crop disease and pest false detection is easily caused. The deep learning method is used for pest and disease damage detection. Thefield is limited by severe conditions of energy acquisition. The crop disease and pest detection system replaces manual detection of crop diseases and pests, effectively reduces the error rate of manual detection, improves the accuracy and detection speed of crop disease and pest detection, can be used for improving the working efficiency of managers and saving manpower and material resources ofproducers, provides scientific basis for management decision of agriculture and forestry, and has a wide market prospect.

title: Single-plant rice detection positioning method, system and equipment based on deep learning and medium
abstract: The invention discloses a single-plant rice detection positioning method, system and equipment based on deep learning and a medium. The method comprises the following steps of acquiring field rice sample image data; preprocessing and labeling the field rice sample image data to obtain preprocessed image data; establishing a deep convolutional neural network detection model; carrying out optimization training on the deep convolutional neural network detection model by using the preprocessed image data; using the trained deep convolutional neural network detection model to detect and position the single rice in the to-be-detected image of the rice in the field. According to the invention, by adopting a detection method based on deep learning in computer vision, the defects in the prior art can be greatly improved, and the high-dimensional spatial semantic characteristics of the plants are extracted by designing the deep convolutional neural network model, so that the method still has thegood positioning precision and robustness in a complex environment and can be widely applied to automatic and intelligent production management of agriculture.

title: Greenhouse crop situation awareness production management method and device
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INFORMATION TECH AGRICULTURE
abstract: The embodiment of the invention provides a greenhouse crop situation awareness production management method and device, and belongs to the technical field of crop planting management. The method comprises the following steps: acquiring monitoring parameters of greenhouse crops, and preprocessing the monitoring parameters; performing situation awareness of the preprocessed monitoring parameters based on a deep learning model to obtain decision information, and performing production management based on the decision information. According to the method provided by the embodiment of the invention,the monitoring parameters of the greenhouse crops are obtained, and the monitoring parameters are preprocessed. Based on the deep learning model, the situation awareness of the preprocessed monitoring parameters is performed to obtain decision information, and the production management based on the decision information is achieved. Due to the fact that multiple growth, physiological indexes and environmental parameters of crops can be sensed and corresponding decisions can be made, a traditional greenhouse crop management mode can be changed to achieve intelligent greenhouse crop production,monitoring and regulation and control, and then the greenhouse monitoring data utilization rate is increased.

title: UNIVERSAL AND PERSONALIZED DISTRIBUTED DECISION SUPPORT SYSTEM
applicants: RT RK ISTRAZIVACKO RAZVOJNI INST RT RK DOO ZA SISTEME ZASNOVANE NA RACUNARIMA NOVI SAD [RS]
abstract: A universal and personalized, distributed decision support system (100) comprising of: a script machine (101) that processes data of users' objects of the application servers (105) users by calling the library (108) of functions, a predictive model (102) which determines the shape and function coefficients adapted to the users of the application servers (105) and their objects, and personalized models (103) that communicate with the aforementioned system (100) through the middle layer software support (104) have, for the novelty, a feature of universality which is realized by the implementation of plug-in (109) for the various deployment of the system (100) through which the system 100 communicates with function libraries (108). Plug-in (109) is used to customize data and functions when calling the function library (108). Second feature of the system (100) is that it is personalized, which is reflected in the fact that the personalized models (103) contained in the system 100 are assigned to users and their objects, wherein personalized models (103) are formed by integrating said predictive model (102) with measurements acquired from objects of end users of application servers (105) and coefficients of the predictive models (102). The coefficients are adapted to the specified objects of the current users of the application servers (105). The user can be a human, an animal, a plant, a system, a device, an artificial intelligence, etc. while object can be a field, a vehicle, a human, etc., while variables are for example, humidity, pressure, temperature, result of the survey, etc. Different applications of the system (100) can be health, meteorology, agriculture, industry, etc. Application servers (105) reflect different deployments of the system (100).

title: The Krishi project
abstract: Wearing augmented reality headgear with holographic projection capability as user will see a hologram box which accesses the invention known as project Krishi. From this box a user has access to any feature relating to complete global agriculture world covering soil assets following which, data pertaining to it will be displayed in holographic form enabled for user interaction. The system may link to the internet or mobile communication networks and includes language translation by means of artificial intelligence. The invention provides a descriptive, predictive, prescriptive and cognitive (fully autonomous) analytic and operative capabilities for complete global agriculture world covering soil at any place by an authorized user, displaying live hologram projections digital assets of all on field physical assets including humans using augmented/mixed-reality for creating live digital twins of all available physical assets including humans in real world complete with monitoring, visualization, communication, operations and execution capabilities

title: Wheat ear counting method and device
applicants: INST OF ENVIRONMENT AND SUSTAINABLE DEVELOPMENT IN AGRICULTURE CHINESE ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURAL SCIEN
abstract: The embodiment of the invention provides a wheat ear counting method and device, and belongs to the technical field of deep learning. The method comprises the steps that an image shot in a wheat fieldenvironment is input into an image recognition model, a label of the image is output, and the image recognition model is obtained through training based on a sample label image and a label corresponding to the sample label image; and if the tag is a wheat ear image, determining the number of wheat ears in the image based on a non-maximum inhibition algorithm. The wheat ear quantity can be automatically calculated; Therefore, the automation degree is high, the recognition efficiency is high, the subjective influence caused by manual intervention can be effectively reduced, the application costand the complexity of the detection process are reduced, the accuracy and the real-time performance of wheat ear detection can be effectively improved, and a reliable and accurate data basis is provided for relevant research of wheat yield prediction.

title: A crop real-time water consumption monitoring method and device based on machine vision
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INTELLIGENT EQUIPMENT AGRICULTURE
abstract: The embodiment of the invention provides a crop real-time water consumption monitoring method and device based on machine vision. The coverage is obtained in a lossless image mode, the relation between the real-time crop coefficient and the coverage is obtained by means of professional lysimeter equipment, the method can be expanded to other planting fields to measure the real-time water storage capacity and crop coefficient of crops, and supports are provided for scientific research and production. Image recognition and artificial intelligence technologies such as an information image preprocessing technology, a segmentation technology, an image feature extraction and selection algorithm and the like are applied to monitor and obtain crop growth and physiological state information such ascrop leaf area, coverage degree and canopy temperature which are closely related to yield and quality, so that the water utilization efficiency is improved.

title: METHOD FOR PRODUCING RED SWAMP CRAYFISH HAVING FLUORESCENT-LIKE COLOR AND FEED FOR PRODUCING CRAYFISH HAVING FLUORESCENT-LIKE COLOR
abstract: To produce red swamp crayfish having a fluorescent-like color which are not present in nature, and to provide a technique for maintaining the body color over a long term.SOLUTION: Provided ia a method for producing red swamp crayfish having a fluorescent-like color comprises: s step of preparing, as feed for crayfish, carotenoid-containing feed containing a carotenoid pigment (an annatto pigment or a paprika pigment); and a step of feeding the carotenoid-containing feed to red swamp crayfish of white color and changing the body color of the red swamp crayfish into the fluorescent-like color. Also provided is feed for producing the crayfish having the fluorescent-like color, the feed containing the carotenoid pigment (an annatto pigment or a paprika pigment).SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

title: dead tree positioning method and system
applicants: BEIJING RES CT INFORMATION TECH AGRICULTURE
abstract: The embodiment of the invention provides a dead tree positioning method and system. The method comprises the steps of acquiring a remote sensing image of a to-be-positioned are; Inputting the remote sensing image into a dead tree positioning model; outputting a positioning result corresponding to the remote sensing image, the positioning result comprising a dead tree candidate box of the remote sensing image of the region to be positioned and a positioning probability corresponding to each candidate box with the candidate boxes being used for indicating position information of the dead tree, and the positioning probability being used for indicating a probability that the dead tree exists in the candidate boxes; Wherein the dead tree positioning model is obtained based on the sample remotesensing image and the corresponding sample mark through deep learning training. According to the embodiment of the invention, the remote sensing image is input into the dead tree positioning model; and a positioning result corresponding to the remote sensing image is outout, so that the dead tree in the to-be-positioned area can be automatically positioned based on deep learning and the remote sensing image, and compared with manual positioning of the dead tree in the prior art, the positioning efficiency can be effectively improved, and data support is provided for cutting of the phytophthora.

title: Deep learning-based Candidatus Liberibacter spp detection method, device and system
abstract: The invention relates to a deep learning-based Candidatus Liberibacter spp detection method, device and system. The method comprises the steps: acquiring image data of citrus leaves to be identified;Inputting the image data into a neural network model of Candidatus Liberibacter spp detection of a mobile terminal; And determining a detection result corresponding to the image data. The detection method is simple and convenient to operate, lossless, low in cost and popular with citrus producers; Moreover, the diagnosis process is simplified, the diagnosis cost is reduced, fruit farmers can be helped to detect and discover diseases as soon as possible, rapid, real-time, accurate and non-destructive diagnosis on citrus fruit trees in orchards is realized, reference can be provided for fertilization and production of the fruit farmers, great help is provided for the fruit tree yield, and a positive role is played in promoting accurate agriculture and agricultural informatization.

title: Farming evil control preventing -and -curing apparatus based on artificial intelligence analysis
applicants: BEIJING AEROSPACE ZHIXIN TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses a farming evil control preventing -and -curing apparatus based on artificial intelligence analysis, comprises a box bod, the side surface of box body is provided with control switch, the embedding of the upper surface of box body is provided with slewing mechanism, and the upper surface of box body corresponds slewing mechanism top rigid coupling and have a camera, theinternally mounted of box body has the battery, dash board is installed to the top of box body, the utility model discloses in setting through slewing mechanism for the camera rotates the shooting, has guaranteed the all -round control in farmland, through the setting of disc and inserted bar, can fix the device in the farmland fast, made things convenient for the user, improved its stability, through adjustment mechanism's setting, user's highly adjusting the device has been made things convenient for to being adapted to different areas, can also killing the pest in the different altitude ranges, the device can carry out the remote monitoring to the farmland, and the people of being convenient for in time know the extent of injury of insect pest.

title: Automatic feeding machine of farming -grazing industry for artificial intelligence
applicants: JIANGSU CHENYI MACHINERY TECH CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses an automatic feeding machine of farming -grazing industry for artificial intelligence, including the feeding machine body, the feeding machine body includes the straining beam, straining beam both ends below all is connected with the support column, support column and straining beam fixed connection, the straining beam below is connected with two pairs of pull rods, theguide rail is connected to the pull rod lower extreme, pull rod and straining beam and the equal fixed connection of guide rail, be equipped with the gyro wheel in the guide rail, the gyro wheel rolls and places in the guide rail, gyro wheel one side is connected with double -head motor, the double -head motor below is connected with the connecting rod, double -head motor and connecting rod fixedconnection, connecting rod below fixed connection storage tank, the storage tank bottom is connected with the solenoid valve, the solenoid valve can be dismantled with storage tank and be connected,be equipped with the feeding trough under the storage tank, the utility model discloses the beneficial effect who reaches is: because feeding machine is controlled by the controller, it wastes time and energy to have avoided manual feeding to bring, has saved a large amount of costs of labor, and the amount of feed that this equipment can detect according to the check weighing ware in the feedingtrough determines whether the material is thrown to needs.

title: Weeding robot special for farmland and control method thereof
abstract: The invention discloses a weeding robot special for farmland, and belongs to the technical field of agricultural machines. The weeding robot comprises a moving trolley body, driving wheels, a weedingmechanism and a mechanical gripper, wherein the multiple driving wheels are installed on the moving trolley body, and are driven by driving-wheel driving devices installed in the moving trolley body to run, an adjustable weeding mechanical arm mechanism is installed on the moving trolley body, the weeding mechanism and the mechanical gripper are installed on the adjustable weeding mechanical arm mechanism, and an industrial control computer for controlling the adjustable weeding mechanical arm mechanism, the driving-wheel driving devices, the weeding mechanism and the mechanical gripper and apower module are arranged in the moving trolley body. Compared with the prior art, the weeding robot special for the farmland has the advantages that through deep cross-border integration of the modern information technology and the agriculture, and by introducing a deep learning model, an intelligent weeding robot in the traditional sense is transited to an intelligent agricultural weeding robot,and the working efficiency and the working quality of the weeding robot are improved.

title: Multi -functional intelligent sampling device
applicants: AGRO ENVIRONMENTAL PROT INST MINISTRY AGRICULTURE
abstract: The utility model relates to a multi -functional intelligent sampling device, including crawler -type dolly, casing, fertilization box body and sampling device, crawler -type dolly both sides are interval parallel arrangement's walking track, the automobile body outside installation casing at two tracks middle part, with the walking module establishment of institution of crawler -type dolly in thecasing. The utility model provides a multi -functional intelligent sampling device adopts the robotic arm sampling probe sample, and artificial intelligence control can circulate and detect many times, and it can the automatic cycle to set for the operation moreover, and the reduction personnel are extravagant.

title: Artificial Intelligence System for In-Vivo, Real-Time Agriculture Optimization Driven by Low-Cost, Persistent Measurement of Plant-Light Interactions
abstract: Herein is described an electronic sensor and Artificial Intelligence (AI) system capable of optimizing agriculture processes in real-time. A number of wired or wireless optical, electrical, thermal, chemical, biological, or other sensors are deployed in a plant's locality, possibly for its full lifecycle. These sensors provide long-term, in vivo observations of both the plant's environment and the plant itself. A plant's interaction with light is measured by persistent, cloud-connected sensors, including a spectral reflectance sensor, Chlorophyll Fluorescence detector (ChFl), ChFl imager, and a near-IR imager. This sensor data enables the in-vivo characterization of a plant's health status and photosynthetic efficiency. A cloud-powered AI system uses machine learning algorithms to model the system, recommend agricultural process improvements, and identify abnormalities associated with plant disease or pests. As the invention gets enough sensor data across various environmental conditions, an ideal target process flow can be identified for a given plant genotype, phenotype, or other additional specificity.

title: Automatic monitoring and early warning station for field pests in planting of fructus lycii
applicants: AGRICULTURE ECONOMIC AND INFORMATION TECH INSTITUTE NINGXIA ACADEMY OF AGRICULTURE AND FORESTRY SCIE
abstract: The invention provides an automatic monitoring and early warning station for field pests in planting of fructus lycii. The automatic monitoring and early warning station comprises a frame body, a peststicking device, an infrared photo taking device, an image identification processor, a pest counting device, a controller and power supply equipment, wherein the pest sticking device, the infrared photo taking device, the image identification processor and the pest counting device are assembled with the controller; the controller is used for controlling automatic replacement of pest sticking paper of the pest sticking device; the infrared photo taking device is used for taking an image of the pest sticking paper of the pest sticking device in real time; the image identification processor is used for identifying the image; a deep learning image processing software in the controlled is adopted for identifying the spices of diseases and pests in the image; the pest counting device is used for counting the number of the pests in a preset time period in real time; the controller is used for comparing and analyzing the number of the pests. With adoption of the automatic monitoring and earlywarning station, the diseases and the pests of a fructus lycii planting field can be intelligently monitored in real time, artificial monitoring is replaced, and the statistical accuracy of the pestsis improved.

title: Based on artificial intelligence feed delivery device for cow and sheep farming
applicants: NANJING QINGTU INF TECH CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses a based on artificial intelligence feed delivery device for cow and sheep farming, including the bottom plate, the equal fixedly connected with electric telescopic handle in both sides at bottom plate top, electric telescopic handle's top fixedly connected with backup pad, two fixedly connected with feed tank between the backup pad, the equal fixedly connected with support frame in both sides at feed tank top, fixedly connected with motor between two support frames, the output shaft of motor pass through shaft coupling fixedly connected with dwang, the utility modelrelates to a poultry cultivation techniques field. Whether this based on artificial intelligence feed delivery device for cow and sheep farming under the circumstances that does not have the manual work to keep an eye on, can automatic measuring connect the fodder in the material sufficient, can be automatic to adding the fodder in the fodder basket when insufficient when detecting the fodder, guarantee the normal clear of the work of breeding, saved a large amount of manpowers, have fine buffering damping effect, fine protection the inner structure of device, lengthened the life who installs.

title: Artificial intelligence device that agriculture and forestry plant diseases and insect pests can be monitored
applicants: NANJING QINGTU INF TECH CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses an artificial intelligence device that agriculture and forestry plant diseases and insect pests can be monitored, including trunk and first fixed cover, one side fixedly connected with fixed plate of first fixed cover, the equal fixedly connected with bracing piece in top and bottom of fixed plate one side rotates through the connecting axle between two one sides that the bracing piece is relative and is connected with square frame, and square frame's internal surface fixedly connected with rotating device, and rotating device is provided with two, passes through ring channel intermeshing between two one sides that rotating device is relative, rotating device's opposite side fixedly connected with detecting head, the utility model relates to an agriculture and forestry technology field. The artificial intelligence device that agriculture and forestry plant diseases and insect pests can be monitored utilizes two rotating device one side ring channel intermeshing's relation can drive detecting head rotatory certain angle simultaneously, and the cooperation between recycling motor, a gear and the 2nd gear provides power can for rotating device's rotation, and then can the auto circumstances of monitoring the sick worm of agriculture and forestry.

title: A method and system for intelligent monitoring of bee breeding
applicants: BEIJING AOJINDA AGRICULTURE TECH DEVELOPMENT CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to a bee breeding intelligent monitoring method and system. The intelligent monitoring method for bee breeding comprises the following steps: real-time collecting the hive environment of each hive of the target bee farm, the honey yield, the bee colony image in the hive and the bee colony sound intensity parameter; data mining being carried out on the historical data respectively, setting the threshold of environmental parameters of the beehive, the alarm threshold of no honey fetching time and the alarm threshold of bee activity, judging the environmental parameters of the beehive collected in real time, calculating the time of no honey fetching and whether the calculated bee activity is within the preset alarm threshold; if not, a manual intervention prompt messagebeing sent to the terminal. The method and the system of the invention realize the intelligent monitoring of the environment in the beehive and the activity of the bee swarm through the technology ofthe multi-source sensor, the wireless ad hoc network, the artificial intelligence and the like, monitor the horizontal comparison among different beehives, timely discover the abnormal state in the bee breeding process, prompt the artificial intervention, and improve the bee breeding production efficiency and scientificity.

title: Quantification of crop growth phenotypic parameters and yield correlation analysis based on vision
abstract: The invention belongs to the technical field of agriculture, and discloses a method for quantifying crop growth potential phenotypic parameters and analyzing yield correlation based on vision, which provides more ideas for agricultural analysis through continuous breakthroughs in image processing, wireless sensors, artificial intelligence and other technologies, and makes traditional manual agriculture and mechanized agriculture develop towards modern intelligence and refinement agriculture. As one of that important analytical subject in the agricultural field, the intelligent and refined agriculture has important significance in the field of plant virtual, yield prediction, garden design and the like. It is of great significance to analyze the characterization parameters and morphologicalcharacteristics in the process of crop growth. On the one hand, the method can predict the relevant parameters of crops, which can guide the allocation of breeding environment; virtual plant growth technology can simulate the plant growth state at any time, so as to reduce the analysis time and reduce the analysis cost.

title: Artificial-intelligence teacup system and control method thereof
applicants: JIANGHUA YAO AUTONOMOUS COUNTY FENGHE DALONGSHAN MODERN AGRICULTURE DEV CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial-intelligence teacup system and a control method thereof, The system includes an artificial-intelligence teacup, a mobile control terminal and a cloud service platform. The artificial-intelligence teacup is composed of a cup cover and a cup body. The cup body is internally provided with a cavity, an inner container is arranged in the cavity, the inside wall ofthe inner container is provided with a detection device, the lower portion of the inner container is provided with a heating device, the bottom of the cavity is provided with a power supply device anda control device, the surface of the cup body is provided with an interactive device, the control device is electrically connected with the power supply device, the heating device, the detection device and the interactive device respectively, the artificial-intelligence teacup is in communication connection with the mobile control terminal, and the mobile control terminal is in communication connection with the cloud service platform. The artificial-intelligence teacup system has many functional modes, can meet the various needs of users, can be continuously upgraded in subsequent use, and thus can meet more usage requirements of users.

title: ПЕСТИЦИДНО АКТИВНЫЕ ПОЛИЦИКЛИЧЕСКИЕ ПРОИЗВОДНЫЕ С СЕРОСОДЕРЖАЩИМИ ЗАМЕСТИТЕЛЯМИ
Farming environment artificial intelligence adjusting device
applicants: WENZHOU KAITANG ELECTRONIC SCIENCE & TECH CO LTD
abstract: The utility model discloses a farming environment artificial intelligence adjusting device, the monitoring ejector pin through bolted connection is installed at the top of this kind of planting canopymain part, monitor the wind speed measuring stick through the hub connection of installing of ejector pin, the mid -mounting of monitoring ejector pin has the detecting light intensity board throughnested contact, it can adjust the internal environment to plant the canopy main part, it intensifies to the internal environment to detect the not in good time steerable heater of temperature when thethermometer, the light makes things convenient for looks over the inside condition night, it can water the inside water of cistern through the spray thrower through the leading water pipe through thecontroller control pump when lower and reduce inside temperature simultaneously to detect humidity when the moisture detector to the crop, it can go on the air of inside in time changing so that thegrowth of crops to trade the fan, this kind of planting canopy need not to expend the manpower, can carry out timely regulation and control to the internal environment, for producing, people provide very big convenience.

title: Artificial intelligence agriculture activity recording system
Internet of things-based artificial intelligence tobacco baking system and method thereof
applicants: YUNNAN JIAYE MODERN AGRICULTURE DEV CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to an Internet of things-based artificial intelligence tobacco baking system and a method thereof. The system comprises a tobacco baking unit, a server and a data processing unit, wherein the tobacco baking unit is used for baking tobacco leaves, acquiring a baking temperature parameter and sending the parameter in a form of an information message; the server is used for receiving the information message and performing data persistence, redundant processing, load expansion, parameter storage, firmware and software upgrading management and real-time monitoring of a bakingprocess; and the data processing unit is used for helping the server to process the information message. According to the Internet of things-based artificial intelligence tobacco baking system, by thearrangement of the tobacco baking unit with a baking controller, the Internet of things-based server and the data processing unit and by further arrangement of a mobile terminal, the server is used for performing remote controlling and monitoring, upgrading of software and firmware and fault tolerance processing on the tobacco baking unit to realize high extensibility; the tobacco baking is remotely controlled, so that high security, high fault tolerance and instantaneity are realized; and random errors in an actual use situation can be remotely processed.

title: Online learning-based tobacco classification method and system
applicants: YUNNAN JIAYE MODERN AGRICULTURE DEV CO LTD
abstract: The invention relates to an online learning-based tobacco classification method and system. The method comprises the steps that a tobacco image is obtained; the tobacco image is processed, and tobaccoimage data is obtained; the processed tobacco image data is imported into a deep learning network; tobacco classification is conducted by means of the deep learning network. Accordingly, by obtainingthe tobacco image data and annotated information, the system serves as an input end to be input to the deep learning network Inception Network V3, by combining a deep network and a classification module which are newly added, tobacco features are obtained, tobacco classification is conducted by means of the tobacco features, tobacco classification high in efficiency and accuracy is achieved, operation is easy, and the cost is reduced.

title: Artificial intelligence feed putting device for breeding of cattle and sheep
applicants: NANJING QINGTU INF TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial intelligent feed putting device for breeding of cattle and sheep and relates to the technical field of livestock farming. The device comprises a baseplate, electric telescopic rods are fixedly connected to the two sides of the top of the baseplate respectively, supporting plates are fixedly connected to the tops of the electric telescopic rods, and a feed tankis fixedly connected between the two supporting plates. Supporting frames are fixedly connected to the two sides of the top of the feed tank respectively, a motor is fixedly connected between the twosupporting frames, and a rotating rod is fixedly connected to an output shaft of the motor through a coupler. According to the artificial intelligence feed putting device for breeding of cattle and sheep, whether or not feed in a receiving material is sufficient can be automatically detected without artificial care; when it is detected that the feed is insufficient, the feed in a feed basket canbe automatically added, so that normal operation of breeding work is ensured, a lot of manpower is saved, a good cushioning and damping effect is achieved, the internal structure of the device is wellprotected, and the service life of the device is prolonged.

title: Artificial intelligence device capable of monitoring agriculture and forestry diseases and insect pests
applicants: NANJING QINGTU INF TECH CO LTD
abstract: The invention discloses an artificial intelligence device capable of monitoring agriculture and forestry diseases and insect pests and relates to the technical field of agriculture and forestry. The artificial intelligence device comprises a trunk and a first fixing sleeve. One side of the first fixing sleeve is fixedly connected with a fixing plate, and the top and the bottom of one side of the fixing plate are fixedly connected with supporting rods correspondingly; a square frame is rotatably connected between the opposite sides of the two supporting rods through connecting shafts, and the inner surface of the square frame is fixedly connected with two rotating devices; the opposite sides of the two rotating devices are mutually engaged through annular grooves, and the other sides of therotating devices are fixedly connected with probes.
